job_title: Unit Head Of Digital Sales Distribution
full_text_jd:
OVERVIEW
FE Credit is seeking a Unit Head of Digital Sales Distribution to lead the transformation of our frontline sales operations through digital channels. This role will act as the bridge between sales and digital product teams, ensuring that the FE Credit mobile app and digital tools empower our sales agents and enhance the customer experience. The ideal candidate will drive digital adoption, integrate sales operations with digital platforms, and influence product development to meet sales needs. This position requires a strategic thinker with a strong understanding of consumer finance, digital sales channels, and frontline sales models (POS, direct sales, telesales). The Head of Digital Sales will work cross-functionally with sales, marketing, product, IT, and customer support teams to digitize the sales journey and increase customer acquisition through digital engagement.
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
Digital Sales Strategy & Execution
• Develop and implement a digital-first sales strategy that enhances the effectiveness of POS, telesales, and direct sales teams.
1. • Define and execute a digital migration plan to shift customers and sales agents towards digital onboarding, loan application, and servicing.
• Work with sales leadership to create a hybrid sales model that integrates traditional sales approaches with digital tools.
• Develop and monitor KPIs for digital sales adoption, conversion rates, and revenue impact to measure effectiveness.
• Design and launch digital incentive programs to encourage both agents and customers to use the FE Credit mobile app and online channels.
2. Integration with Frontline Sales & POS
• Act as the key business representative to the digital product team, ensuring that sales-driven insights shape mobile app development.
• Identify critical mobile app features that enhance the loan application process, improve customer engagement, and drive higher loan conversion rates.
• Work with UX/UI designers and developers to optimize the digital loan journey for both customers and sales agents.
• Collaborate with IT and product teams to ensure seamless integration of CRM, sales tracking tools, and digital marketing automation into the app.
• Support the design and implementation of AI-driven tools, such as chatbots and automated loan approval systems, to enhance the digital sales experience.
Digital Product Development & Feature Enhancement
• Act as the key business representative to the digital product team, ensuring that sales-driven insights shape mobile app development.
• Identify critical mobile app features that enhance the loan application process, improve customer engagement, and drive higher loan conversion rates.
3. • Work with UX/UI designers and developers to optimize the digital loan journey for both customers and sales agents.
• Collaborate with IT and product teams to ensure seamless integration of CRM, sales tracking tools, and digital marketing automation into the app.
• Support the design and implementation of AI-driven tools, such as chatbots and automated loan approval systems, to enhance the digital sales experience.
Performance Analytics & Digital Sales Optimization
• Utilize customer and agent usage data to refine digital sales strategies and improve conversion rates.
• Track and analyze digital sales funnel performance to identify bottlenecks and opportunities for improvement.
4. • Conduct A/B testing to optimize digital sales features, onboarding flows, and incentive structures.
• Develop dashboard reporting for senior leadership, showcasing digital adoption rates, customer behavior, and agent performance metrics.
• Work closely with marketing teams to refine customer targeting strategies based on behavioral data.
Cross-Functional Collaboration & Stakeholder Management
• Align the priorities of Sales, Product, IT, Marketing, and Operations teams to ensure a unified digital sales approach.
5. • Partner with Risk & Compliance teams to ensure digital sales processes meet regulatory and security requirements.
• Work with customer support teams to enhance self-service options within the mobile app, reducing dependency on agent interactions.
• Lead workshops and training sessions to educate internal teams on digital sales strategies and the benefits of digital transformation.

•    Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, Finance, or a related field. An MBA or equivalent advanced degree is highly preferred.
•    8+ years of experience in digital sales, consumer finance, fintech, or e-commerce.
•    Proven expertise in sales digitization, product development, and digital transformation.
•    Strong understanding of POS, direct sales, telesales, and digital customer acquisition models.
•    Experience with mobile app development, UX/UI optimization, CRM systems, and digital payments.
•    Ability to bridge the gap between sales teams and technology teams, ensuring digital solutions align with business needs.
•    Strong data-driven mindset, with experience in analytics, funnel optimization, and conversion rate improvement.
•    Ability to develop and implement digital incentive programs for sales teams.
•    Excellent leadership, communication, and stakeholder management skills.
•    Experience working in the Vietnamese consumer finance market is highly preferred.
•    Experience with AI-driven sales automation tools or digital lending platforms.
•    Familiarity with regulatory compliance for digital lending in Vietnam.
•    Background in business intelligence tools (Tableau, Power BI) and marketing analytics.
•    Exposure to agile product development methodologies.
•    Fluency in Vietnamese and English is required.

company: Dcom Money Express - Hochiminh Rep. Office
full_text_jd:
We are actively seeking a highly skilled and experienced UX/UI Designer with a strong background in Fintech and Remittance projects to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be responsible for crafting and refining the user experience for our cross-border payment solutions, ensuring the creation of a seamless, intuitive, and visually engaging interface that enhances usability and drives customer satisfaction. Your expertise will be instrumental in optimizing the user journey, enabling us to deliver innovative, user-centric financial products.
Responsibilities
•   Design and develop UX/UI for fintech remittance applications (web & mobile).
•   Build and maintain a design system to ensure consistency across the product.
•   Create wireframes, prototypes, user flows, and high-fidelity UI using Figma.
•   Collaborate with Product Managers, Developers, and Stakeholders to define product requirements.
•   Can be retested to check UX/UI
•   Conduct user research, and usability testing, and iterate based on feedback.
•   Work within an Agile/Scrum development environment.

**Requirements
Must-have
•   At least 3 years of experience in UX/UI design, preferably in Fintech Remittance.
•   Proficiency in Figma (Auto Layout, Components, Prototyping).
•   Ability to build and maintain a design system.
•   Familiarity with user research & usability testing methodologies.
•   Graphic design skills (icons, illustrations, branding).
•   Experience working in an Agile/Scrum development process.
•   Ability to communicate and present in English.
Nice-to-have:
•   Experience in motion design, and animations for UI.
•   Familiarity with front-end concepts (HTML, CSS, React).
•   Knowledge of financial regulations related to remittance UX/UI.
**Tools & Software Proficiency
Graphic Design:
•   Figma
•   Illustrator
•   Photoshop
•   Mockups
Bonus Skills:
•   Experience in branding & marketing visuals.
•   Understanding of cross-border payment UX challenges.

job_title: Consultant - SAP Logistics Support (EWM/IM/LE) with Japanese
full_text_jd:
Are you ready to unleash your potential?
At Deloitte, our purpose is to make an impact that matters for our clients, our people, and the communities we serve.
We believe we have a responsibility to be a force for good, and WorldImpact is our portfolio of initiatives focused on making a tangible impact on society’s biggest challenges and creating a better future. We strive to advise clients on how to deliver purpose-led growth and embed more equitable, inclusive as well as sustainable business practices.
Hence, we seek talented individuals driven to excel and innovate, working together to achieve our shared goals.
We are committed to creating positive work experiences that foster a culture of respect and inclusion, where diverse perspectives are celebrated, and everyone is recognized for their contributions.
Ready to unleash your potential with us? Join the winning team now!
Work you’ll do:
• You may be assigned as Level 2 AMS support between Business/Client IT Team, partnering systems, and Application Managed Services (AMS) team. In this role, you are expected
o To render 2nd level AMS support by performing in-depth production incident (simple to medium level complexity) troubleshooting, resolve any production incident and monitor the fixes to ensure correct resolution in accordance with the agreed scope and Service Level Agreement (SLA) stated in the contract
o To collaborate with Developer to deliver simple to medium complexity enhancements within the agreed timeframe and with quality.
o To provide progress and status reports at regular intervals to the Client
o To escalate and inform the Service Delivery Manager (SDM) and/or the Team Lead, as early as possible, of any impending slippage in the delivery dates, aging tickets, or any matters likely to impede the service level of the contract
o To maintain documentation according to firm standards, best practices, and standard operating procedures
o To fully comply with and adhere to all the standard AMS process & procedures that are developed, and client’s IT policies that applies.
o To actively participate and contribute to any Continuous Improvement initiatives on top of existing workload to further improve current processes within the organization or Client
• You may be assigned as part of project team member to implement the application. In this role, you are expected
o To support the project teams in delivery of our solution applications and in development of work products that addresses our clients’ business needs and help achieve their strategic goals.
o To support the project teams in developing presentation materials or documentations and in coordination of communications with the client.
• You will work with diverse and talented project team members to solve problems, improve performance, and generate value for our clients across all industries
• You will uphold the firm’s standards and ethos in working with fellow team members and in your interactions with the clients.
• You will support business development efforts by contributing directly to the preparation, development of proposals, presentations and publications
Your role as a leader:
At Deloitte, we believe in the importance of empowering our people to be leaders at all levels. We connect our purpose and shared values to identify issues as well as to make an impact that matters to our clients, people, and the communities. Additionally, Senior Analyst across our Firm are expected to:
• Demonstrate a strong commitment to personal learning and development.
• Understand how our daily work contributes to the priorities of the team and business.
• Understand the set expectations and demonstrate accountability in keeping personal performance on track.
• Actively focus on developing effective communications and relationship-building skills with stakeholders, clients and team.
• Demonstrate an appreciation for working with others.
• Understand what is fundamental to Deloitte’s success as a business.
• Demonstrate integrity and an awareness of strengths, differences, and personal impact.
• Develop their understanding of Deloitte and offer a fresh perspective.

Requirements:
•	Have at least 5 years’ experience working with the SAP S/4HANA or SAP ECC as a support team lead/member, implementation team lead/member of SAP Logistics (EWM/IM/LE)
•	Have basic knowledge of integration to other related modules/sub-modules of the above applications to ensure ability to understand end to end business process and work independently to derive test data/scenarios and perform testing.
•	Have experience in delivering solutions on cloud or on-premise platforms
•	Have experience working on traditional waterfall and/or Agile delivery approach
•	Certifications in any of the above applications and/or certified in ITIL or Project Management (e.g. PMP, PRINCE or Agile) or DevOps is an added advantage
•	Good command of English & Japanese Language
•	Good analytical thinking and ability to engage stakeholders
•	Pro-active, able to work independently to deliver task assigned timely
•	Flexibility to take on new solutions/applications where applicable and ensure successful integration and support for the business
•	Willing to work based on clients’ business workdays and office hours and on rotation basis to support any critical or high request after client’s business office hours.
•	Ability to travel if required, i.e. to be placed at Client’s site for the project
Due to volume of applications, we regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

job_title: Senior Consultant - SAP MM Support (with Japanese)
full_text_jd:
Are you ready to unleash your potential?
At Deloitte, our purpose is to make an impact that matters for our clients, our people, and the communities we serve.
We believe we have a responsibility to be a force for good, and WorldImpact is our portfolio of initiatives focused on making a tangible impact on society’s biggest challenges and creating a better future. We strive to advise clients on how to deliver purpose-led growth and embed more equitable, inclusive as well as sustainable business practices.
Hence, we seek talented individuals driven to excel and innovate, working together to achieve our shared goals.
We are committed to creating positive work experiences that foster a culture of respect and inclusion, where diverse perspectives are celebrated, and everyone is recognised for their contributions.
Ready to unleash your potential with us? Join the winning team now!
Work you’ll do:
• You may be assigned as Level 2 AMS support between Business/Client IT Team, partnering systems, and Application Managed Services (AMS) team. In this role, you are expected
o To render 2nd level AMS support by performing in-depth production incident (simple to medium level complexity) troubleshooting, resolve any production incident and monitor the fixes to ensure correct resolution in accordance with the agreed scope and Service Level Agreement (SLA) stated in the contract
o To collaborate with Developer to deliver simple to medium complexity enhancements within the agreed timeframe and with quality.
o To provide progress and status reports at regular intervals to the Client
o To escalate and inform the Service Delivery Manager (SDM) and/or the Team Lead, as early as possible, of any impending slippage in the delivery dates, aging tickets, or any matters likely to impede the service level of the contract
o To maintain documentation according to firm standards, best practices, and standard operating procedures
o To fully comply with and adhere to all the standard AMS process & procedures that are developed, and client’s IT policies that applies.
o To actively participate and contribute to any Continuous Improvement initiatives on top of existing workload to further improve current processes within the organization or Client
• You may be assigned as part of project team member to implement the application. In this role, you are expected
o To support the project teams in delivery of our solution applications and in development of work products that addresses our clients’ business needs and help achieve their strategic goals.
o To support the project teams in developing presentation materials or documentations and in coordination of communications with the client.
• You will work with diverse and talented project team members to solve problems, improve performance, and generate value for our clients across all industries
• You will uphold the firm’s standards and ethos in working with fellow team members and in your interactions with the clients.
• You will support business development efforts by contributing directly to the preparation, development of proposals, presentations and publications
Your role as a leader:
At Deloitte, we believe in the importance of empowering our people to be leaders at all levels. We connect our purpose and shared values to identify issues as well as to make an impact that matters to our clients, people, and the communities. Additionally, Senior Analyst across our Firm are expected to:
• Demonstrate a strong commitment to personal learning and development.
• Understand how our daily work contributes to the priorities of the team and business.
• Understand the set expectations and demonstrate accountability in keeping personal performance on track.
• Actively focus on developing effective communications and relationship-building skills with stakeholders, clients and team.
• Demonstrate an appreciation for working with others.
• Understand what is fundamental to Deloitte’s success as a business.
• Demonstrate integrity and an awareness of strengths, differences, and personal impact.
• Develop their understanding of Deloitte and offer a fresh perspective.

Requirements:
•	Have at least 5 years’ experience working with the SAP S/4HANA or SAP ECC as a support team lead/member, implementation team lead/member of SAP MM
•	Have basic knowledge of integration to other related modules/sub-modules of the above applications to ensure ability to understand end to end business process and work independently to derive test data/scenarios and perform testing.
•	Have experience in delivering solutions on cloud or on-premise platforms
•	Have experience working on traditional waterfall and/or Agile delivery approach
•	Certifications in any of the above applications and/or certified in ITIL or Project Management (e.g. PMP, PRINCE or Agile) or DevOps is an added advantage
•	Good command of English & Japanese Language
•	Good analytical thinking and ability to engage stakeholders
•	Pro-active, able to work independently to deliver task assigned timely
•	Flexibility to take on new solutions/applications where applicable and ensure successful integration and support for the business
•	Willing to work based on clients’ business workdays and office hours and on rotation basis to support any critical or high request after client’s business office hours.
•	Ability to travel if required, i.e. to be placed at Client’s site for the project
Due to volume of applications, we regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.
Please note that Deloitte will never reach out to you directly via messaging platforms to offer you employment opportunities or request for money or your personal information. Kindly apply for roles that you are interested in via this official Deloitte website.

job_title: Infrastructure Administrator (Financial IT System Design & Implementation)
company: Ngân Hàng Công Nghiệp Hàn Quốc- Chi Nhánh Hà Nội ( IBK Hanoi Branch)
full_text_jd:
Job Summary
We are looking for an experienced
Infrastructure Architect
who will lead the planning, design, and implementation of secure and scalable infrastructure for enterprise-level financial IT systems. This role involves designing system architecture that meets business, performance, and regulatory requirements, while ensuring stable connectivity with external organizations such as SBV.
•	Working with Head of Division to build infrastructure solutions and technology systems for the development and expansion of business.
•	Implementing staff management includes: training, guidance to improve knowledge for employees, assign and evaluate the level of work completion.
•	To research and recommend changes to the IT infrastructure architecture, ensuring that all new and enhanced facilities are effectively project managed and thoroughly tested, before being implemented in the production environment
•	Management implementing, repairing, operating and monitoring the central infrastructure systems of the system (server, data storage device, infrastructure security device, software platform, backup system, etc..)
Key Responsibilities
•	Design and build infrastructure for banking and financial systems based on enterprise architecture standards
•	Plan and configure Servers, Networks, Database environments (e.g., IBM, HP, Oracle), application servers, and databases (e.g., Oracle)
•	Lead interface infrastructure design with external entities (e.g., SBV, credit bureau, payment gateway)
•	Define system integration structures including API, authentication, encryption, and data flow
•	Reflect security and regulatory requirements (e.g., personal data protection, financial IT compliance)
•	Collaborate with development teams to ensure deployment efficiency, scalability, and operational stability
•	Develop infrastructure documentation, network diagrams, and standard operation guides (SOPs)

Must Have:
•	5+ years of experience in system administration or infrastructure operations
•	Proven experience managing enterprise Web/WAS systems (e.g., WebLogic, JEUS)
•	Solid understanding of financial security regulations and implementation
•	Experience in operating external interface systems (e.g., real-time or batch integration)
•	Experience with log management and incident handling
Nice to Have:
•	System architecture design and operation experience
•	Experience designing secure infrastructure based on compliance frameworks
•	Experience with large-scale real-time or batch processing systems
•	Relevant certifications (e.g., CISSP, PMP, Information Security Engineer)
CÁC PHÚC LỢI DÀNH CHO BẠN
-	Attractive salary
-	Annual Health Check and Premium Insurance Policy
-	Friendly working environment
-	13th month salary and additional bonus
Please attach your QUALIFICATIONS and your PHOTO to CV (CV must be in English or Korean) when submitting applications. Only CV in English/ Korean with Photos is qualified. Early application shall be processed in priority.
Địa điểm làm việc: Phòng 1209, Tầng 12, Keangnam Landmark 72, đường Phạm Hùng, phường Mễ Trì, quận Nam Từ Liêm, thành phố Hà Nội, Việt Nam

job_title: 02 Nhân Viên Phát Triển Phần Mềm ( C# hoặc Python ) - Nghỉ Thứ 7 và Chủ Nhật

- Thư viện công ty với trên 1000 đầu sách nhiều lĩnh vực dành cho gia đình công nhân viên mượn, tham khảo.
- Cơ sở vật chất văn phòng, nhà máy, khu nghỉ dành cho công nhân viên sạch sẽ, hiện đại, tiện nghi bậc nhất khu công nghiệp, thường xuyên được đón tiếp khách cấp tỉnh, trung ương đến thăm.
- Công ty có nhiều hoạt động gắn kết cho công nhân viên: Du lịch hè, liên hoan cuối năm, ngày hội gia đình, nhiều hoạt động, hội thi sôi nổi: Ngày hội thể thao, Hội xuân, Khéo tay 8/3.
- Được phát huy sở thích, thể mạnh ở các hoạt động câu lạc bộ: Câu lạc bộ Truyền thông, câu lạc bộ Tiếng Anh, Văn nghệ, Thể thao.
- Có hoạt động thăm hỏi, hỗ trợ công nhân viên công ty và dân cư khu vực lân cận có hoàn cảnh khó khăn hàng năm.

company: Home Credit Vietnam - Explore Your Dream Team
full_text_jd:

https://career.homecredit.vn/vn/article/id/217.
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
1. Process Analysis & Improvement:
- Build the process improvement backlog in Jira by working closely with stakeholders to gather feedback and align on process improvements
- Analyze existing processes to identify bottlenecks, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement (As-is process analysis)
- Collaborate with stakeholders to design improved workflows and propose process changes (To-be process) that optimize workflow and improve operational efficiency
- Support/ drive process implementation and track progress of improvement initiatives
- Monitor the impact of implemented changes, run retrospectives to record/share lessons learnt and help determine success metrics
2. Change Management Support:
- Work closely with Change Management team to ensure that the new process is implemented, and any related documentation is updated
Other related duties as required and assigned

- University or advanced degree preferable in Economics, Business Administration
- 2-3 years experience with proven record in business process management, process improvement preferrable in banking or consumer finance, or risk/ops/process consultancy
- Strong analytical and process mapping skills (e.g., BPMN, Visio)
- Excellent communications in both Vietnamese and English
- Demonstrated ability to practice complex problem solving, advanced negotiation, influence capability, and conflict solving
- Demonstrated skills in report writing, data visualization and data-driven mindset
- Able to independently develop and deliver presentation in front of large audience

To ensure the stable and efficient operation of the company’s IT systems, network, and security infrastructure. Provide IT support to the head office, branch office and project sites, including remote and onsite support as necessary.
Key Responsibilities:
• Maintain and troubleshoot IT infrastructure, including servers, network devices, firewall, and end-user devices (PCs, laptops, printers, etc.).
• Provide daily IT support and troubleshooting for staff in the head office, branch office and project sites.
• Coordinate with external vendors and IT team at Thailand/Head Office for system upgrades and issue resolution.
• Manage software and hardware inventory, license renewal, and ensure IT assets are well-tracked.
• Implement and enforce IT security measures, monitor firewall and backup systems.
• Provide IT orientation for new employees and support system accounts setup.
• Prepare regular IT reports and documentation related to system status and incident logs.
• Other tasks as assigned by the Superiors.

• College or Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or related field.
• At least 2 years of experience in IT support or system/network administration.
• Good knowledge of Windows OS, Microsoft 365, networking (LAN, VPN), and firewall systems.
• Familiar with backup solutions and IT security best practices.
• Problem-solving skills and ability to work independently or as part of a team.
• Willing to travel to project sites when required.
• Intermediate English communication skills by speaking, writing, listening, and reading.
Benefits:
• Annual Leave: 12 days/year (after probation time)
• Gross salary: Negotiable (13 months a year)
• Annual Salary Increase: once per year
• Insurance: 24 hours’ Accident Insurance, Social Insurance, Health Care Insurance
• Others: International working environment, company trip, etc.

We are iTechwx, established in mid-2022, with a dedicated team of 500 - 1000 employees operating across Ho Chi Minh City and Ha Noi City. We are also strategically planning to expand our presence to other regions within Vietnam in the near future. iTechwx dedicates the One-Stop Digital Transformation Service to our customers. Renowned for delivering premium IT outsourcing services exclusively tailored for Microsoft clients for 4 products: Microsoft Dynamics 365, Microsoft Azure, Microsoft Windows Commercial, Microsoft Office 365.
***Are you passionate about helping others and have a deep understanding of Microsoft products?
At iTechwx, we specialize in four products: Microsoft Dynamics 365, Azure, Windows Commercial, and Office 365. Here's a brief introduction to each:
•	Microsoft Dynamics 365:
A comprehensive suite of business applications designed to help you manage customer relationships, streamline operations, and drive growth.
•	Microsoft Azure:
Microsoft's cloud computing platform, offering a wide range of services including computing, analytics, storage, and networking to help you build, manage, and deploy applications on a global scale.
•	Microsoft Windows Commercial:
A robust operating system tailored for business environments, providing enhanced security, productivity, and management features to support your enterprise needs.
•	Microsoft Office 365:
A suite of productivity tools including Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and more, designed to help you collaborate and work efficiently from anywhere.
YOU WILL:
•	Reviews issues and contacts customers to understand issues. Ensures customers stay informed as to the status/solution of their issue. Utilizes troubleshooting tools (e.g., event logs, and performance traces) to help resolve customer issues. Resolves or escalates multiple and varied customer issues. Documents technical work and research.
•	Analyzes problems and develops solutions for customer needs using log analysis and other proprietary tools.
•	Collaborates on cross-team and cross-product technical issues by working with resources from other groups as needed to resolve moderately complex customer issues.
•	Uses automated tools to deliver solutions for a wide range of issues. Provides feedback on how to improve automated tools. Attends case triage meetings or case discussions to collaborate and share ideas to resolve problems.

OUR IDEAL CANDIDATES:
•	Proficient in
English
(4 skills)
•	Available to
work night shifts
•
Freshers
are welcome with a good learning ability and working attitude
•
Customer service-oriented
•	Experience/Knowledge in
IT industry skills is a plus
WHY US?
•	Competitive salary depending on experience: 18-30,000,000 VND GROSS (depends on your performance in the interviews)
•	Salary at 100% during the probationary period
•	90% contribution of the gross salary to social insurance
•	An employee who works at night (10PM -6 AM) will be paid an additional amount of 30% of the normal salary + PVI insurance + 500,000 VND food allowance
•	20 days leave (12 days of annual leave and 8 days of sick leave)
•	Training will be offered

job_title: Android Automotive Expert - Cockpit Domain Controller
company: Bosch Global Software Technologies Company Limited
full_text_jd:
Position Overview:
We are seeking
an expert in Android Automotive development
to lead the design, implementation, and optimization of In-Vehicle Infotainment (IVI) systems and Cockpit Domain Controllers. The ideal candidate will possess deep expertise in Android Automotive, AOSP (Android Open-Source Project), and integrating multimedia, navigation, connectivity, and vehicle control features in a real-time automotive environment. This role requires experience in driving the technical architecture, coding, and hands-on system integration to deliver innovative automotive solutions. A key part of your responsibilities will include leading the development of high-performance, low-latency Android Automotive systems and collaborating across multi-OS platforms, including QNX Hypervisor integration.
Key Responsibilities:
1. Android Automotive IVI Systems Development
- Lead the development of Android Automotive solutions, customizing AOSP for In-Vehicle Infotainment (IVI) platforms, and integrating multimedia, navigation, and vehicle control features.
- Optimize HMI (Human-Machine Interface) for seamless transitions between infotainment and vehicle systems, enhancing the driver experience.
- Oversee the integration of cockpit domain controllers and Android-based systems with automotive hardware like displays, instrument clusters, and sensors.
2. Real-Time Systems Optimization
- Implement real-time optimizations within Android Automotive, ensuring low-latency performance for critical functions such as navigation and media streaming.
- Optimize system resource management for Android applications to ensure efficient CPU, memory, and GPU utilization.
3. Hands-On Development & Debugging
- Develop low-level software components, including device drivers and firmware for Android Automotive systems.
- Lead debugging efforts using tools like GDB and JTAG, troubleshooting hardware-software integration issues and meeting real-time constraints.
4. Platform Architecture & Integration
- Design Android-centric system architecture, ensuring smooth integration with multi-OS environments like QNX and ADAS systems.
- Implement multi-OS solutions, ensuring Android Automotive integrates effectively with safety-critical systems.
5. Client Engagement & Business Development
- Present Android Automotive solutions to OEMs, Tier 1 suppliers, and stakeholders, providing expert guidance on system architecture.
- Lead technical aspects of project proposals and bidding processes, including system requirements and integration plans.
5. Leadership & Cross-Functional Collaboration
- Mentor junior engineers and foster collaboration across departments to ensure seamless integration of Android Automotive solutions with vehicle systems.
Safety, Security & Compliance
- Ensure Android Automotive systems comply with automotive safety standards (ISO 26262, AUTOSAR) and implement cybersecurity measures like secure boot and data encryption.

• Extensive Experience in Android Automotive Development:
At least 8 years of hands-on experience in developing Android Automotive solutions, including deep customization of AOSP for IVI systems and infotainment platforms.
• Real-Time Systems Expertise:
Proven experience in optimizing Android for real-time applications, including the integration of safety-critical systems and the implementation of multi-layered solutions with low-latency performance.
• Hands-On Embedded Systems Development:
Expertise in writing low-level code, device drivers, and firmware for automotive platforms running Android, with experience in BSP development and hardware integration.
• Client-Facing & Proposal Skills:
Experience in client-facing roles, delivering technical presentations, and managing proposals and project bids related to Android Automotive solutions.
• Leadership & Mentorship:
Strong leadership skills, with a proven ability to guide and mentor teams, ensuring the successful delivery of complex Android Automotive projects.
• Automotive Safety & Security Knowledge:
Familiarity with automotive safety standards such as ISO 26262 and AUTOSAR, and hands-on experience in implementing security measures for Android Automotive systems.

• Quản lý tiến độ triển khai và báo cáo tiến độ triển khai danh mục các yêu cầu phát triển tới đơn vị nghiệp vụ liên quan thuộc PVcomBank và lãnh đạo Khối CNTT.
• Theo dõi, báo cáo, đánh giá độc lập các dự án CNTT bao gồm không giới hạn các yếu tố về: Kế hoạch quản lý dự án, phạm vi, thời gian, chi phí, nguồn lực, chất lượng, rủi ro, mua sắm ... và đánh giá kết quả dự án theo yêu cầu của Lãnh đạo Khối CNTT.
• Thực hiện các công việc khác được giao theo chức năng nhiệm vụ của Phòng Quản trị Danh mục và Tài chính công nghệ.

YÊU CẦU CÔNG VIỆC
Trình độ học vấn:
• Tốt nghiệp cao đẳng các chuyên ngành trong lĩnh vực công nghệ thông tin, hoặc đại học các chuyên ngành tài chính ngân hàng, kinh tế, xây dựng, quản trị kinh doanh.
Kinh nghiệm:

Kỹ năng chuyên môn:
• Hiểu biết sâu rộng về các mô hình quản lý danh mục (Portfolio Management), phương pháp Agile, Scrum hoặc Waterfall.
• Thành thạo trong việc sử dụng các công cụ quản lý danh mục và dự án (Microsoft Project, JIRA, v.v.).

job_title: Chuyên Gia Kiến Trúc Và Giải Pháp Hạ Tầng - K.CNTT
company: Ngân Hàng TMCP Đại Chúng Việt Nam
full_text_jd:
Mô tả công việc
• Xây dựng kiến trúc hạ tầng mục tiêu và lộ trình đầu tư công nghệ cho các hệ thống hạ tầng CNTT (máy chủ, lưu trữ, mạng, ứng dụng hạ tầng doanh nghiệp) phù hợp với chiến lược kinh doanh của ngân hàng.
• Đánh giá, tham gia thiết kế và lựa chọn giải pháp hạ tầng, xây dựng yêu cầu kỹ thuật chi tiết cho các dự án và hạng mục đầu tư mua sắm.
• Xây dựng kế hoạch chuyển đổi và tích hợp giữa hạ tầng truyền thống và nền tảng Cloud theo kiến trúc Hybrid Cloud.
• Quản lý, giám sát các thay đổi liên quan đến kiến trúc giải pháp hạ tầng nhằm đảm bảo tính toàn vẹn, quy chuẩn và nhất quán của hệ thống công nghệ.
• Định kỳ rà soát kiến trúc hạ tầng theo các kịch bản để tăng hiệu suất và giảm chi phí vận hành, đánh giá mức độ tuân thủ của kiến trúc tiêu chuẩn và quản lý độ tin cậy.
• Đề xuất các công nghệ và phương pháp tự động hóa quản lý hạ tầng (Infrastructure as Code).
• Thực hiện các công việc khác được giao theo chức năng nhiệm vụ của Phòng Quản trị Kiến trúc Công nghệ.

YÊU CẦU CÔNG VIỆC
Trình độ học vấn:
• Tốt nghiệp cao đẳng các chuyên ngành trong lĩnh vực công nghệ thông tin trở lên.
Kinh nghiệm:
• Ít nhất 04 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực CNTT, trong đó tối thiểu 02 năm kinh nghiệm ở vị trí chuyên viên chính/chuyên viên cao cấp trở lên trong lĩnh vực liên quan.
Kiến thức chuyên môn:
• Am hiểu sâu về các công nghệ hạ tầng, bao gồm: Mạng, máy chủ, lưu trữ, ứng dụng hạ tầng doanh nghiệp và bảo mật.
• Am hiểu các giải pháp Cloud (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) và các mô hình triển khai Hybrid Cloud/Private Cloud.
• Có kinh nghiệm về containerization (Docker, Kubernetes), virtualization (VMware, Hyper-V) và tự động hóa hạ tầng (Ansible, Terraform).
• Kinh nghiệm trong việc triển khai và quản lý hệ thống DR (Disaster Recovery) và HA (High Availability).
Kỹ năng mềm:
• Kỹ năng đọc, hiểu tài liệu và giao tiếp bằng Tiếng Anh;
• Khả năng tư duy chiến lược, phân tích, sáng tạo và đổi mới, tinh thần trách nhiệm cao trong công việc;
• Kỹ năng giao tiếp tốt;
• Kỹ năng làm việc độc lập hoặc làm việc theo nhóm;
• Kỹ năng giải quyết vấn đề và ra quyết định;
ƯU TIÊN CÁC ỨNG VIÊN
• Ham học hỏi tìm tòi sáng tạo cái mới.
• Am hiểu các phương pháp luận kiến trúc như TOGAF.
• Có một hoặc nhiều chứng chỉ: CCIE/CCNP (Cisco Certified); AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Azure Solutions Architect Expert; VMware Certified Professional (VCP); ITIL Foundation hoặc COBIT; TOGAF Certified.
• Có kinh nghiệm làm việc theo mô hình Agile/Scrum.

company: Ngân Hàng TMCP Đại Chúng Việt Nam

full_text_jd:
1. Develop AI Applications: Design and implement AI-based software solutions for image recognition, including data processing, model optimization, and deployment.
2. Linux-Based Development: Work on Linux application development using C/C++ and Python, focusing on AI-related algorithm implementation, API development, and engineering optimizations.
3. AI Model Optimization: Enhance and optimize AI image network models to improve inference speed and accuracy across various hardware platforms.
4. Embedded Systems & Driver Development: Contribute to Linux driver development, optimizing system performance and resource utilization while porting and integrating AI applications on embedded devices.
5. Full Development Lifecycle Engagement: Participate in the complete software development lifecycle, including requirements analysis, architecture design, implementation, testing, and ongoing maintenance.

1. Education:
Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Artificial Intelligence, Electronic Information, or a related field.
2. Programming Skills:
Strong proficiency in C/C++ and Python, with a solid foundation in data structures, algorithms, and best coding practices.
3. System Development Experience:
• Experience in Linux application development, including multithreading, inter-process communication, and network programming.
• Understanding of Linux device driver development and familiarity with ARM/X86 platform development.
• Hands-on experience with embedded software development and AI model deployment on embedded platforms.
• Proficiency with Linux GUI frameworks, such as GTK or QT.
4. AI Knowledge:
• Strong understanding of deep learning and image processing concepts.
• Proficiency in AI frameworks like TensorFlow and PyTorch.
• Experience with AI model optimization techniques such as quantization, pruning, and inference acceleration, with a focus on optimizing performance for CPU, GPU, and NPU.
5. Development Workflow:
• Familiarity with modern software development practices, including Git, CI/CD, Docker, and best engineering methodologies.
Benefits
- Salary: Attractive salary
- Bonus: 13th Month salary
- Yearly promotion & Special Adjustment and Internal hiring
- Bus: Pick up bus from Hanoi, Hung Yen, Hai Duong, Hai Phong
- Working hours are from Monday to Friday, with Saturdays and Sundays off
- Annual leave: 12 days/ year (every 3 years plus 1 more day)
- Paid leave: 1 day company day/ year
- Training: Training program internal and external
- Online training system
- Healthcare: Insurance as law requirements
- Accident insurance 24/7
- Travel opportunities To Asia, USA
- Team Activities: Summer Team building, Year End Party ( 2 times/ Year)
- Working environment: Muntinational company using English for daily communication
- Trust and Respecting people

We’re in search of a RPA Developer that is ready to innovate and explore what’s possible in the world or robotics. In this role, you’ll work cross-functionally with business operations and business analysts all around the world in order to create and optimize workflow processes. You’ll also lead initiatives related to designing and managing workflow automation projects, testing and fixing bugs. To be successful, you’ll need experience in automation technologies including UiPath.

- Work directly with stakeholders to capture business requirements and translate them into technical approaches and designs that can be implemented.
- Collaborate with business analysts and stakeholders to gather and analyze requirements.
- Develop and configure automation workflows to streamline and optimize business processes.
- Perform testing and debugging of RPA solutions to ensure quality and performance.
- Maintain and update existing RPA solutions as needed. Design, develop, and test automation workflows.
- Deploy RPA components including bots, robots, development tools, code repositories, and logging tools.
- Troubleshoot issues that arise in day-to-day running of RPA processes and provide timely resolutions.
- Provide training and support to end-users and stakeholders on RPA tools and digital solutions.
- Create documentation and user guides to facilitate knowledge transfer and support.
- Assure the quality of the automation (QA processes).
- Recommend and implement digital solutions that align with business goals, including but not limited to cloud computing, IoT, AI, and data analytics.
Training

company: Bosch Global Software Technologies Company Limited
full_text_jd:
We are seeking an accomplished Senior IT Consultant Manager to join our high-performing team dedicated to delivering innovative internal IT solutions that empower our global organization of 500,000 users. In this pivotal role, you will lead a team of Business Analysts and IT consultants to navigate complex workflows platform, drive strategic migration efforts, deliver insightful business analytics, and provide expert guidance on all aspects of IT solutions. Your blend of leadership, technical acumen, and strategic vision will be instrumental in shaping the future of our IT landscape and ensuring alignment with overarching business objectives.
Key Responsibilities:
- Leadership and Mentorship:
Provide inspirational leadership and guidance to a team of BAs and IT consultants, fostering a collaborative and high-performing environment that encourages professional development and knowledge sharing.
- Workflows Platform Modernization:
Lead the analysis of workflows platform, meticulously documenting requirements and identifying gaps to facilitate a seamless migration to new technologies. Your expertise will be essential in understanding the complexities of existing systems and ensuring a successful transition to modern platforms.
- Requirements Elicitation and Documentation
: Engage with diverse stakeholders across the organization to elicit, analyze, and document business requirements, translating them into clear, concise, and actionable user stories that drive development efforts.
- Cross-Functional Collaboration:
Act as a liaison between business units and the development team, fostering clear communication, managing expectations, and ensuring successful project delivery. Your ability to navigate both technical and business domains will be key to establishing strong partnerships and achieving project goals.
- Data-Driven Decision Making:
Design and implement business insights dashboards, providing stakeholders with actionable intelligence and key performance indicators to facilitate informed decision-making and strategic planning.
- Strategic Planning and Advisory:
Contribute to the development of business plans, reports, and strategic initiatives, leveraging data-driven insights to improve product efficiency, streamline migration timelines, and drive overall business value. Ensure that the Business Plan and its resulting outcomes are not only actionable but also resonate with all stakeholders, fostering a sense of ownership and engagement.
- Agile Adoption and Advocacy:
Champion Agile methodologies, actively participating in sprint planning, backlog grooming, and retrospectives, and cultivating an Agile mindset within the team. Your leadership will be instrumental in ensuring the team delivers value iteratively and incrementally.
Work Packages & Additional Responsibilities:
- Stakeholder Management:
Cultivate and maintain strong relationships with stakeholders across the organization, adeptly managing expectations, addressing concerns, and resolving conflicts. Inspire the adoption of new technologies at every step of the product delivery process, effectively communicating their benefits and addressing any potential challenges.
- Process Optimization:
Continuously identify opportunities to optimize existing processes and workflows, driving efficiency gains and contributing to a culture of continuous improvement.
- Change Management:
Play an active role in organizational change management efforts, supporting users through the adoption of new systems and processes. Your ability to communicate change effectively, build trust, and address concerns will be essential in facilitating smooth transitions and minimizing disruption.
- User Acceptance Testing:
Plan and execute comprehensive user acceptance testing (UAT), ensuring that solutions meet business requirements, user needs, and adhere to quality standards.
- Training & Documentation:
Develop clear and concise training materials and user documentation to facilitate seamless adoption of new technologies and processes.
- Cross-Functional Collaboration: Thrive in a multinational team with diverse backgrounds and aspirations, fostering intensive collaboration and establishing effective cross-functional development practices.
- Functional Work Item Tracking:
Ensure functional work items are clearly defined, tracked, and managed throughout the project lifecycle.
- Non-Functional Work Item Creation:
Identify, define, and prioritize non-functional requirements, ensuring they are incorporated into the project plan.
- Engagement Activities:
Support or plan activities to engage stakeholders and foster a collaborative environment.

- Proven Experience:
5+ years of Business Analysis experience, with a demonstrable track record of success in internal IT solutions and workflows platform migration projects.
- Education Background:
Graduate in Bachelor’s degree or preferably Master’s degree in Information Technology Business Management or Computer Science.
- Leadership & Mentorship:
Proven ability to lead, inspire, and mentor a team of BAs and consultants, fostering a high-performing and collaborative environment.
- Analytical Acumen:
Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to dissect complex systems and processes and identify opportunities for improvement.
- Exceptional Communication:
Superior written and verbal communication skills, adept at tailoring your message to both technical and non-technical audiences and building strong relationships with stakeholders at all levels.
- Data-Driven Decision Making:
Proficiency in data analysis and visualization tools, with a demonstrated ability to derive actionable insights from complex datasets.
- Agile Expertise:
Experience working in an Agile environment, with a solid understanding of Agile principles, practices, and ceremonies.
- Technical Aptitude:
Familiarity with the software development lifecycle, relevant technologies, and architectural principles.
- Certifications:
Relevant certifications such as CBAP, PMI-PBA, or Agile certifications are highly desirable.
- Cross-Cultural Sensitivity:
Ability to work effectively in a diverse and multinational environment, demonstrating respect and appreciation for different perspectives and cultural nuances.
Additional Information:
- Work in one of the Best Places to Work
in Vietnam
- Impactful Work:
The opportunity to contribute to the development of innovative software solutions that make a real difference.
- Collaborative Environment:
A supportive and collaborative team environment where your ideas are valued, and your contributions are recognized.
- Growth Potential:
A clear path for professional development and advancement within a growing company.

About the role
Netcompany is currently looking for ambitious graduates to join us on a permanent basis to drive forward our delivery capability and deliver the optimum solutions to our clients in Europe. You will join our strong and dedicated team based in Ho Chi Minh City, where you will have the opportunity to work with some of the most skilled IT consultants in Vietnam and our technically skilled employees in Europe.
As an employee in Netcompany you will also benefit from our large and global knowledge-based communities, Centers of Excellence. This covers a wide range of different knowledge groups, from specific technologies like .NET and Java to Architecture, Security and AI to name a few. Combined, they offer the chance to learn from the best across our different countries.
Job Description
•	Analyze and understand business and technical requirements and work with clients across different domains and industries
•	Produce high-quality design deliverables that describes how the solution will accommodate business and technical requirements
•	Design, develop, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code using best practices
•	Conduct continuous unit and manual testing and deliver high quality solutions
•	Identify bottlenecks and bugs, and devise solutions to troubleshoot and address issues
•	Work and collaborate in an agile international environment with experienced and skilled colleagues in Vietnam and Europe
•	Plan and organize your own work and accurately report issues and progress in a timely manner
•	Identify areas for own personal development

•	Bachelor's or Master's degree within a relevant IT specialization
•	Good English skills both in writing and verbally
•	Basic understanding of and practical experience with object-oriented programming and data modelling
•	Familiar with various design, architectural patterns and modern system development
•	Open towards and able to quickly learn new technologies
•	Ability to work both independently and collaboratively as part of an international team
•	Professional pro-active attitude, taking responsibility and initiative
•	Effectively estimate work and produce deliverables on time
Recruitment process:
- Phone Screening (English Proficiency Test): Once your application is reviewed and meets the qualifications, the Recruitment Team will reach out to you via phone for a discussion. Please note, you may receive a call from an unknown number after submitting your application.
- In-person Interview (Conducted in English, 2 Hours): The interview will take place at our office and will be conducted entirely in English. The session will be divided into two parts: Introduction round and Technical round.

job_title: TMO - Chuyên Gia Cao Cấp Thiết Kế & Quản Lý Hành Trình KH (Digital Sales/MKT)
full_text_jd:
MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC:
1. Xây dựng chiến lược Digital Sales & Marketing:
Phát triển chiến lược Digital Sales & Marketing tích hợp vào nền tảng New Digital Engagement Platform nhằm:
• Thu hút khách hàng mới (customer acquisition).
• Gia tăng doanh số từ các sản phẩm số: thẻ, vay online, bảo hiểm, đầu tư…
• Tăng trưởng các giao dịch trên nền tảng số (cross-sell, up-sell).
Xây dựng Omni-channel Marketing Strategy đồng bộ qua các kênh:
• Website, App, Social Media (Facebook, Zalo, TikTok, LinkedIn).
• Email Marketing: cá nhân hóa nội dung theo hành vi người dùng.
• Push Notification & In-app Messaging: tối ưu hóa trải nghiệm người dùng trên nền tảng số.
• Lên kế hoạch triển khai các Digital Sales Campaigns gắn với từng hành trình số của khách hàng:
• Mở thẻ trực tuyến, giải ngân khoản vay online.
• Khuyến mãi kích hoạt thanh toán số, chuyển khoản liên ngân hàng…
2. Quản lý và tối ưu các kênh bán hàng số:
Theo dõi và tối ưu hiệu suất các kênh bán hàng số:
• SEO/SEM: Tối ưu từ khóa liên quan đến các sản phẩm số của ACB.
• Paid Ads (Google Ads, Facebook Ads): Quản lý ngân sách quảng cáo và đo lường ROI.
• Affiliate Marketing: Phát triển mạng lưới đối tác và KOLs để thúc đẩy doanh số số.
• Tích hợp các công cụ MarTech (Marketing Technology) vào NDEP:
• Customer Data Platform (CDP) để cá nhân hóa thông điệp quảng cáo.
• Marketing Automation Tools (HubSpot, Salesforce) để tự động hóa chiến dịch.
• A/B Testing Platforms để tối ưu nội dung và hành trình khách hàng.
3. Cá nhân hóa hành trình khách hàng số (Digital Customer Journey):
• Xây dựng các Personalized Digital Journeys
• Tùy chỉnh nội dung và ưu đãi theo hành vi và sở thích của từng nhóm khách hàng.
• Triển khai Real-time Offer: ưu đãi tự động kích hoạt dựa trên dữ liệu hành vi (ví dụ: hoàn tiền ngay khi khách sử dụng thẻ lần đầu).
• Phối hợp cùng đội CDP và CRM để phân khúc khách hàng và thực hiện các chiến dịch:
• Onboarding Campaign: thu hút và hướng dẫn khách hàng mới.
• Retention Campaign: duy trì khách hàng hiện tại bằng chương trình tri ân và ưu đãi đặc biệt.
4. Đo lường và phân tích hiệu quả chiến dịch:
Xây dựng Digital Sales Dashboard để giám sát các chỉ số quan trọng:
• Customer Acquisition Cost (CAC).
• Conversion Rate: tỷ lệ chuyển đổi từ khách hàng tiềm năng sang khách hàng thực tế.
• Return on Ad Spend (ROAS): đo lường lợi nhuận từ các chiến dịch quảng cáo.
Sử dụng các công cụ phân tích dữ liệu:
• Google Analytics: theo dõi luồng truy cập và hành vi trên website/app.
• Power BI: trực quan hóa dữ liệu về hiệu suất bán hàng và marketing.
• Heatmaps (Hotjar) để phân tích cách người dùng tương tác với nền tảng.
• Báo cáo định kỳ cho Giám Đốc Dự Án và các bên liên quan về hiệu quả của các chiến dịch Digital Sales & Marketing.
5. Phối hợp với các đội nhóm trong dự án:
Làm việc chặt chẽ với các nhóm:
• Product Owners: điều chỉnh chiến dịch phù hợp với các tính năng mới của NDEP.
• Solution Architects: đảm bảo các công cụ MarTech tích hợp liền mạch vào hệ thống.
• Risk Team: kiểm soát rủi ro liên quan đến quảng cáo sai lệch, bảo mật dữ liệu khách hàng.
• Hỗ trợ đội nội dung và thiết kế trong việc tạo ra các tài liệu marketing, landing pages và quảng cáo số.

• Học vấn: Tốt nghiệp đại học các ngành Marketing, Thương mại điện tử, Quản trị kinh doanh hoặc Công nghệ thông tin.
• Kinh nghiệm:
• Ít nhất 5 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực Digital Sales/Marketing, ưu tiên các dự án fintech, ngân hàng số, hoặc thương mại điện tử.
• Kinh nghiệm triển khai các chiến dịch quảng cáo cho sản phẩm tài chính (thẻ, vay, bảo hiểm).
• Kỹ năng chuyên môn:
• Am hiểu các nền tảng Digital Marketing: Google Ads, Facebook Ads, Zalo Ads.
• Thành thạo công cụ phân tích dữ liệu: Google Analytics, Power BI.
• Kỹ năng tối ưu hóa công cụ tìm kiếm (SEO) và chạy quảng cáo (SEM).
• Kinh nghiệm về các công cụ Marketing Automation và Customer Data Platforms (CDP).
• Chứng chỉ (ưu tiên):
• Google Ads Certification.
• Meta Certified Digital Marketing Associate.
• Chứng chỉ về Marketing Automation Tools (HubSpot, Salesforce).
• Ngoại ngữ: Sử dụng tiếng Anh tốt để làm việc với các đối tác công nghệ và phân tích tài liệu quốc tế.

company: Bosch Global Software Technologies Company Limited
full_text_jd:
- Develop, maintain and execute automation test cases for major projects, maintenance, and emergency releases
- Design and implement automation tests scripts, debug and define corrective actions
- Identify, analyze and report test results

job_title: Nhân Viên Phân Tích Nghiệp Vụ Sản Phẩm ( Business Analyst )
company: Công Ty TNHH Thiết Bị Minh Tâm (Mitalab Co., Ltd)
full_text_jd:
• Làm việc với vai trò là BA để phân tích những nhu cầu cần cho các giải pháp trên nền tảng sản phẩm Web/Windows và Mobile phục vụ đa dạng theo nhu cầu khách hàng
• Làm việc với khách hàng để thu thập, phân tích và làm rõ các nhu cầu chức năng sản phẩm cũng như các vấn đề từ khách hàng. Tư vấn, giới thiệu các giải pháp có thể đáp ứng nhu cầu KH
• Chuyển thể yêu cầu khách hàng thành giải pháp mà đội ngũ có thể thích ứng và chấp nhận được cũng như phù hợp với yêu cầu thời gian ra sản phẩm
• Làm việc với đội ngũ phát triển để phân tích, đề xuất các giải pháp dựa trên thông tin thống nhất với KH, đi đến thỏa thuận hoặc ký hợp đồng,
• Làm và quản lý các tài liệu để có thể trình chiếu cũng như hướng dẫn cho đội ngũ và khách hàng
• Đóng vai trò là góc nhìn người sử dụng để xây dựng và hoàn thiện sản phẩm
• Thực hiện các nhiệm vụ khác liên quan đến hoạt động của phòng

- Đại học, Cao đẳng thuộc Công nghệ thông tin hoặc tương đương
- Có từ 6 tháng kinh nghiệm phân tích nghiệp vụ sản phẩm, phân tích số liệu
- Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng, vận hành các phần mềm, giải pháp liên quan tới vị trí nghành y tế, xét nghiệm và khám bệnh là 1 lợi thế
- Kiến thức cơ bản về Công nghệ trong phân tích nghiệp vụ
- Cẩn thận, tỉ mỉ, đam mê với công việc, đặc biệt quan tâm đến ngành y tế, Thiết bị xét nghiệm
- Làm việc độc lập, theo nhóm và có khả năng chịu áp lực cao với tiến
độ công việc
- Sẵn sàng làm thêm giờ khi phát sinh yêu cầu.

Key Responsibilities
1. Responsible for MES system management.
2. Analyze program problems and hand-on troubleshooting
3. Gather business requirements and design a solution with global MES team

1. Educational background:

2. Experiences:
• Experience in Java development
• Experience of C# and VB.net development

• Knowledge of advanced java/jsp skills
• Programming language: java/jsp – required, c#.net/vb.net/Kotlin/Python - optional
• Basic knowledge of RDBMS and SQL

job_title: TMO - Chuyên Gia Phát Triển Hệ Thống
full_text_jd:
MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC:
Phát triển và tích hợp hệ thống:
•   Tham gia vào quá trình xây dựng và triển khai nền tảng New Digital Engagement
Platform (NDEP), tập trung vào việc phát triển:
•   Microservices để xử lý dữ liệu khách hàng, tối ưu hành trình người dùng (Customer
Journey).
•   Real-time APIs cho phép tương tác tức thời giữa các kênh như mobile app, website,
chatbot…
•   Data Pipelines tích hợp dữ liệu giữa các hệ thống nội bộ (Core Banking, CRM, CDP,
DWH) và các công cụ bên ngoài (Adobe Experience Platform, Salesforce Marketing
Cloud, Braze…).
•   Phát triển các event-driven workflows bằng cách sử dụng các công nghệ như Kafka,
AWS EventBridge nhằm thu thập và phản hồi dữ liệu khách hàng theo thời gian thực.
•   Tích hợp các giải pháp AI/ML (Recommendation Engines, Predictive Analytics) để cá
nhân hóa nội dung và tương tác người dùng.
Xây dựng và tối ưu hóa APIs:
•   Thiết kế và phát triển các RESTful APIs, GraphQL để hỗ trợ trao đổi dữ liệu nhanh
chóng và bảo mật giữa NDEP và các hệ thống ngân hàng.
•   Tối ưu API Gateway (Kong, Apigee) để đảm bảo hiệu suất và khả năng mở rộng của
hệ thống.
•   Triển khai các cơ chế bảo mật cho API: OAuth2, JWT, Mutual TLS (mTLS).
•   Viết tài liệu API chi tiết cho các đội nhóm khác sử dụng và tích hợp vào hệ thống.
Phát triển giao diện và trải nghiệm người dùng (Frontend):
•   Xây dựng các thành phần giao diện linh hoạt theo kiến trúc Headless CMS để đảm
bảo khả năng tùy chỉnh nội dung số trên đa kênh (web, mobile, chatbot…).
•   Sử dụng các framework hiện đại như React, Angular, Vue.js để tạo ra các giao diện
tương tác mượt mà, đáp ứng theo thời gian thực.
•   Tích hợp các công cụ A/B Testing và Dynamic Content Engines để tối ưu hóa trải
nghiệm khách hàng.
Quản lý dữ liệu và tối ưu hiệu suất:
•   Xây dựng các Real-time Data Pipelines sử dụng Apache Kafka, Google Pub/Sub để
xử lý và phân tích dữ liệu khách hàng ngay khi phát sinh.
•   Tối ưu truy vấn dữ liệu, đảm bảo khả năng xử lý khối lượng lớn thông qua NoSQL
databases (MongoDB, Cassandra) và In-memory Databases (Redis).
•   Phát triển các giải pháp caching và load balancing để cải thiện tốc độ phản hồi hệ
thống.
CI/CD và DevOps:
•   Xây dựng các pipeline CI/CD (Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD) để tự động hóa quy trình build,
test, deploy.
•   Phối hợp với đội ngũ DevOps để triển khai giải pháp container hóa (Docker,
Kubernetes) và giám sát hiệu năng hệ thống (Prometheus, Grafana).
•   Thực hiện kiểm thử hiệu năng (load test, stress test) nhằm đảm bảo nền tảng có khả
năng mở rộng và vận hành ổn định.

YÊU CẦU:
•   Tốt nghiệp đại học các ngành Công nghệ thông tin, Khoa học máy tính, Kỹ thuật phần mềm hoặc tương đương.
•   Tối thiểu 3-5 năm kinh nghiệm trong phát triển phần mềm, ưu tiên các dự án liên quan đến ngân hàng số, fintech, hoặc các nền tảng Digital Engagement.
•   Có kinh nghiệm trong phát triển microservices, event-driven systems, và tích hợp các nền tảng CDP, CRM.
•   Thành thạo ít nhất một ngôn ngữ lập trình: Java, Node.js, Python, Golang.
•   Kinh nghiệm với các công cụ và framework frontend: React, Angular, Vue.js.
•   Am hiểu về các công nghệ API: RESTful, GraphQL, gRPC.
•   Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với cơ sở dữ liệu SQL (PostgreSQL, MySQL) và NoSQL (MongoDB, Cassandra).
•   Công nghệ ưu tiên:
•   Hiểu biết về các nền tảng Customer Data Platform (CDP) như Adobe Experience Platform, Salesforce CDP.
•   Kinh nghiệm sử dụng các công cụ Kafka, RabbitMQ cho hệ thống xử lý sự kiện theo thời gian thực.
•   Có kinh nghiệm triển khai containerization (Docker, Kubernetes).
•   Chứng chỉ (ưu tiên):
•   AWS Certified Developer hoặc tương đương.
•   Chứng chỉ liên quan đến Adobe Experience Platform, Salesforce Marketing Cloud là lợi thế.
•   Ngoại ngữ: Sử dụng tiếng Anh tốt, đặc biệt là trong giao tiếp kỹ thuật và viết tài liệu.

company: Công Ty TNHH Expeditors Việt Nam
full_text_jd:
Expeditors is a global logistics company headquartered in Seattle, Washington. As a Fortune 500 company, we employ over 19,000 trained professionals in a worldwide network of over 350 locations across six continents. Expeditors' promise, "You'd be surprised how far we'll go for you." is not mere hype; it is our commitment to go beyond the expectations of what companies need from a global logistics provider. Our culture is about exceeding our customers' expectations and providing a place for our employees to make a career.
Expeditors Ho Chi Minh City is recruiting Assistant Manager/ Manager – Information Services as below:
Job Description:
Summary Description
To execute regular information services (IS) basic tasks, to keep the system up and running, to ensure adherence to the company’s policies and procedures, to display and communicate the Company’s culture, to protect the Network, to train branch management on system architecture, data management, retention and reporting, other available IT tools and also to identify, lead and facilitate process improvements through improved efficiencies and quality of existing processes, to reflect in a significant productivity and customer service improvement.
Responsibilities & Duties:
•	Manage, coach, and develop the IS Team.
•	Have a fundamental understanding of Expeditors Operational Systems, including ETMS (Aborts, FORMS, AIRRTS, CLIENT, INFO, CLONE and Models, PECAN, ALERTS), EIFA, ECMS, AND EDMS
•	Applications Support Helpdesk
•	Basic Branch Technical Support such PC, LAN, Expeditors Software and systems administration and troubleshooting, in addition to global, regional and branch projects implementation.
•	Maintain IS network and infrastructure
•	On call for afterhours IS issues including DAYEND problems.
•	Monitors Systems Backup.
•	Assets Management such as Purchasing, Shipping, Tracking, Maintenance.
•	Responsible for compliance with Expeditors FAST procedures related to IS and Conduct regular branch IS Audits.
•	Closely liaise operations with Regional IS to assist and support with System related issues.
•	Regular communication with Regional IS Manager and District Manager.
•	Offers suggestions and comments to Regional IS Manager for system improvements.
•	Support District disaster recovery efforts as they occur.
•	Assists District Manager with preparation of the department budget.
•	Prepares and executes the tactical business plan for the IS department.
•	Trains branch management on system architecture, data management, retention and reporting, and other available IT tools.
•	Deliver IS training courses within the district.
•	Helps to increase branch productivity by identifying processes that could be improved or automated and by developing an approved solution for them.
•	Setting and modifying internal reports
•	Implements IS related Projects that do not belong to a specific Product
•	Internal and External EDI Support (i.e. AMS with US customs, EDI with third-party customs authorities, EDI with carriers…)
•	Provides technical assistance to clients.
•	Be supportive and actively participate in Sales calls where needed and appropriate.
•	Set up a list of target customers with sales.
•	Attend sales meetings to coordinate the transition of new business/updates on existing business and schedule joint calls.
•	Initiate and follow up independently on IS projects with Clients such as EDI, Expo, barcode scanning into Expeditors Operation Systems, eg. EDMS, ETMS and customer reports.
•	Train Sales people on systems features and benefits.
•	Closely liaise Sales and Account Managers with Regional IS to assist and support Request for Quotation (RFQ) and Request for Information (RFI) related with IS.
•	Build strong relationships with the IS vendors
•	Evaluate IS vendors on a regular basis
•	Identify and develop your No. 2 for succession planning.

Qualifications:
•	University graduate with minimum 5 years relevant experience in information technology in an international business environment.
•	PC and network skills
•	Programming skills would be a plus.
•	Effective problem-solving skills and ability to handle multiple tasks/projects at the same time.
•	Effective communication skills, including abilities to listen, comprehend, effectively communicate clearly and concisely in both oral and written to obtain positive results.
•	Ability to conduct briefing and training.
•	Proactive and taking initiatives.
•	Proven leadership attitude and skills.
•	Demonstrated ability to work in a team, including leading and contributing.
•	Ability to articulate a message so that decision makers will buy in to change.
•	Ability to relate to clients, suppliers and employees at all levels of the company.
•	Fluent in English.
Additional Information
•	Full time job contract
•	Competitive salary
•	Career development and promotion opportunity
•	Professional Training Plan
•	Health insurance program
•	Professional of working environment
•	14 annual leave days per year

job_title: Nhân Viên IT Hệ Thống Sản Xuất
full_text_jd:
SEI ELECTRONIC COMPONENTS (VIETNAM), LTD
. có trụ sở tại C-6, Khu Công Nghiệp Thăng Long, Đông Anh, Hà Nội, là công ty 100% vốn của Nhật Bản thành lập từ năm 2012, hiện thuộc tập đoàn Sumitomo Electric Industries, Ltd., chuyên sản xuất, kinh doanh và gia công Bảng vi mạch dẻo và các linh kiện điện tử khác có liên quan.
Hiện tại, chúng tôi đang tìm kiếm ứng viên tài năng cho vị trí Nhân viên IT hệ thống sản xuất với những nhiệm vụ chính sau:
Trách nhiệm chính:
•	Xử lý sự cố cho hệ thống Sản xuất và hệ thống Văn phòng
•	Xử lý sự cố và hỗ trợ Mạng, Máy tính, Máy in, Camera CCTV
•	Xử lý sự cố và kiểm tra máy chủ Sản xuất và máy chủ văn phòng.
•	Theo dõi kế hoạch Sản xuất và hỗ trợ sản xuất

Yêu cầu chi tiết: Kiến thức, kinh nghiệm, kỹ năng (Các yêu cầu cụ thể: Học vấn/Kinh nghiệm/Kỹ năng):
•	Tốt nghiệp đại học hoặc cao đẳng hoặc các chuyên ngành liên quan đến công nghệ thông tin
•	Biết lập trình và SQL là một lợi thế.
Yêu cầu cụ thể:
•	Có thể làm việc theo ca
Phúc lợi
Chế độ lương thưởng:
•	Lương: Mức lương cạnh tranh, dựa trên năng lực của ứng viên
•	Thưởng tháng 13
•	Thưởng thâm niên và thưởng vào các dịp lễ, Tết cuối năm.
Các chế độ khác:
•	Khi trở thành nhân viên chính thức của công ty, nhân viên sẽ được hưởng đầy đủ các chế độ phúc lợi theo quy định của Luật Lao động Việt Nam.
•	Công ty cung cấp dịch vụ bữa ăn công nghiệp và cấp phát đồng phục.
•	Xe đưa đón theo chính sách công ty tại các khu vực xung quanh.
•	12 ngày nghỉ phép/năm.
•	Bảo hiểm y tế theo quy định của pháp luật.
•	Tham gia công đoàn và nhiều hoạt động ý nghĩa khác.
•	Du lịch công ty, tiệc cuối năm, giải bóng đá nam/nữ,... hàng năm.
•	Bảo hiểm tai nạn 24/7
•	Đi làm một Thứ Bảy/ tháng (8h-14h40)

Main Responsibilities
- Build HR data/models/reports, such as Recruitment, Headcount, Salary, Budget, etc.
- Develop reports/dashboards using BI tools, Excel, PowerPoint, etc., to support data management/ analysis.
- Prepare periodic or ad-hoc reports and analyses. Ensure timeliness, accuracy, and compliance with reports.
- Regularly check, update, and supplement data for report analysis, ensuring data accuracy.
- Utilize data visualization programs, tools, and techniques to create dashboards, reports, and presentations.
- Analyze data to extract insights and forecast upcoming trends.
- Efficiently execute and compile reports as required.
1. Data Collection, Processing, and Analysis:
- Conduct research, design, develop, and administer the Company's databases.
- Collect and process data from various sources related to reports to ensure data accuracy.
- Interact with relevant teams to clarify data analysis requirements, organize data for report and dashboard development, and provide appropriate analytical data.
- Develop and maintain BI reports and dashboards to monitor work progress.
- Verify data and ensure the quality of data used for analysis.
- Create interactive and visually appealing reports and data visualizations using Power BI tools
2. Data Analysis and Reporting:
- Design and maintain the company's reporting systems (HR Reports, - - Recruitment Reports, Budget Cost Reports, Headcount/Turnover/KPI Reports, etc.)
- Visualize data using Power BI, and analyze and present it in PowerPoint
- Analyze data to identify opportunities for improvement, optimize processes, and support strategic decision-making
- Propose solutions and improvements based on analytical reports to maximize the company's operational efficiency.
3. Strategy proposal and effectiveness evaluation:
- Provide strategic information and data analysis to support the Company in making effective work method decisions
- Propose strategies and actions based on insights gathered from data
- Evaluate the effectiveness of HR management strategies and specific features through data analysis and provide improvement recommendations
4. Other:
- Perform tasks to collect forms/processes for the development of Human Resources software
- Support the development of the Company's Human Resources software
- Perform other tasks as assigned.

A. General Requirements
- Gender
: Male/Female
- Age
: 25–40
- Education
: University degree
- Major
: Data Science, Applied Mathematics, Information Technology, or other related technical fields
- Experience
: At least 2 years in a data analyst or equivalent position
- English proficiency
: Good
- Computer skills
: Proficient in Power BI, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, etc.
- Other requirements
: Good translation skills, proficient in using Excel, ability to read and understand HR reports
- Preferred
: Candidates with experience in BI for HR are a plus
B. Skill Requirements
- Experience in BI for HR is an advantage
- In-depth knowledge of database management systems such as Power BI or similar tools
- Strong analytical skills and ability to present information clearly in reports and presentations
- Ability to plan, organize work, be creative and proactive
C. Attitude Requirements
- Sense of responsibility
- Discipline and compliance
- Friendly
- Enthusiastic and open-minded
- Able to work well under pressure
*** Benefits:
- Compulsory Insurance (HI, SI, UI) and Personal Tax are covered by VAS.
- 13th monthly salary and KPIs bonus
- Lunch at school, Tet gift, ….
- Staff will get 50% discount of tuition for 2 children (other fees such as meal fee, school bus fee, expenses for textbooks, uniforms, extra curricula activities, entrance test fee,… are still applied as stipulated)
- Annual Company trip, Team building
- Working in professional environment

1. PURPOSE:
Business Analyst (BA) is responsible for contributing to meeting user commitments according to plan. The Business Analyst is responsible for:
•	Assisting users in defining business requirements to meet their business goals
•	Preparing business specification documents
•	Conducting system tests & user acceptance tests
•	Carrying our day-to-day applications and operations support
•	Double hat as a Business Analyst (BA) and Project Manager (PM) in planning/managing resources to implement the software enhancements and/or special projects as assigned
2. ACCOUNTABILITIES:
- Utilizes knowledge of both the life insurance industry and current company life system functionality by writing business specifications and performs various validity testing.
- Consults with users to define needs or problem areas and determine scope of investigation required to recommend possible solutions.
- Develop test plans and test cases.
- Executes test plans independently or in conjunction with the user.
- Contributes to the resolution of common system problems.
- Assists with user on-the-job training/team members on basic functional components.
- Participates and contributes during studies and/or gap analysis to identify functional gaps between the user’s current processes and current company systems’ functionality.
- Analyzes data to determine solutions to system processing according to the user’s business requirements.
- Provide day-to-day applications and operations supervision.
- Implement special projects as assigned
- The accountabilities and time allocated for work portfolio will be customized depending on the business priorities periodically, and direct manager’s assignment

1. Education, no. of year experience:
•	A university degree/college diploma in Business/Computing, or equivalent business experience
•	Have over 5 years of experience in life insurance/financial business/business analysis
2. Technical skills:
•	Basic knowledge of data base: MSSQL or MySQL or DB2
•	Computer literate in office suite of products (word, spreadsheet, flowchart, presentation etc.)
•	Demonstrates basic knowledge of Data Architecture of system and basic SQL.
•	Understanding of applications interfaces between life system and other corporate systems
3. Soft skills:
•	Customer service mindset
•	Good analytical skills and attentive to details
•	Analytical thinking and a fast learner
•	Able to work under pressure and meet tight deadlines
•	Excellent interpersonal and communication skills
•	Good command of spoken and written, reading English (required)
•	Good resource planning/management skills
4. Personal attributes
•	Good team player, independent and result-oriented
•	Flexible and open to changes
