job_title: Ad Operations & Performance Marketing Specialist (Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam)
full_text_jd:
Ad Operations & Performance Marketing Specialist (Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam)
DFO Global Performance Commerce (GPC)
**Ready to Ignite the Future of Ad Tech?
Join GPC and Spark Your Career in Vietnam’s Most Exciting Tech Hub!**
About Us
DFO Global Performance Commerce (GPC) is a world-class leader in advertising technology and performance marketing. Our international team thrives on pushing boundaries, innovating with cutting-edge tools, and delivering stellar results for brands across the globe. Now, we’re looking for an Ad Operations & Performance Marketing Specialist in Ho Chi Minh City to help take our campaigns—and your career—to new heights.
Your Mission
• Launch & Turbocharge Campaigns: Design e-commerce and lead-gen campaigns across multiple platforms, ensuring they shine in a crowded market.
• Optimize for Victory: Harness data-driven insights to maximize ROI, refine strategies, and crush performance targets.
• Tech Forward: Use HTML, CSS, and basic JavaScript to update landing pages and email creatives on the fly. Supercharge funnels with CTRWOW to boost CTR and CVR.
• Leverage AI: Offload routine tasks (campaign setup, bid automation, creative updates) to AI, so you can focus on next-level optimization and strategy.
• Data Mastery: Transform raw metrics from Everflow, Google Analytics, CRMs, and Shopify into crystal-clear insights, fueling ongoing growth and innovation.

What You Bring
● Data Wizardry: Proficient in reporting tools and data visualization, turning numbers into actionable intel.
● Tech Chops: Solid grasp of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript (Python is a bonus).
● Clear Communicator: Comfortably explain technical details to non-technical teams.
● Detail Dynamo: You catch every detail to ensure campaigns align with KPIs and uphold brand standards.
Why GPC in Ho Chi Minh City?
● Fast-Tracked Success: Collaborate with global mentors at the forefront of ad tech and performance marketing.
● Dynamic Growth Path: Grow your expertise across marketing, technical execution, and strategic analytics.
● Cutting-Edge Culture: Join a diverse, high-energy team that values integrity, creativity, and big ideas.
● Vibrant Lifestyle: Thrive in Ho Chi Minh’s fast-paced tech scene—enjoy its rich culture, amazing food, and endless opportunities for adventure.
Ready to Launch Your Next Big Adventure?
If you’re eager to redefine Ad Operations & Performance Marketing—supercharging results with AI tools, strategic insights, and relentless optimization—apply now and help shape the future of global performance commerce!

job_title: Urgent - Assistant BA to the CIO (Innovation & AI Projects)
full_text_jd:
Overview:
We are seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Assistant to the CIO who will act as a strategic partner and operational coordinator. In this role, you will work closely with the CIO and collaborate with a Software Technology Center and nine subsidiary companies. A key focus will be supporting AI-driven and innovation-focused projects aimed at delivering breakthrough solutions with a positive societal impact.
The ideal candidate is passionate about digital transformation and emerging technologies, particularly Artificial Intelligence and advanced analytics.
Key Responsibilities:
Strategic Coordination & Reporting
•	Gather, consolidate, and analyze information from the Software Technology Center and nine subsidiaries regarding ongoing AI and innovation projects, providing regular reports to the CIO.
•	Work with managers and cross-functional teams to track project milestones, resolve roadblocks, and propose actionable solutions leveraging cutting-edge AI methodologies.
•	Attend high-level strategic meetings on innovation, capture key insights, and document action items to ensure effective follow-up.
AI & Innovation Project Support
•	Assist the CIO in identifying and evaluating AI solutions that enhance operational efficiency, predictive analytics, and new business opportunities.
•	Coordinate meetings with data scientists, AI engineers, and stakeholders to gather technical requirements, assess feasibility, and align resources.
•	Stay updated on global AI trends, emerging technologies, and best practices, compiling research summaries to inform decision-making and innovation strategies.
Communications & Stakeholder Management
•	Serve as a key communication bridge between the CIO and internal/external partners, including startups, research institutes, and technology solution providers.
•	Build and maintain strong relationships with cross-functional teams to enhance collaboration, knowledge sharing, and information flow.
•	Manage agreements, Memorandums of Understanding (MOUs), and legal documentation for AI partnerships and innovation initiatives.
Project Planning & Management
•	Organize and manage the CIO’s calendar, particularly for AI symposiums, tech conferences, innovation roundtables, and strategy sessions.
•	Ensure timely preparation of background materials, project briefs, and status updates, enabling the CIO to make well-informed decisions.
•	Maintain structured reporting for AI pilot projects, Proofs of Concept (PoCs), and related innovation programs.

Qualifications & Skills:
•	Experience:
Minimum 2 years in project coordination, executive assistance, or program management, preferably with exposure to technology, AI, or digital innovation.
•	Education:
Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Business Administration, Computer Science, or a related field.
•	Technical Knowledge:
Familiarity with the software development lifecycle (SDLC) and foundational AI/ML concepts. Exposure to data analytics, cloud computing, or automation tools is a plus.
•	Language Proficiency:
Excellent English communication skills (spoken, written, and presentation). Proficiency in Chinese is a strong advantage.
•	Competencies:
Exceptional organizational and time-management skills, strong problem-solving abilities, and the ability to thrive in a fast-paced, evolving environment. Proficiency in MS Office and project management tools (e.g., Jira, Trello, Asana) is preferred.
•	Personal Attributes:
Proactive, adaptable, and detail-oriented, with a strong sense of ownership. Passion for AI and technological innovation.
Benefits & Growth Opportunities:
•	Competitive compensation package with performance-based incentives.
•	Direct involvement in AI-driven innovation projects, working alongside experts in data science, software development, and technology management.
•	Opportunity to contribute to groundbreaking solutions that drive organizational and societal impact.
•	Clear career growth path, with potential advancement to roles such as Project Manager or Innovation Specialist.
•	Comprehensive benefits, including health insurance, paid time off, and professional development programs

4. Tìm hiểu, nghiên cứu các quy định của cơ quan quản lý về CNTT, từ đó thực thi, áp dụng vào các nội dung công việc có liên quan.

4. Kỹ năng giao tiếp tốt, giao tiếp Tiếng Trung lưu loát.

company: Rapid Aid Viet Nam Co., Ltd.
full_text_jd:
Position Overview:
The IT Support Technician is responsible for providing technical support to end-users, for computer systems, hardware, software and related technology, troubleshooting and maintaining computer systems and networks issues. IT Support Technician role ensures that technology resources are functioning efficiently and effectively to support organizational operations.IT Support Technician will also be supporting Production & Maintenance in the Operations Department.
Duties and Responsibilities:
1.	Technical Support:
o	Provide first-line technical support to end-users via phone, email, or in person.
o	Diagnose and resolve hardware, software, and network issues.
o	Assist with the installation, configuration, and updating of software and hardware.
o	Provide after-hours support, as needed
2.	Hardware and Software Maintenance:
o	Install, configure, and maintain desktops, laptops, printers, and other peripherals.
o	Perform routine maintenance and repairs on computer systems and equipment.
o	Replace or repair faulty hardware components.
3.	System Maintenance:
o	Assist with user account management.
o	Install and configure operating systems and software applications.
o	Apply system updates, patches, and security configurations.
4.	Network Support:
o	Assist in troubleshooting network connectivity issues.
o	Monitor network performance and assist in optimizing network infrastructure.
o	Set up and configure network devices such as routers, switches, and access points.
5.	User Training and Documentation:
o	Train end-users on how to use hardware, software, and systems effectively.
o	Create and maintain documentation for IT processes, troubleshooting guides, and user manuals.
6.	Security and Backup:
o	Implement and maintain data backup and recovery procedures.
o	Ensure systems are protected against viruses, malware, and other security threats.
o	Monitor and respond to security incidents.
7.	Inventory Maintain:
o	Maintain an inventory of IT assets, including hardware, software, and licenses.
o	Track and manage IT equipment requests and replacements
8.	Support Production & Maintenance:
o	Support Maintenance.
o	Support Production.
9.	Adaptability & Growth:
1.	Take on new tasks and responsibilities as business needs evolve.
2.	Contribute to process improvements and efficiency enhancements.
3.	Stay updated on industry trends and emerging technologies to enhance IT support capabilities.

Skills and Qualifications:
•	Strong knowledge of computer hardware, software and operating systems
o	Windows 10/11
o	Microsoft Office / Microsoft 365
•	Exposure to networking concepts (TCP/iP, DHCP, DNS)
•	Microsoft Business Central (Cloud) experience a strong asset
•	Power BI reporting experience a strong asset

OBJECTIVES
• Senior Data Governance Specialist works under the guidance of Head of Data Architecture & Governance Department to ensure ongoing monitoring and remediation of data to meet data quality targets in accordance to the company data architecture and also ensures that data comply with data management strategies, policies, and standards.
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
• Work on the daily tasks assigned by Head of Data Architecture & Governance Department
• Participate in the design and creation of master data management, data quality, and data integration strategies and solutions to improve the quality of critical business data
• Develop & implement processes to continuously monitor data quality. Ensure that the data meets appropriate standards for completeness, accuracy, validity, timelines and relevance for intended use
• Perform data reconciliation and check the data from time to time to ensure correct data
• Work with business data owners and users to establish data quality metrics & thresholds
• Monitor and measure data quality across line of business and improvement opportunities
• Utilize data profiling and data quality tools as well as various data sources to uncover and determine root causes of data quality issues
• Support other Business Units in implementation of data quality errors remediation plan
• Prepare data quality report and communicate result with relevant Business Units, provide periodic (weekly, monthly) reports related to tactical data quality issue meetings and tracking communication

REQUIREMENTS
Education
University degree holder, preferably in IT areas
Experience
At least 3+ years’ experience in Data Governance, Data Quality or Data Management preferable in Financial Services
Skills
Hands on experience in data governance and quality framework and good skills in the areas of data profiling, monitoring and data change/issue management processes
Experience with data governance/ profiling tools
Good in building Data Quality dashboards
Ability to perform root cause analysis
Have a solid knowledge of IBM, Oracle, JIRA, etc
Good oral and written communication, planning and decision-making skills
Possess analytical and problem-solving skills
Strong time management skill

-	Xử lý các vấn đề ở mức độ trung bình đến phức tạp trong quá trình phát triển, vận hành các hệ thống được giao bao gồm các vấn đề, rủi ro thuộc chuyên môn, nghiệp vụ trên cơ sở vận dụng linh hoạt các quy trình, quy định để phân tích, lựa chọn phương án phù hợp.

-	Kiến thức pháp luật: Có kiến thức chung về các quy định pháp luật, quy định của Ngân hàng Nhà nước, Công ty có liên quan đến chuyên môn nghiệp vụ được phân công.

-	Trình độ tin học: Sử dụng thành thạo các tính năng của các ứng dụng, phần mềm phục vụ chuyên môn, nghiệp vụ/các trang thiết bị, công cụ, dụng cụ phục vụ công việc.
-	Kỹ năng lập kế hoạch: Có khả năng lập kế hoạch thực hiện công việc cá nhân.
-	Kỹ năng giải quyết vấn đề: Có khả năng xử lý được các vấn đề (bao gồm các rủi ro) thuộc chuyên môn, nghiệp vụ trên cơ sở vận dụng linh hoạt các quy trình, quy định để phân tích, lựa chọn phương án phù hợp.
-	Kỹ năng giao tiếp: Có khả năng trình bày, trao đổi thông tin, phối hợp giải quyết công việc hiệu quả.
-	Kỹ năng thiết lập quan hệ: Có khả năng thiết lập và duy trì quan hệ đồng nghiệp tốt.
-	Kỹ năng làm việc nhóm: Có khả năng phối hợp, tích cực tham gia công việc nhóm theo phân công.
-	Kỹ năng quản lý dự án: Có khả năng tham gia, phối hợp trong các công đoạn của dự án.
-	Năng lực tự học hỏi: Có khả năng tự học hỏi, nâng cao chuyên môn, nghiệp vụ.
-	Năng lực xây dựng chính sách, quy định: Có khả năng tham gia ý kiến xây dựng, rà soát các quy trình, quy định thuộc chuyên môn, nghiệp vụ được phân công.
-	Năng lực xử lý thông tin: Có khả năng tổng hợp, phân tích, xử lý thông tin, số liệu và lập báo cáo.
-	Năng lực thích nghi với sự thay đổi: Có khả năng chủ động thích ứng và điều chỉnh linh hoạt, phù hợp theo những thay đổi trong môi trường làm việc.
-	Năng lực chịu áp lực: Có khả năng làm việc dưới áp lực trung bình (có khả năng hoàn thành tốt các công việc đòi hỏi phải linh hoạt trong việc áp dụng các quy trình, quy định và/hoặc phối hợp với các nhóm chuyên môn khác nhau hoặc các công việc có giai đoạn cao điểm về tiến độ và/hoặc khối lượng công việc).
•	Thái độ/Hành vi:
-	Thái độ hòa nhã, đúng mực, tác phong làm việc phù hợp với văn hóa doanh nghiệp.
-	Ý thức tuân thủ tốt, lối sống lành mạnh, trung thực.
-	Tích cực tham gia hoạt động, phong trào tập thể.

company: Công Ty TNHH LEGO Manufacturing Việt Nam
full_text_jd:
We are looking for an IT Service Specialist to support our colleagues at the LEGO Manufacturing Vietnam factory. If you have a passion for technology, are a confident independent operator, and have a keen eye for nurturing relationships with colleagues and Factory Operations Team members at all levels, all while delivering the best possible service, we want to hear from you!
* Internal Job Title: Tech Service Specialist
*We think it’s important that you’re in control of your data and as part of the recruitment process; Your direct application at the LEGO Careers Website will be prioritized. Please copy and paste the following URL into your browser for your application:
https://www.lego.com/en-us/careers/job/it-service-specialist-d3a0dcd60b1d100104d53d4ea22a0000
Core Responsibilities:
• Advanced hardware troubleshooting: knowledge of computer hardware components, diagnostics tools, and advanced troubleshooting techniques to resolve complex hardware issues.
• Operating systems: Proficiency in various operating systems such as Windows and macOS, including advanced configuration, system optimization, and troubleshooting.
• Software applications: Knowledge of O365 and its components. Being able to create simple Low Code/No Code solutions. Understand main concepts of APIs.
• Networking: Advanced knowledge of network architecture, protocols, routing, switching, firewalls, VPN, and other network technologies to troubleshoot complex network issues.
• ITSM knowledge: Active knowledge of ITIL and Agile.
• Security awareness: Expertise in IT security practices, including vulnerability assessment, threat detection, incident response, and implementing security controls.
• Mobile devices: Familiarity with mobile operating systems (iOS, Android), basic troubleshooting, and configuration of mobile devices (smartphones, tablets).
• Remote support: Ability to provide remote assistance to end users using remote desktop tools or other remote support software.
• Cloud computing: Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure) and experience in managing cloud resources.
• Project management: Basic understanding of project management principles and experience in participating in IT projects, including planning, execution, and documentation.
Play your part in our team succeeding!
As part of the Global End-User Support organization, you will have the opportunity to help us to optimize the usage of business technologies to increase the productivity of The LEGO Group.
In the Global End-user Support team, I found very professional and motivated colleagues, working with Agile methodologies. I have not only learned a lot but also meet new friends in the company. It has been an amazing journey.

Do you have what it takes?
• Major in Computer Science or similar is preferred.
• Proficient knowledge of ITSM and IT infrastructure concepts.
• Expertise on one or more specific IT technical areas such as Active Directory, Microsoft Server environment, networking, ITIL or automation.
• At least 5 years of experience in the Information Technology field providing technical support to hardware and software.
• Data analytics and presentation documents skills.
• An outstanding service-oriented mindset.
• Open communication and international collaboration.
• Experience in manufacturing PC environment.
• Knowledge of IT infrastructure including structured cabling.
• Managing systems access to different level of data
• Data classification and confidentiality are critical.
• Good command of English
What’s in it for you?
Here are some of what to expect:
• Family Care Leave – We offer enhanced paid leave options for those important times.
• Insurances – All colleagues are covered by our life and disability insurance which provides protection and peace of mind.
• Wellness – We want you to be your best self, so you'll have access to the Headspace App and lots of wellbeing initiatives and programmes run by local teams where you are based.
• Colleague Discount – We know you'll love to build so from day 1 you will qualify for our generous colleague discount.
• Bonus – We do our best work to succeed together. When goals are reached and if eligible, you'll be rewarded through our bonus scheme.
• Your workplace – When you join the team you'll be assigned a primary workplace location i.e. one of our Offices, stores or factories. The hiring team will discuss the policy and role eligibility with you during the recruitment process.
Children are our role models. Their curiosity, creativity and imagination inspire everything we do. We strive to create a diverse, dynamic and inclusive culture of play at the LEGO Group, where everyone feels safe, valued and they belong.
The LEGO Group is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity and equal pay regardless of e.g. race, colour, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, disability or gender identity.
The LEGO Group is fully committed to Children’s Rights and Child Wellbeing across the globe. Candidates offered positions with high engagement with children are required to take part in Child Safeguarding Background Screening, as a condition of the offer.
Thank you for sharing our global commitment to Children’s Rights.
Just imagine building your dream career.
Then make it real.
Join the LEGO® team today.

FPT Software, a subsidiary of FPT Group, is a leading global IT service provider headquartered in Vietnam. With 33,000+ employees in 88 offices across 30 countries, we serve 1,100+ clients, including 96 Fortune 500 companies.
We believe diversity fuels innovation and strive to create an inclusive workplace where talents of all backgrounds thrive. We welcome expatriates and international professionals to bring fresh perspectives and help shape the future of technology.
JOB OVERVIEW
We are looking for a skilled C++ Linux Embedded Engineer
to work on the development of a Dash Cam system. The role involves working primarily with Linux and C++ on hardware platforms with SoC and Syscon. The engineer will develop and optimize software that integrates with D-bus Communication, SPI, WiFi communication, and streaming capabilities, ensuring robust performance and reliability.
RESPONSIBILITIES
• Develop and maintain embedded software for Dash Cam devices running on Linux with C++ Programming Language.
• Implement and optimize system-level features, including Power Control, G Sensor, Log System History, PWM, …, and process management.
• Work with Buildroot for system customization and optimization.
• Implement streaming features using LIVE555, ffmpeg
• Develop and maintain Linux services with D-Bus for interprocess communication.
• Ensure proper Process State (PPS) management.
• Utilize modern C++ (including Unique Pointer, Shared Pointer) and Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles to develop robust and efficient software.
• Be able to perform or work with Static Code Analysis tools.
• Ensure compliance with industry standards such as MISRA C++, C-Cert, and Complexity, Coverity analysis.
• Conduct debugging, testing, and validation of the software on embedded platforms and Linux Environment.
• Design and implement UML diagrams, including Block Diagram, Class Diagram, Activity Diagram, Sequence Diagram, State Machine Diagram, and Use Case.
• Create test specifications and execute Component Test, Unit Test, and Integration Test.
• Design detailed architecture and module specifications (Detail Design).
• Debug and analyze Linux services to ensure smooth operation.

• Strong C++ programming skills, including modern C++ (C++11 and later).
• Deep understanding of Linux-based embedded systems.
• Experience with Buildroot for embedded Linux system customization.
• Knowledge of SPI and WiFi communication protocols.
• Experience with streaming technologies, especially LIVE555.
• Understanding of Linux services, interprocess communication (D-Bus), and Process State (PPS) management.
• Familiarity with Power Control, G Sensor integration in embedded systems.
• Ability to design and work with UML diagrams (Block, Class, Activity, Sequence, State Machine, Use Case).
• Hands-on experience with MISRA C++, C-Cert for coding standards.
• Proficiency in static code analysis tools like Coverity.
• Experience in writing test specifications and performing test
• Strong debugging skills for Linux services and embedded applications.
• Experience in Detail Design for modular and scalable software architecture.
Nice to have:
• Experience developing software for Dash Cam or similar embedded camera systems.
• Knowledge of real-time operating systems (RTOS) in embedded applications.
• Familiarity with machine learning or AI-based image processing for Dash Cam applications.
• Experience with Agile development methodologies.
Experience Required for Quality Assurance:
• At least 3-5 years of experience in embedded Linux development with C++.
• Prior experience in embedded hardware platforms using SoC & Syscon.
• Experience with Dash Cam or similar embedded camera systems is a plus.
• Familiarity with Agile methodologies and working in a collaborative development environment.
WHAT COMPANY OFFERS
• Salary range: Negotiate
• Performance-based bonuses
• FPT Care insurance plan tailored for FPT employees
• Attractive annual summer vacation allowance
• Sponsored training courses for personal growth and up to 100% coverage for certification costs
• Global and inclusive workplace with monthly cross-cultural events
• International exposure and career growth across global locations
• Work-life balance benefits with a flexible leave policy and annual health check-ups to support employee well-being

job_title: SAP Cpi Module Consultant - Implementation or AMS
full_text_jd:
Are you ready to unleash your potential?
At Deloitte, our purpose is to make an impact that matters for our clients, our people, and the communities we serve.
We believe we have a responsibility to be a force for good, and WorldImpact is our portfolio of initiatives focused on making a tangible impact on society’s biggest challenges and creating a better future. We strive to advise clients on how to deliver purpose-led growth and embed more equitable, inclusive as well as sustainable business practices.
Hence, we seek talented individuals driven to excel and innovate, working together to achieve our shared goals.
We are committed to creating positive work experiences that foster a culture of respect and inclusion, where diverse perspectives are celebrated, and everyone is recognized for their contributions.
Ready to unleash your potential with us? Join the winning team now!
Work you will do
This role sits within the SAP team of Deloitte Southeast Asia, which encompasses the SAP FI Module solutions respectively. As a leader of this group, you will drive the growth of our SAP business in the region and be responsible for the creation, sale and delivery of SAP solutions: Functional and Technical Design, SAP Application & Systems Development, SAP Business Transformation, etc.
Engage clients in workshops and interviews to analyze process and reporting requirements
Advise clients on industry/ cross-industry leading practices. Advise clients on SAP recommended processes and functions
Design target state SAP solutions for clients. Influence clients’ thinking in adopting leading/ standard practices while developing target state
Analyze application landscape to design interfaces to SAP solution
Perform SAP configuration and tests. Develop specifications for development of forms/ reports/ interfaces.
Lead the consultant and client teams through the implementation cycle including planning and execution of testing, migration and cutover.
Support change management execution by developing training material, delivering training and supporting users post cutover.
Develop relationships with internal and external stakeholders
Your role as a leader
:
At Deloitte, we believe in the importance of empowering our people to be leaders at all levels. We connect our purpose and shared values to identify issues as well as to make an impact that matters to our clients, people and the communities.
Demonstrate a strong commitment to personal learning and development.
Understand how our daily work contributes to the priorities of the team and business.
Understand the set expectations and demonstrate accountability in keeping personal performance on track.
Actively focus on developing effective communications and relationship-building skills with stakeholders, clients and team.
Demonstrate an appreciation for working with others.
Understand what is fundamental to Deloitte’s success as a business.
Demonstrate integrity and an awareness of strengths, differences, and personal impact.
Develop their understanding of Deloitte and offer a fresh perspective.

Requirement:
A good honors Degree, preferably at postgraduate level, in Information Technology, Business Information Systems, Business, Engineering, Mathematics or related disciplines.
Good understanding of SAP implementation methodology.
Consultant will require a minimum of 3-6 years of experience in
CPI module as a team member
, preferably with 2-3 end to end full life cycle implementations or AMS.
SAP S/4 HANA experience is an advantage
Demonstrated success in multi-cultural work environment.
Sound understanding of business process, industry nuances and leading practices in area of focus
Good communication and presentation skills in English to build relationship and work closely with client stakeholders
Ability to facilitate effective workshops to lead target state design.
Demonstrated excellence in conceiving and executing SAP solution
Sound business acumen, teamwork and leadership qualities.
Willingness to work outside of office base and most of all
An appreciation of the consulting lifestyle and ability to travel (both locally and abroad) is a prerequisite to fit to our short-term and long-term project assignment.
Due to volume of applications, we regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.
Please note that Deloitte will never reach out to you directly via messaging platforms to offer you employment opportunities or request for money or your personal information. Kindly apply for roles that you are interested in via this official Deloitte website.

job_title: Junior Data Engineer, Global E-Commerce Data Platform (Total Annual Compensation $30,000)
full_text_jd:
Join our
Technology Innovations Center of Excellence (CoE)
at
Crossian
, a
fast-growing startup that achieved a milestone of $100M in 2024
. In this dynamic role, you'll check in daily with your team to stay aligned on project goals and collaborate across our ecosystem with an
Agile mindset
infused with a
unicorn-worthy startup culture
.
We are building an E-commerce
Data Platform
following
Lakehouse Architecture
, leveraging
Airflow, Airbyte, dbt, and Redshift on AWS Cloud
. Our system is currently in the early development stage, providing a unique opportunity for you to be involved from the ground up—
shaping the architecture, defining data pipelines, and implementing best practices
. Here are some examples: Storefront, Payment Gateway, Inventory, Catalog, Logistics, Marketing Insights, CRM.
Why join us?
We’re not just about building platforms; we’re about creating a workplace where talent thrives. Here's what you’ll gain:
Exceptional Compensation
•	 Up to 30 months of salary per year
through competitive salary packages and performance-based bonuses.
•	Total annual compensation $30,000, reflecting your expertise and contribution.
Growth Opportunities
•	Hands-on exposure to cutting-edge technologies and complex system architecture in a global-scale project.
•	Clear career advancement pathways and access to continuous professional development programs.
Global Vision
•	Contribute to projects that redefine how brands connect with consumers globally.
•	Opportunity to work on challenging problems in data analytics, customer engagement, and operational efficiency.
In addition to development tasks, you’ll collaborate closely with other CoEs to understand their unique challenges. With your technical expertise, you’ll continuously propose innovative solutions to elevate their performance and contribute to the overall success of the organization.
Responsibilities
1.	Collaborate with Data Analysts and Business Teams
to understand data needs and provide timely solutions for reporting and insights.
2.	Work on data integration
from various sources, including APIs, web services, and databases.
3.	Utilize tools
such as AWS QuickSight, Grafana, and Google Sheets for data visualization to support business decision-making.
4.	Support developing and maintaining
scalable
data pipelines
and
ETL/ELT
processes to collect, clean, and process
large-scale datasets
in data systems.
5.	Monitor data pipeline performance
and troubleshoot issues to ensure data integrity and availability.
6.	Document technical processes
, contribute to data catalogs, and ensure compliance with data governance policies.
7.	Engage in continuous learning and improvement, staying updated with industry best practices in Data Engineering.

Requirements & Skills
1.	Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems Management or related fields.
2.	2+ years of experience in data engineering, ETL development, or a similar role.
3.	Proficiency in using advanced SQL queries to extract valuable insights from datasets.
4.	Experience in one of the following programming languages: Python or C# for data processing and scripting.
5.	Experience with relational databases, such as PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle, or MS SQL Server.
6.	Understanding of cloud computing platforms (e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure).
7.	Excellent problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and the ability to work independently or as part of a team.
8.	Strong communication and collaboration skills, particularly in an Agile environment.
9.	Proficient in English, with the ability to communicate, read, and write effectively in a professional work environment.
Preferred (but not required)
1.	Experience working with BI tools such as AWS QuickSight, Grafana, or Google Sheets.
2.	Familiarity with data orchestration tools like Airflow or dbt.
3.	Exposure to cloud-based storage solutions and data lake architecture.
4.	Familiarity with the Agile toolset, such as GitLab, Jira, Confluence, and Slack.

company: Công Ty TNHH FPT Smart Cloud
full_text_jd:
As an AI Engineer, you will collaborate closely with AI Researchers, Data Scientists, and Software Engineers to research and develop AI models tailored to real-world business problems in fields such as banking, insurance, and more. Your responsibilities will include:
• Model Development: Designing, developing, and fine-tuning models using state-of-the-art AI algorithms and techniques, encompassing computer vision and natural language processing. Leverage frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or similar to implement these models effectively.
• Research and Experimentation: Experimenting with state-of-the-art AI model architectures and approaches to enhance the performance and accuracy of existing products. Stay at the forefront of cutting-edge developments in AI and apply them to real-world projects.
• Data Preprocessing: Working on data preprocessing, feature engineering, and data augmentation to optimize and improve model training processes.
• Integration: Developing API interfaces for model interaction, closely collaborating with software engineering teams to integrate and deploy generalized AI models into real-world applications and systems. This will enhance customer interaction, automate processes, and improve decision-making capabilities.
• Mentorship: Providing technical guidance and mentorship to junior members of the AI team.

• Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, or a related field. Ph.D. preferred.
• Proven experience in developing and fine-tuning machine learning models for computer vision and natural language processing.
• Proficiency in frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or similar.
• Strong programming skills in Python.
• JLPT N2/N1 is a plus for candidates
• A track record of contributing to AI research projects and publications is a plus.
• Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.
• Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced, innovative environment.

FPT Telecom đang tìm kiếm một Lập trình viên Android (Kotlin) tài năng, sáng tạo và đam mê
để gia nhập đội ngũ phát triển các ứng dụng streaming đa nền tảng, đột phá và đầy thử thách. Nếu bạn yêu thích công nghệ, có kinh nghiệm xây dựng ứng dụng Android chất lượng cao với Kotlin và mong muốn tạo ra những sản phẩm có tác động lớn, mang đến trải nghiệm giải trí tuyệt vời cho hàng triệu người dùng, hãy cùng chúng tôi kiến tạo tương lai của ngành streaming!
I. Mô tả công việc:
•	Tham gia vào toàn bộ vòng đời phát triển ứng dụng:
Từ giai đoạn phân tích yêu cầu, thiết kế kiến trúc, phát triển tính năng, kiểm thử, triển khai và bảo trì.
•	Phát triển các tính năng mới và cải tiến hiệu năng cho ứng dụng streaming:
Tập trung vào việc cung cấp trải nghiệm mượt mà, ổn định và hấp dẫn cho người dùng.
•	Tích hợp các công nghệ bảo mật và thanh toán:
- Tích hợp các cổng thanh toán an toàn và tin cậy thông qua SDK/API của bên thứ 3.
- Triển khai các giải pháp DRM (Digital Rights Management) và Watermarking để bảo vệ bản quyền nội dung.
•	Đóng góp vào kiến trúc ứng dụng và đảm bảo chất lượng code:
- Đề xuất các giải pháp kiến trúc tối ưu, phù hợp với yêu cầu của dự án.
- Thực hiện review code để đảm bảo tính nhất quán, dễ đọc và tuân thủ các tiêu chuẩn coding.
- Tối ưu hiệu năng ứng dụng để mang lại trải nghiệm tốt nhất cho người dùng.
•	Phân tích, đánh giá và lập kế hoạch phát triển:
- Phân tích yêu cầu, đánh giá tính khả thi và đề xuất các giải pháp kỹ thuật hiệu quả.
- Lập kế hoạch phát triển chi tiết và phối hợp chặt chẽ với các thành viên khác trong nhóm (Product Manager, Designer, QA).
•	Cập nhật công nghệ và áp dụng vào dự án:
- Nghiên cứu và thử nghiệm các công nghệ mới nhất trong lĩnh vực phát triển Android (ví dụ: Jetpack Compose, Coroutines, Flow, Clean Architecture).
- Đề xuất và áp dụng các công nghệ phù hợp để nâng cao chất lượng và hiệu quả của dự án.
•	Thực hiện các công việc khác theo sự phân công của quản lý.

•	Trình Độ:
Tốt nghiệp Đại học trở lên chuyên ngành Công nghệ thông tin hoặc các ngành liên quan.
•	Kinh nghiệm:
- Tối thiểu 3 năm kinh nghiệm
•	Kỹ năng chuyên môn:
-
Nắm vững kiến trúc phần mềm:
MVP, MVVM, Clean Architecture.
-
Hiểu biết sâu sắc về Design Patterns:
Áp dụng linh hoạt để tối ưu hóa code và khả năng bảo trì.
-
Kinh nghiệm phát triển ứng dụng cho Android TV và Leanback:
Hiểu rõ cơ chế phát triển modules, library và ứng dụng cho các nền tảng này.
-
Thành thạo Kotlin và Android Jetpack:
- Có kinh nghiệm thực tế phát triển ứng dụng bằng Jetpack Compose và Android Native.
- Nắm vững các thành phần của Android Jetpack (ví dụ: Lifecycle, ViewModel, LiveData, Room).
-
Kỹ năng làm việc với hệ thống quản lý mã nguồn:
Sử dụng thành thạo Git và các công cụ quản lý source code (ví dụ: Git, SourceTree, GitLab).
-
Khả năng đọc hiểu tài liệu kỹ thuật bằng tiếng Anh:
Dễ dàng tiếp cận và áp dụng các công nghệ mới nhất.
•	Tố chất cá nhân:
-
Đam mê công nghệ và tinh thần học hỏi không ngừng:
Luôn cập nhật và áp dụng các xu hướng công nghệ mới vào dự án.
-
Khả năng làm việc nhóm và độc lập hiệu quả:
Chủ động, sáng tạo và có trách nhiệm cao trong công việc.
-
Khả năng giải quyết vấn đề và tư duy logic tốt:
Phân tích vấn đề một cách hệ thống và đưa ra các giải pháp tối ưu.
-
Chịu được áp lực cao và có khả năng làm việc trong môi trường thay đổi nhanh chóng.
•	Ưu tiên:
- Có kinh nghiệm làm việc trong lĩnh vực media player và video streaming.
- Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với các nền tảng Cloud (ví dụ: AWS, Google Cloud, Azure).
- Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với các công cụ CI/CD (Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery).
QUYỀN LỢI ỨNG VIÊN:
•	Thu nhập và thưởng:
- Gói thu nhập cạnh tranh, hấp dẫn, tương xứng với năng lực và kinh nghiệm.
- Thưởng lương tháng 13, thưởng hiệu suất làm việc xuất sắc, thưởng dự án và thưởng nghỉ mát.
•	Phúc lợi:
- Đầy đủ các chế độ bảo hiểm theo luật lao động Việt Nam (Bảo hiểm xã hội, Bảo hiểm y tế, Bảo hiểm thất nghiệp).
-
Chính sách chăm sóc sức khỏe toàn diện:
Khám sức khỏe định kỳ hàng năm, gói bảo hiểm sức khỏe chuyên biệt FPT Care (khám chữa bệnh miễn phí tại tất cả các bệnh viện uy tín).
- Các hoạt động tri ân, chăm lo đời sống tinh thần cho CBNV và người thân (ví dụ: quà tặng các dịp lễ, Tết, sinh nhật, hỗ trợ vay vốn ưu đãi).
- Phụ cấp ăn trưa, xăng xe, điện thoại (tùy theo vị trí và chính sách công ty).
- Chế độ nghỉ phép năm, nghỉ lễ theo quy định của pháp luật.
•	Đào tạo và phát triển:
-
Cơ hội học hỏi và phát triển không giới hạn:
Được tham gia các khóa đào tạo chuyên sâu về kỹ năng chuyên môn và kỹ năng mềm, được hỗ trợ chi phí tham gia các hội thảo và khóa học bên ngoài.
-
Con đường thăng tiến rõ ràng:
Nhiều cơ hội phát triển và thăng tiến trong công việc, được khuyến khích tham gia vào các dự án lớn và thử thách.
•	Môi trường làm việc:
-
Môi trường làm việc trẻ trung, năng động, sáng tạo và chuyên nghiệp:
Đội ngũ đồng nghiệp tài năng, nhiệt huyết và luôn sẵn sàng hỗ trợ lẫn nhau.
-
Không gian làm việc mở, hiện đại và tiện nghi:
Trang bị đầy đủ các thiết bị và công cụ làm việc tiên tiến nhất.
-
Văn hóa doanh nghiệp độc đáo và sôi động:
Tham gia các hoạt động team building, du lịch, các câu lạc bộ thể thao, nghệ thuật và các sự kiện văn hóa đặc sắc (ví dụ: Tân binh, Teambuilding, Hội diễn Sao Chổi, Sinh nhật công ty, các sự kiện ngày lễ...).
•	Ưu đãi:
- Hưởng các gói ưu đãi đặc biệt khi sử dụng dịch vụ của [Tên công ty/FPT Telecom, nếu phù hợp].

III- Yêu cầu ứng viên:

IV- Thu nhập và quyền lợi:
•	Lương theo thỏa thuận khi phỏng vấn, không hạn chế theo năng lực;

•	Được tham gia các khóa huấn luyện, đào tạo nâng cao kỹ năng, nghiệp vụ theo các hãng của công ty;
•	Môi trường làm việc trẻ, năng động, sáng tạo, công bằng, kỷ luật.

Your Mission:
Shape the brain of the next generation of UAVs — capable of autonomous long range underwater and autonomous during flight.
As the Software Design Engineer, you will build and test the autonomous navigation, and control systems that power a highly autonomous, multi-environment drone.
Your Responsibilities:
•   Design, develop and test software for fully autonomous UAV navigation
Build real-time systems for:
•   Inertial Navigation (INS) + GNSS fusion
•   Dead reckoning for satellite-denied environments
•   Adaptive control of flight and underwater modes
•   Implement communication protocols for intermittent long-range secure uplinks
•   Integrate control logic for ballas, electric propulsion, and energy management
•   Simulate and verify UAV behavior using physics-based and data-driven models
•   Collaborate with Drone Design Engineer, hardware engineers and manufacturing engineers to
close the loop between software and drone hardware
Work Location: Room 501, 508, 510, 511 Taiyo Building, No.97 Bach Dang, Thuong Ly Ward, Hong Bang District, Hai Phong City, Vietnam

•   Degree in Computer Science, Robotics, Aerospace, Embedded Systems or equivalent
•   Proven experience in autonomous drone or robotics control software

•   C++ / Python / ROS2

•   Embedded Linux development
•   Familiar with flight simulators (Gazebo, PX4, ArduPilot, or custom)
•   Advantage: experience with underwater robotics, hydrofoil dynamics, or hybrid UAV control logic

company: Công Ty TNHH Giáo Dục Và Đào Tạo Vinacademy
full_text_jd:
OPPORTUNITY
VinUniversity is looking for an entrepreneurial-minded QS Data Analytics Specialist who is passionate about university data analytics and management in a fast-paced international higher education environment.
The QS Data Analytics will support VinUniversity’s data analytics efforts related to QS and other global university rankings. This role will work closely with the QS Data Analytics Manager and the Planning Officer to analyze rankings data, develop insights, and implement strategies to improve VinUniversity’s ranking performance. The QS Data Analytics Specialist will report to the QS Data Analytics Manager.
POSITION RESPONSIBILITIES
REPORTING LINE: QS Data Analytics Manager, Transformation Management Office Manager
PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Assist in analyzing VinUniversity’s rankings data and identifying areas for improvement.
• Support the development and implementation of data-driven strategies to enhance rankings, in alignment with the university‘s strategic plan.
• Gather and organize data required for QS and other ranking submissions, collaborating with various departments.
• Ensure data accuracy and integrity through data validation and quality checks.
• Assist in creating and maintaining dashboards and data visualization tools to communicate progress to stakeholders.
• Conduct research on ranking methodologies and stay updated on relevant trends in the higher education industry. Generate data-driven reports to assist leaders in making informed decisions.
• Support benchmarking analyses of peer institutions to inform strategic decision-making.
• Assist in providing training to colleagues on data analytics topics.
• Provide general administrative support to the QS Data Analytics Manager and collaborate with the Planning Officer as needed.
• Other data management tasks as required.

• Bachelor’s degree from a prestigious university in quantitative fields such as statistics, data science, business analytics, or economics
• Minimum of 2 years of experience in data analytics, preferably in a diverse, fast-paced environment

job_title: Chuyên Viên Quản Lý & Vận Hành Hệ Thống Giao Dịch Chứng Khoán
company: Công Ty Chứng Khoán Yuanta Việt Nam
full_text_jd:
-	Vận hành (đầu ngày, giữa ngày & cuối ngày) hệ thống phần mềm giao dịch chứng khoán.
-	Quản trị hệ thống phần mềm core giao dịch chứng khoán chứng khoán. Bao gồm: Giám sát dịch vụ, Phân quyền sử dụng và hỗ trợ người dùng.
-	Đầu mối giao tiếp với nhà cung cấp giải pháp phần mềm về các vấn đề liên quan đến hệ thống phần mềm giao dịch chứng khoán: Ghi nhận, xử lý và khắc phục lỗi phát sinh từ người dùng trong quá trình sử dụng.
-	Quản lý cập nhật hệ thống Production/UAT khi nhà cung cấp giải pháp phần mền release phiên bản cập nhật bug/tính năng mới.
-	Giám sát toàn bộ hệ thống giao dịch chứng khoán trong suốt thời gian thị trường mở cửa giao dịch (Hệ thống CSDL, Ứng dụng, Gateway, Middleware, Online Trading,…)
-	Chuẩn bị môi trường và tham gia đầy đủ các đợt kiểm thử hệ thống giao dịch khi có yêu cầu từ cơ quan chức năng (HOSE, HNX & VSDC)
-	Cung cấp dữ liệu theo yêu cầu của kiểm soát nội bộ, kiểm toán tập đoàn & kiểm toán bên ngoài khi được cấp trên phê duyệt.
-	Thực hiện các công việc khác do cấp trên trực tiếp phân công.
-	Thực hiện báo cáo công việc định kỳ/đột xuất cho cấp quản lý trực tiếp

*** Kiến thức:
-	Tốt nghiệp Đại học/Cao đẳng chuyên ngành CNTT
-	Hiểu biết nghiệp vụ Chứng khoán
-	Có kiến thức Linux/Unix. có khả năng đọc hiểu 1 ngôn ngữ lập trình.
-	Biết lập trình là một lợi thế.
*** Phẩm chất:
-	Chủ động, linh hoạt, không ngại áp lực
-	Tính cam kết với công việc
*** Kỹ năng
:
-	Kỹ năng quản lý công việc, quản lý thời gian
-	Kỹ năng Phân tích và giải quyết vấn đề tốt
*** Kinh nghiệm:
-	Tối thiểu 2 năm kinh nghiệm quản lý và vận hành hệ thống giao dịch chứng  khoán hoặc vị trí tương tự.
-	Tối thiểu 1 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực chứng khoán.

job_title: Senior Frontend Engineer (React/nextjs), Storefront Ecommerce Platform (Total Annual Compensation $55,000)
full_text_jd:
ABOUT THE ROLE
Join our
Technology Innovations Center of Excellence (CoE)
at
Crossian
,
a fast-growing startup that achieved a milestone of $100M in 2024
. In this dynamic role, you'll check in daily with your team to stay aligned on project goals and collaborate across our ecosystem with an
Agile mindset
infused with a
unicorn-worthy startup culture.
We are building a cutting-edge
Global eCommerce Platform
, offering end-to-end solutions for:
• Storefront
: Designing customizable and scalable online store systems that provide seamless shopping experiences and support dynamic business growth.
• Ads Manager
: Integrating and optimizing advertising tools across platforms like Facebook, Google and more, enabling businesses to launch, track, and analyze marketing campaigns efficiently.
• Marketing Insights & CR
M: Turning raw data from marketing campaigns, transactions, and user behavior into actionable insights to enhance customer engagement and drive smarter decision-making.
WHAT YOU WILL DO
Frontend Development & Optimization
• Design, develop, and implement user-facing features using ReactJS and NextJS.
• Optimize web applications for performance, scalability, and cross-browser compatibility.
• Lead the implementation of Server-Side Rendering (SSR) and Client-Side Rendering (CSR) for complex features.
• Ensure clean, maintainable, and scalable code through adherence to industry standards and peer code reviews.
• Debug and resolve performance bottlenecks using tools like Sentry, Kong logs, and Cloudflare.
• Translate wireframes and prototypes into high-quality, responsive, and accessible code.
• Collaborate with UI/UX designers to deliver user-centric and consistent experiences.
System Integration & Maintenance
• Work closely with backend teams to integrate APIs seamlessly into the frontend.
• Participate in deployment processes and ensure system stability through efficient debugging and issue resolution.
Cross-Functional Collaboration
• Collaborate with stakeholders to analyze requirements and break them into actionable technical tasks.
• Work with cross-functional teams (backend, QA, DevOps) to ensure the successful delivery of projects.
Knowledge Sharing & Continuous Improvement
• Share knowledge with team members and provide guidance on frontend best practices.
• Proactively suggest improvements to workflows, tools, and code quality to enhance team productivity and product quality.

WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR
Education:
Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or related fields.
Experience
• 3-6 years of experience in frontend development with strong expertise in ReactJS, NextJS, and modern JavaScript.
• Proficient in state management tools like Redux, Recoil, or similar libraries.
• Hands-on experience in building responsive, cross-browser-compatible, and accessible web applications.
• Hands-on experience with Node.js to develop APIs and optimize SSR logic.
• Familiarity with modern frontend tools and workflows (e.g., Webpack, Vite, Git).
• Basic understanding of AWS S3, Cloudflare, or similar tools for asset delivery.
• Capable of translating business requirements into technical solutions.
• English proficiency
Soft Skills:
• Strong problem-solving skills.
• Familiarity with Agile/Scrum
Preferred Skills (but not required):
• Has knowledge of design, and coding principles (e.g.: clean code, DRY/KISS, SOLID)
• Has knowledge of Postgres, KAFKA, Elasticsearch, S3/Minio
• Knowledge of testing frameworks like Jest, React Testing Library.
• Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines for frontend applications.
• Experience with eCommerce platforms is a plus.
WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT
We’re not just about building platforms; we’re about creating a workplace where talent thrives. Here's what you’ll gain:
Exceptional Total Compensation Package
•
Up to 30 months of salary per year
through competitive salary packages and performance-based bonuses.
• Total annual compensation up to $55,000, reflecting your expertise and contribution.
Full salary during probation & Guaranteed 13th month salary
• 12 days work-from-home & 12 days of paid annual leave, plus seniority paid leave
• Global health insurance package for yourself and direct family members, plus annual health checkup
Growth Opportunities
• Hands-on exposure to cutting-edge technologies and complex system architecture in a global-scale project.
• Clear career advancement pathways and access to continuous professional development programs.
Global Vision
• Contribute to projects that redefine how brands connect with consumers globally.
• Opportunity to work on challenging problems in data analytics, customer engagement, and operational efficiency.
In addition to development tasks, you’ll collaborate closely with other CoEs to understand their unique challenges. With your technical expertise, you’ll continuously propose innovative solutions to elevate their performance and contribute to the overall success of the organization.

job_title: Senior Business Analyst, Global Supply Chain ECommerce Platform (Up To 30 Months Of Annually Package)
full_text_jd:
ABOUT THE ROLE
Crossian is a high-growth technology-driven e-commerce business. Behind our success is our people. As a start-up formed in 2020, we have created a fast-paced and dynamic environment, enabling our people to reach $100 million of revenue in 2024, a cumulative average growth rate of over
1000%
in the last 3 years. Our mission now is to harness the power of technology to develop a direct-to-consumer approach and enhance customer lifetime value.
We are creating a comprehensive eCommerce Platform that features solutions for Inventory, Catalogs, Logistics,... Here are some examples:
• Centralize payment gateways for managing transactions and after-payment business (such as refunds, chargebacks, claims, inquiries,..)
• Build a seamless and interconnected supply-chain system by integrating advanced 3rd-party services for inventory management, catalog synchronization, logistics tracking, and more.
• Plus, numerous other opportunities await your input.
The Business Analyst will serve as a key link between business needs and technical solutions, ensuring the successful development of products that meet user requirements. The role involves analyzing business processes, gathering requirements, and collaborating with the Product Manager, stakeholders, and cross-functional teams to deliver effective and user-centric e-commerce solutions.
WHAT YOU WILL DO
• Requirement Gathering
: Collaborate with the Product Manager/Owner and Business Owner in scoping, estimating, and planning projects. Manage project change requests efficiently to adapt to evolving requirements.
• Documentation & SDLC Support
: Produce comprehensive system/feature specifications, user stories/backlogs, business rules, and wireframes. Maintain crucial documentation throughout the software development life cycle (SDLC).
• E-commerce Expertise
: Utilize in-depth knowledge and experience with platforms such as Lazada, Shopee, Tiki, and similar ecosystems to develop and deliver tailored, industry-relevant solutions.
• Problem Solving
: Conduct thorough analysis to identify underlying issues, determine root causes, and develop strategic, actionable solutions to address challenges effectively.
• Data Analysis
: Gathering, analyzing, and interpreting data to provide actionable insights. Utilize data analysis expertise to support decision-making and identify opportunities for process improvement.
• Cross-functional Collaboration
: Act as a bridge between stakeholders and development teams, including UX/UI designers for creating design mockups and wireframes, to facilitate seamless communication and project execution.
• UI/UX:
Provide input and mentorship on UI/UX best practices, ensuring designs meet business objectives and user needs effectively.
• UAT Test Scenarios & Support:
Develop test scenarios for UAT and provide essential support to clients during the UAT phase, ensuring solutions meet their needs accurately.

WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR
• Educational Background
: Bachelor’s degree in IT, Computer Science, or equivalent, laying the foundational knowledge required for this role.
• Professional Experience:
At least 5 years of experience in a Business Analyst role, demonstrating proficiency in handling business requirements from users and exceptional written communication in English.
• Software Development Process Knowledge
: A deep understanding of the software development process, especially in software requirement analysis, to ensure the delivery of accurate and viable solutions.
• E-commerce Knowledge:
Familiarity with tools and platforms relevant to e-commerce, logistics, inventory, and warehouse management systems (e.g., Odoo, Salesforce).
•
Business Intelligence/Data Analysis:
Proven experience in data analysis with a minimum of 6 months of hands-on practice, demonstrating the ability to derive actionable insights.
• UI/UX:
Foundational understanding of UI/UX principles, including usefulness at a junior level and usability at an entry level, with a willingness to mentor and guide junior team members in these areas.
• Communication & Interpersonal Skills
: Strong communication, presentation, and documentation capabilities, essential for effective stakeholder engagement and project documentation.
• Analytical Thinking & Problem-Solving:
Excellent analytical and critical thinking skills, with a growth mindset focused on embracing challenges and continuous learning.
• Adaptability & Patience
: A willingness to listen, stay calm, and patiently advocate for ideas across diverse groups, facilitating consensus and project advancement.
Preferred Qualifications (but not required)
• Lean Startup & Agile Frameworks
: Experience in Product companies that utilize Lean Startup and Agile/Scrum frameworks, promoting flexible and iterative product development.
• Tech-Startup Environment:
Background in working within tech-startup environments, adaptable to rapid changes and dynamic work culture.
• eCommerce & Retail Industry Experience:
Prior exposure to the eCommerce and Retail sectors, bringing valuable insights into customer needs and market trends.
This role presents an unparalleled opportunity for professionals eager to expand their expertise in Product Development and Innovation, situated within the energetic and swiftly evolving landscape of a tech startup. At Crossian LLC, we are not just creating technology; we are setting new standards for cross-border eCommerce.
WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT
• Exceptional Compensation
: Up to 30 months of salary per year through competitive salary packages and performance-based bonuses.
• Full salary
during probation & Guaranteed 13th month salary
•
12 days work-from-home & 12 days of paid annual leave, plus seniority paid leave
• Global health insurance package
for yourself and direct family members, plus annual health checkup
•
A Pantry & a Crossian Cafe stocked with goodies, ready to serve
•
Other company benefits including 5-star annual Summer Summit, budget for frequent team building activities and other monthly/ quarterly/ annual company events
•
General company T&D Program
•
Other benefits in accordance to Company's Policy and Vietnam Labor Laws

company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Chứng Khoán SSI
full_text_jd:
Một Chuyên viên Quản trị Cơ sở Dữ liệu (DBA) chuyên nghiệp sẽ đảm bảo hệ thống cơ sở dữ liệu hoạt động liên tục 24/7. Mục tiêu là duy trì hệ thống dữ liệu hoạt động trôi chảy trong toàn công ty, đảm bảo cả cấu trúc dữ liệu backend lẫn khả năng truy cập frontend cho người dùng.
1. Vai Trò & Trách Nhiệm
• Giám sát và xử lý sự cố trên cả môi trường Production và Integration/UAT.
• Đảm bảo hệ thống cơ sở dữ liệu luôn hoạt động ổn định, đạt tiêu chuẩn cao nhất về khả dụng, phục hồi, tính toàn vẹn, bảo mật, tối ưu hóa và hiệu suất.
• Hỗ trợ đội ngũ phát triển trong việc tích hợp hệ thống cơ sở dữ liệu và xử lý sự cố.
• Hiểu rõ mô hình dữ liệu, logic nghiệp vụ và dữ liệu khách hàng.
• Tối ưu hóa SQL, thực hiện tuning truy vấn SQL, viết script Linux, Python, Golang để tự động hóa các tác vụ cơ sở dữ liệu.
• Thiết lập, cài đặt, thiết kế, kiến trúc các công nghệ cơ sở dữ liệu:
- Oracle (Data Guard, RAC)
- PostgreSQL
- MongoDB
- MySQL
• Công cụ giám sát hệ thống cơ sở dữ liệu
• Quản trị tối ưu về tốc độ và chi phí đối với Database BigQuery.
• Tư vấn về tiêu chí lựa chọn cơ sở dữ liệu cho các dự án hoặc đội phát triển.

• Tốt nghiệp Đại học chuyên ngành Công nghệ Thông tin, Viễn thông hoặc các ngành liên quan.
• Tối thiểu 5 năm kinh nghiệm trong vai trò tương đương trong lĩnh vực tài chính.
• Kinh nghiệm DBA vững chắc trong cả môi trường Production và hỗ trợ đội phát triển.
• Thành thạo ít nhất một trong các hệ quản trị cơ sở dữ liệu: Oracle, MySQL, MS SQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL.
• Chuyên sâu về PL/SQL, SQL tuning, ETL, Data Warehousing, Data Lake.
• Kinh nghiệm làm việc với CDC Tool (Oracle Golden Gate, Debezium).
• Kỹ năng giao tiếp tốt, tư duy giải quyết vấn đề, có thể làm việc độc lập hoặc theo nhóm.
• Chính xác, có tổ chức, chú trọng chi tiết, chủ động, tận tâm, ham học hỏi.

• Quantity, products/service delivery of vendor to Head of VN IT.
• Communicate the status of major milestones, identify, classify and manage potential project risk with mitigation strategies and contingency plans, provide continuing direction to the project team, and conduct regular status meetings with key stakeholders to review project activities.
• Ability to assess risk and manage contingency plans.
• Manage, motivate and lead project teams to meet project objectives.
• Ability to link business consequences to a project’s progress, goals, functionality, cost/benefit and recommend appropriate courses of action.
• Assess the performance of project team members, contribute to performance evaluations.

Professional requirement:
• At least 4 years of experience in overall software company having held roles in supporting senior IT managers.
• Knowledge of Procurement, contract management. Having a good relationship with Vendors national and international is an advantage.
• Good technical IT back-ground, ideally in IT relationship management and financial controls.
• Good business and technical hands-on capabilities.
• Flexile and agile working style.
• Able to build strong interpersonal relationships with vendor’s/ business leaders, and others.
• Possess good analytical, cognitive, planning and organizing skillset.
• Able to multitask, prioritize, and manage time efficiently.
• Self-driven and self-motivated, has can-do attitude and startup spirit.
• Good written English is necessary. Good spoken English is advantage problems.
Work experience:
• 4+ years working experience in Software/ Fintech/Finance areas.
• Experience with projects in multiple technologies and functions.
• Skilled in the use of Microsoft Project and Jira.
• Experienced in leveraging structured project management methodology to lead project teams; including both Scrum Master and Agile Master.
Education: Bachelor’s degree in engineering, computer science, or information technology.
Language skill: Proficient in Vietnamese and good English communication skill.

1. Integrity
• Reliability: consistently do what one says one will do.
• Accountability: admit mistakes in daily operation with direct report line immediately. Focus on solutions and improvements.
• Have the courage to stand firm on compliance, take appropriate action, recognize, and reward others who adhere to our values.
• Ethical conduct: acts in accordance with the SCCVN Code of Conduct, local laws, and ethical principles in all situations
2. Manage people: Monitor individual performance & enhance capabilities of Market Analysis Team (MA Team)
• Set KPI, IDP and follow up with Market analysis team members.
• Review team structure & people pipeline. Join mid-year performance review/ year end appraisal.
• Be able to coach and lead the Market analysis team to drive for performance in line with company and department’s objectives.
• Define competencies gap and development roadmap to fill the gap of each team member via coaching, training to meet the required competencies.
• Handle and resolve disputes within the team and related departments
3. Contribute into marketing and sales tactical plan to maximize competitive advantage of company’s offerings
• Ensure team can identify market situation, competitors’ movement and customer’s needs, then analyze and help formulate competitive marketing and sales plan.
• Monitor the process of identifying the price/rebate discrepancies, provide accrurate data, analyze and make recommendations based on the actual results and trends.
• Track and measure pricing discounts, rebates and Brand activation (BA) rebates as a part of discount and rebates management at WSL and trade channel.
• Collect and monitor price trend, market offerings of competitors to proactively advise operation team in rebate/discount proposal through day-to-day conversation and War room meeting
• Analyze market trends, competitor pricing, and customer behavior to optimize pricing programs.
4. Provide analysis reports resulted from the combination between desk-research and on-field market data
• Master market research methodologies, analytic skills as well as knowledge related to cement industry, construction and building materials and its substitutes.
• Able to transfer these knowledge to team members through classroom and on-the-job training
• Ensures solid competitive intelligence and customer feedback across the whole distribution value chain is collected, analyzed to evaluate company’s position on the market.
• Ensure Market Analysis team bring market information into pricing analysis and recommendation, able to solve ad-hoc cases, etc… Puts in place the right Business Intelligence: relevant, reliable, accurate reporting system. Data is built as a foundation for all decision.
5. Develop company’s understanding about competitors
• Proactive train and build a flatform of collecting, updating and analyzing macroeconomic factors and demand in cement industry.
• Build wider network and resources from internal and external cement industry to collect better and faster market and competitor’s information supporting for INSEE analysis and business improvement.
• Provide monthly competitor and macroeconomic analysis/ update support for business improvement.
6. Market share process
• Utilize information collection from cement manufacturers and other network to provide quality data for market share results.
• Provide quality mid-month MS forecast and full month results to Exco report.
• Be able to present these results to relevant functions and stakeholders.
• Maintain quarter reconciliation process INSEE’s data collection vs VNCA data and report to Line Manager, Exco.
7.Monitor Topline target cascade down
• Monitor the entire process of topline budget allocation to region/province level to ensure the target is under process and Market Analysis team members are monitoring, updating or asking for advice
• Return of Investment is highly focused on all MA planning step and evaluated after results
8. Price Governance process in place at region level
• Review current process and Cooperate with Pricing team to build Governance Process in place at the region level to ensure price performance is monitoring and transforming timely and transparently
9.Exco reports
• Follow-up commercial strategic objectives to create relevant, accurate, consistent reports and analysis.
• Prepare high quality and on time of required reports to Exco (COM results, GEXCO, Commentary and Quarterly report)
• Act as single poin of contact to provide commercial data under scope of work to other functions and stakeholders
• Proactive to collect relevant information and data from different resources.
10.Monitor reporting process to provide accurate and quality reports
• Monitor MA team to provide accurate and quality report

1. Educational Qualifications
• University degree in Economics, Marketing, Finance, and/or Business Administration
2. Relevant Experience
• Knowledgeable in cement industry, building materials industry and professional business conduct
• Experience in managing team and collaborate across functional teams
• Advanced English presentation, communication and interaction with EXCO/C-level
3. Leadership Competencies
• Drive Results
• Collaborate & Influence without authority
• Customer & Market Focus
• Challenge Conventions
• Engage & Inspire
• Attract & Develop Talent & Build Great Teams

job_title: Foxconn Tuyển Gấp Kỹ Sư Phát Triển Phần Mềm Hệ Thống
company: Công Ty TNHH Công Nghệ Chính Xác Fuyu
full_text_jd:
Hiện nay do mở rộng quy mô sản xuất cho các dự án sản xuất hàng mới, chúng tôi cần tuyển gấp kỹ sư phát triển phần mềm hệ thống làm việc tại KCN Quang Châu, Bắc Giang.
MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC
- Phát triển các hệ thống dựa theo yêu cầu từ các phòng ban trong công ty
- Bảo trì và cải thiện các hệ thống đang hoạt động của các phòng ban
- Cải thiện, tối ưu hóa lưu trình để tăng năng suất và chất lượng dự án
QUYỀN LỢI:
- Làm việc tại nhà xưởng mới quy mô lớn vô cùng xịn xò
- Mức lương đàm phán hấp dẫn, đóng bảo hiểm ngay từ tháng thử việc
- Chương trình khám sức khỏe miễn phí hàng năm
- Cơ hội đi đào tạo tại Foxconn Trung Quốc, Phần Lan, Hungary...

- Tốt nghiệp chuyên ngành liên quan đến CNTT, Kỹ thuật phần mềm hoặc các chuyên ngành liên quan
- Có ít nhất 1 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc backend
- Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với các kỹ thuật REST API, Web service
- Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với Java - Spring framework là lợi thế
- Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với database
- Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng GIT
- Có kinh nghiệm triển khai dự án lên máy chủ là lợi thế
- Kỹ năng tiếng Anh đọc hiểu tốt

job_title: Foxconn Tuyển Gấp Kỹ Sư RF Radio Frequency
company: Tập Đoàn Khoa Học Kỹ Thuật Hồng Hải - Foxconn
full_text_jd:
Hiện nay do mở rộng quy mô sản xuất, chúng tôi cần tuyển gấp 5 kỹ sư RF làm việc tại một trong các chi nhánh:
- Công ty TNHH Công nghệ chính xác FUYU, KCN Quang Châu, Bắc Giang
- Công ty TNHH Funing Precision Component, KCN Quế Võ, Bắc Ninh
- Công ty TNHH Công nghệ chính xác FULIAN, KCN Quang Châu, Bắc Giang
MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC
- Tham gia nghiên cứu phát triển các giải pháp cao tần cho các hệ thống thông tin vô tuyến (Các sản phẩm đang sản xuất: Google nest hub, Wifi AP/Repeater, Camera...)
- Tham gia vào quá trình debug sản phẩm
- Phối hợp với nhóm R&D phát triển dự án mới

- Tốt nghiệp ĐH trở lên các chuyên ngành Điện tử, Điện tử viễn thông, IT...
- Hiểu biết về các công nghệ không dây: LTE, mmwave, Lora, Zigbeem... trong sản xuất các thiết bị điện tử
- Hiểu biết về các thiết bị test RF (Litepoint, CMW500...), các thiết bị phân tích tín hiệu (signal analyzer, spectrum generator...)
- Có kinh nghiệm liên quan tại công ty điện tử
- Tiếng Anh hoặc Tiếng Trung trình độ khá trở lên.
QUYỀN LỢI:
- Mức lương hấp dẫn, đàm phán theo năng lực lên đến 1500$
- Làm việc tại Tập đoàn quy mô lớn, quy tụ nhiều kỹ sư IT dày dặn kinh nghiệm
- Cơ hội đi đào tạo chuyên môn tại Foxconn Trung Quốc
- Chương trình khám sức khỏe miễn phí hàng năm
- Được đóng BHXH ngay từ tháng thử việc và hưởng các chế độ khác theo luật lao động hiện hành
- Làm việc tại Nhà xưởng mới quy mô lớn vô cùng xịn xò
- Hỗ trợ xe đưa đón từ Hà Nội - Bắc Ninh - Bắc Giang
- Có KTX hiện đại nằm ngay trong khuôn viên cho ứng viên ở xa

With high–tech advantage, Geniee is one of the leading Supply Side Platforms (SSP) in Asia, being headquartered in Japan.
Invested by Softbank group (one of the largest Japanese mobile carriers), Geniee is expanding business across Southeast Asia and the US. According to the Deloitte Technology Fast 500 Asia Pacific 2016 Ranking, Geniee ranked in the top 200 of companies in APAC.
With the success of the media solution business in  Japan, we (“GENIEE INTERNATIONAL GROUP”) have established and accelerated localization in each country: Singapore, Vietnam, Indonesia and India, providing clients with our cutting-edge Ad technology and Marketing technology solution business.
We are looking for potential candidates who are expected to be core members of Geniee Vietnam. To be part of the Geniee group, you will have the chance to work in a challenging international working environment with passionate and friendly colleagues.
Apply and become a Genieer today!
Job description:
- Conduct market research, new partner/ competitor evaluation and approach
- Understand Geniee’s services from an intellectual and applied perspective; transfer that knowledge to clients;
- Keep track on performance of current demand partners assigned and provide reasonable adjustment to keep them in uptrend
- Conduct tests on new products and services provided by product team or 3rd party
- Initiate and manage new businesses
- Co-ordinate with other teams (Sales, Ops, etc.) for projects and meet individual and team’s KPI
- Complete other tasks assigned from leader/ manager

- Native or Business English is a must
- Vietnamese/Permanent residents ONLY
- General knowledge about online marketing/ digital advertising/ ad-tech
- Have at least 6 months’ experience as a tester for either websites or mobile apps
- B2B sales experience is plus
- Experience in online ad-ops and/or campaign management within ad network/digital media agency/online publisher is plus
Preferred Personality:
- Self-study skill
- Sales skill
- Interpersonal skills with an emphasis on teamwork, initiative and integrity
- Multiple tasks management skills and flexibility
- Enthusiastic and self-motivated to try new and challenging tasks

The IT Helpdesk is responsible for providing technical support and
assistance to end-users within the organization. This role ensures efficient
troubleshooting, problem resolution, and maintenance of IT systems to
ensure smooth daily operations.
Key Responsibilities:
•   Provide first-level technical support for hardware, software, and
network-related issues.
•   Respond to and resolve user inquiries via phone, email, or in-
person.
•   Install, configure, and maintain computer systems, peripherals, and
applications.
•   Troubleshoot network connectivity issues, including LAN, Wi-Fi,
and VPN.
•   Manage user accounts, access rights, and permissions in Active
Directory and other IT systems.
•   Support email configurations, and enterprise software.
•   Document IT issues, solutions, and troubleshooting steps in the
ticketing system.
•   Assist in IT asset management, including inventory tracking of
hardware and software licenses.
•   Coordinate with third-party vendors for hardware repairs and
software support.
•   Provide basic IT training and guidance to employees on best
practices and security policies.
•   Ensure compliance with IT security policies and procedures.
•   Assist in IT projects, system upgrades, and deployments as
required.

•   Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field (preferred).
•
1-3 years of experience in IT support, helpdesk
, or a similar role.
•
Strong knowledge of Windows and macOS operating systems.
•   Familiarity with Active Directory, Office 365, and enterprise applications.
•   Basic networking knowledge (TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP, VPN, Wi-Fi troubleshooting).
•   Experience with ticketing systems (e.g., ServiceNow, Jira, Zendesk) is a plus.
•   Good problem-solving and analytical skills.
•   Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
•   Ability to work independently and in a team-oriented environment.
•   Customer-focused mindset with a proactive approach to troubleshooting.
*Benefits
•	Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses.
•	Opportunities for career growth and professional development.
•	Training and certification programs.
•	Paid time off, insurance, and other company benefits.
•	Friendly and dynamic work environment.

BASIC PURPOSE OF THE POSITION:
A business intelligence Manager is responsible for analysing and reporting business performance data to inform management decisions. Their duties include acquiring, compiling, cleaning, storing and executing queries on business intelligence systems. You will work closely with teams across functions, BUAP and groups, playing a key role in gathering business data from various sources such as financial reports, customer surveys, industry-specific metrics and so on
•	Be a key business partner for
Power BI, Report automation and Data standardization.
•	Evaluate and define business metrics, democrats data by building and socializing decision tools (dashboard, reports).
•	Support various business functions with the development and maintenance of various management reports.
PRINCIPAL ACCOUNTABILITIES:
•	Business Partnership:
•	Proactively engage with internal business teams
to understand their data requirements and translate business questions into analytical solutions.
•	Collaborate with cross-functional stakeholders
to understand their business needs, formulate and complete end-to-end analysis that includes data gathering, analysis, ongoing scaled deliverable and presentations
•	Project Management:
•	Own end-to-end data projects
, from defining the scope to delivering results. Build frameworks and trackers to monitor project progress and ensure timely delivery.
•	Stakeholder Management:
•	Build strong relationships
with stakeholders across the organization.
•	Effectively communicate complex data findings
to both technical and non-technical audiences.
•	Data Solution Development:
•	Design, implement, and maintain a self-service data platform that enables ad-hoc access to large datasets, empowering business users to conduct their own analyses.
•	Advanced Analytics:
•	Develop and implement advanced analytical models to address complex business challenges.
•	Continuous Improvement:
•	Proactively identify opportunities to improve data quality, efficiency, and effectiveness. Stay up to date with the latest data technologies and trends.
•	Leverage BI tools and data skills
•	Build and promote the use of data products, including dashboards and reports, to empower stakeholders with actionable insights.

KNOW-HOW, SKILLS AND KNOWLEDGE FOR THIS POSITION:
A) Education, Qualifications and Training:
•	Bachelor’s or master’s degree in relevant field of study.
B) Experience required (e.g. Past Roles, Level, Years of Experience, Technical, People Management, etc.):
•	3+ years of experience with BI & analytics tools (SQL, Tableau, Power BI or similar technologies)
•	Advanced Excel skill with knowledge in Power Query, Power Pivots
•	Excellent communication skills in English and Vietnamese to influence peers and strong relationships within BI Group community and cross functionality.
C) Specialised Knowledge or Skills required (e.g. Technical, Cross-functional, etc.):
•	Can-do attitude to embrace new changes and challenges to solve challenging yet stimulating problems of the business
•	Strong experience in SQL to work with complex databases
•	Knowledge in Accounting/Finance preferably and business acumen (to connect the dots)
•	Knowing statistical programming language (Python, R) to manipulate and draw insights from large data set. Ability to collaborate cross-functionally and influence key stakeholders.
•	Self-starter, capable of initiating improvement projects with minimum supervision
•	Highly analytical with adaptability and result-driven focus.

job_title: (Senior Level) Kỹ Sư Phát Triển Fullstack - Java Fullstack Developer - Khối Công Nghệ Thông Tin (HOLT.12)
company: Ngân Hàng Thương Mại Cổ Phần Quân Đội - MB
full_text_jd:
•	Phát triển các hệ thống, ứng dụng của Ngân hàng, gồm các hệ thống nội bộ và ứng dụng dành cho khách hàng với quy mô 30 triệu khách hàng cá nhân và  300.000 khách hàng doanh nghiệp.
•	Phát triển hoặc phối hợp triển khai cùng các nhà cung cấp cho các giải pháp Công nghệ.
•	Quản lý, phát triển dịch vụ tích hợp với các hệ thống core như: T24, WAY4, BPM, CRM, CIC ...
•	Quản lý, phát triển API trên API Gateway phục vụ tích hợp với các đối tác trong nước và quốc tế.
•	Nghiên cứu, thử nghiệm, triển khai áp dụng các xu hướng công nghệ mới vào việc phát triển: GraphQL, Docker Container (K8s), CICD, EventSourcing, CQRS, NoSQL ...
•	Tham gia phân tích nghiệp vụ, đề xuất giải pháp, phương án triển khai nhằm cải tiến, nâng cao hiệu quả của các dự án trong quá trình làm việc.
•	Lên timeline công việc, quản lý tasks cho các thành viên trong nhóm, giám sát và hỗ trợ các thành viên hoàn thành đúng cam kết.
•	Dẫn dắt nhóm 3-6 thành viên, đồng hành cùng

•	Tốt nghiệp Đại học các chuyên ngành Công nghệ thông tin, Khoa học máy tính, Điện tử viễn thông, Công nghệ phần mềm, Hệ thống thông tin ...
•	Tối thiểu 02 năm làm việc thực tế tại các công ty, dự án về lập trình Backend
•	Tối thiểu 1 - 2 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc với Microservice.
•	Thành thạo 1 trong các ngôn ngữ BackEnd, ưu tiên Java.
•	Thành thạo Spring framework: spring core, spring sercuity, spring boots.
•	Thành thạo một trong trong các loại database: Oracle, Sqlserver, PostgreSQL, Mongodb.
•	Có kiến thức tốt về kiến trúc hệ thống. Thông thạo đa dạng thiết kế phần mềm.
•	Có khả năng tuning performance của ứng dụng, hệ thống.
•	Có hiểu biết sâu về các kỹ thuật/công nghệ: MySQL, Redis, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Kafka,…
•	Có kinh nghiệm phát triển, sử dụng Cloud, AI, Front-End là một lợi thế.
•	Có kinh nghiệm hướng dẫn, quản lý đội nhóm là lợi thế
