- Quản trị hệ thống phòng chống mã độc trên các hệ thống máy chủ, máy trạm
- Thực hiện dò quét điểm yếu kỹ thuật; kiểm thử an ninh mạng, hệ thống máy chủ, ứng dụng và xây dựng phương án khắc phục các điểm yếu
- Tham gia các dự án phần mềm trong vai trò tư vấn, đánh giá an ninh thông tin lớp ứng dụng, dữ liệu
- Thực hiện các công việc khác theo sự phân công của quản lý cấp trên

- Tốt nghiệp đại học trở lên các chuyên ngành CNTT
- Ưu tiên có các chứng chỉ bảo mật như CISSP, CISP, CISA
- Tối thiểu 2 năm kinh nghiệm trở lên trong lĩnh vực An ninh thông tin
- Có kiến thức về Network security, ISO 27001, security assessment
- Kĩ năng trình bày rõ ràng, mạch lạc, khả năng viết tài liệu đánh giá ATTT

The candidates will be responsible for developing and maintaining software applications using Salesforce technologies:
• Expertise in designing, developing, and maintaining large enterprise Salesforce platforms/applications with various integration levels and a combination of all marketing / sales /service clouds needed.
• Expertise in defining large enterprise software systems and mapping use cases into the desired solution architecture.
• Communicate with Customer/onsite team to get/clarify the requirements via email/telephone/video conference.
• Participate in the planning/analysis of business requirements for system changes and enhancements.
• Provide the guidelines on coding standards to team members, review their code and define deployment process.
• Recommend solutions in order to improve the quality and performance of projects and help to ensure that the delivery meets customer’s expectations.
• Write technical and user guide documentations.
• Ability to conceptualize, design, and execute proof of concept projects. Demonstrate success in the initial POC work to establish integrations from Salesforce to AI/BI applications.
• Capable of leading a team during the implementation, deployment and run operation.

• Good written and verbal skills in English (mandatory). Excellent communication and collaboration skills. French speaking is a plus.
• 2-5 years of relevant work experience in consulting and implementing Salesforce projects. Integrations from Salesforce to AI/BI applications is a plus.
• Experience in Apex, Aura/Lightning Web Component, Automation Tools (Flow, Approval Process, etc.), Experience Cloud, Einstein AI, Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, Marketing Cloud, etc. How to apply AI in Salesforce configuration and development.
• Knowledge of Salesforce consultant, configuration such as permissions, data access controls, reports, dashboards, etc.
• Experience in APIs and integrations.
• Experience working on an Agile development team.
• Experience in software development and tools/frameworks (Java, Azure, Python, React, etc.) outside of the Salesforce ecosystem.
• Good at analyzing & problem solving, teamwork, generates enthusiasm among team members.
• Experience in insurance projects is an advantage.
• Experience in branching, merging development and deployment process (CI/CD).
• Salesforce certificates are an advantage.

job_title: Senior Data Engineer, Global E-Commerce Data Platform (Total Annual Compensation $40,000)
company: Công Ty TNHH Công Nghệ Và Giải Pháp Phần Mềm Crossian
full_text_jd:
ABOUT THE ROLE
Join our
Technology Innovations Center of Excellence (CoE)
at Crossian, a
fast-growing startup that achieved a milestone of $100M in 2024
. In this dynamic role, you'll check in daily with your team to stay aligned on project goals and collaborate across our ecosystem with an
Agile mindset
infused with a
unicorn-worthy startup culture.
We are building an E-commerce
Data Platform
following
Lakehouse Architecture
, leveraging
Airflow, Airbyte, dbt, and Redshift on AWS Cloud
. Our system is currently in the
early development stage
, providing a unique opportunity for you to be involved from the ground up—
shaping the architecture, defining data pipelines, and implementing best practices
. Here are some examples: Storefront, Payment Gateway, Inventory, Catalog, Logistics, Marketing Insights, CRM.
WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT
We’re not just about building platforms; we’re about creating a workplace where talent thrives. Here's what you’ll gain:
Exceptional Compensation
•	 Up to 30 months of salary per year
through competitive salary packages and performance-based bonuses.
•	Total annual compensation
$40,000
, reflecting your expertise and contribution.
Growth Opportunities
•	Hands-on exposure to cutting-edge technologies and complex system architecture in a global-scale project.
•	Clear career advancement pathways and access to continuous professional development programs.
Global Vision
•	Contribute to projects that redefine how brands connect with consumers globally.
•	Opportunity to work on challenging problems in data analytics, customer engagement, and operational efficiency.
In addition to development tasks, you’ll collaborate closely with other CoEs to understand their unique challenges. With your technical expertise, you’ll continuously propose innovative solutions to elevate their performance and contribute to the overall success of the organization.
WHAT YOU WILL DO
1.	Design, develop, and maintain
scalable
data pipelines
and
ETL/ELT
processes to collect, clean, and process
large-scale datasets
in data systems.
2.	Collaborate with Data Scientists, Data Analysts
, and other stakeholders to understand data requirements and develop Data Lake and Data Warehouse solutions for analytics, reporting, and AI/ML. Utilize BI tools like Grafana, AWS QuickSight, and Google Sheets for data visualization.
3.	Build and optimize data architecture
, including Lakehouse (AWS S3, Delta Lake), Data Warehouse (Redshift), and technologies like Kafka for both streaming and batch data processing.
4.	Monitor and troubleshoot data pipeline issues
to ensure data integrity and timely delivery. Utilize tools such as Sentry, Grafana, Prometheus, and AWS CloudWatch to track logs and send alerts via Slack.
5.	Document technical processes, maintain data catalogs, and ensure compliance
with data governance policies. Use the Atlassian toolset (Jira, Confluence) or Slack for work management and team collaboration.
6.	Optimize the performance, reliability, and cost-efficiency
of data systems. Enhance the
scalability
and
efficiency
of all components, including Kafka, dbt, Airflow, Airbyte, and storage solutions like PostgreSQL, Elasticsearch, Redis, and AWS S3, as well as data processing and orchestration frameworks.
7.	Continuously research and implement new technologies
to optimize the current system, applying best practices in Data Engineering and DataOps.

WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR
1.	Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field.
2.	4+ years of experience in data engineering, ETL development, or a similar role.
3.	Proficiency in using advanced SQL queries to extract valuable insights from datasets.
4.	Proficiency in one of the following programming languages: Python, C#, or Java for data processing and scripting.
5.	Experience with relational databases, such as PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle, or MS SQL Server.
6.	Experience with cloud computing platforms (e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure).
7.	Knowledge of data architecture concepts and cloud-based storage solutions.
8.	Knowledge of document databases, including Elasticsearch, Redis, MongoDB, or Apache Solr.
9.	Strong problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and the ability to work independently or as part of a team.
10.	Excellent communication and collaboration skills, particularly in an Agile environment.
11.	Proficient in English, with the ability to communicate, read, and write effectively in a professional work environment.
Preferred (but not required)
1.	Knowledge of container orchestration, such as AWS EKS or Kubernetes.
2.	Experience with microservice architecture.
3.	Experience with data visualization tools, such as AWS QuickSight or Grafana.
4.	Experience with data streaming platforms, such as Apache Kafka or Apache Nifi.
5.	Familiarity with data integration from various sources, such as web services, APIs, and file systems.
6.	Familiarity with the Agile toolset, such as GitLab, Jira, Confluence, and Slack.

job_title: Thiết Kế Nội Thất 3D (3DS Max) - Thiết Kế Quảng Cáo
full_text_jd:
Mô tả công việc
Công ty chuyên sản xuất và xuất khẩu các sản phẩm nguyên liệu gỗ như Ván gỗ, mặt bàn bếp, và các sản phẩm từ gỗ khác.
Làm việc trong bộ phận marketing, hiểu và thực hiện các yêu cầu thiết kế quảng cáo.
Thiết kế, làm demo vật liệu quảng cáo cho công ty (banner, poster,…), print materials (flyer, brochure,…), sales-kit hỗ trợ mục tiêu kinh doanh và marketing.
Chủ yếu là công việc dựng hình 3D, hoặc lấy file 3Dsmax nhà ở/ nhà hàng, sau đó ốp vật liệu các tấm ván gỗ, tấm đá lên các thiết bị tủ bếp, bàn, kệ, tủ -> render thành các file hình ứng dụng vật liệu, để làm quảng cáo.
Thành thạo các phần mềm thiết kế như Photoshop/Ai, 3DS Max…
Thành thạo AutoCAD, REVIT, RHINO và BLENDER hoặc các kỹ năng tạo mô hình 3D khác là một lợi thế.
Áp dụng các kỹ thuật, công nghệ và vật liệu thiết kế 3D mới để tăng cường tính đổi mới.
Tìm kiếm phản hồi để cải thiện quy trình thiết kế và đề xuất cải tiến quy trình nhằm nâng cao hiệu quả và độ chính xác.
Khả năng chụp hình ảnh sản phẩm, chụp hình ảnh quảng cáo tốt.
Các công việc khác liên quan vị trí theo yêu cầu.

• Bằng Cử nhân chuyên ngành Kiến trúc, Thiết kế công nghiệp, Thiết kế nội thất, Thiết kế đồ họa hoặc chuyên ngành liên quan.
• Có ít nhất 2 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc trong lĩnh vực Thiết kế 3D, có danh mục đầu tư thể hiện chuyên môn về mô phỏng và hình ảnh hóa 3D.
• Thể hiện sự quen thuộc với các công cụ 3D theo kinh nghiệm trước đó.
• Kỹ năng giao tiếp, ứng xử tốt và khả năng cộng tác hiệu quả với các nhóm chức năng khác nhau.
• Khả năng phát triển trong môi trường có nhịp độ nhanh và thích ứng với các yêu cầu thiết kế thay đổi.

MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC
Product Manager (PM) phụ trách mảng Web & Mobile App sẽ là người định hướng phát triển sản phẩm số (website và ứng dụng di động), đảm bảo sản phẩm có trải nghiệm người dùng tốt, đáp ứng nhu cầu thị trường và mục tiêu kinh doanh.
TRÁCH NHIỆM CHÍNH
• Thu thập, phân tích nhu cầu người dùng để lên ý tưởng và xác định tính năng phù hợp cho sản phẩm web/app.
• Xây dựng roadmap sản phẩm và quản lý backlog: xác định tính năng ưu tiên theo từng giai đoạn.
• Làm việc trực tiếp với team thiết kế (UI/UX) và đội ngũ phát triển (developer) để đảm bảo sản phẩm được triển khai đúng yêu cầu và đúng thời gian.
• Phối hợp kiểm thử (QA) và đảm bảo chất lượng sản phẩm trước khi ra mắt.
• Theo dõi hiệu suất sản phẩm sau khi phát hành (tracking user engagement, retention, conversion, v.v.).
• Nghiên cứu xu hướng công nghệ và hành vi người dùng trên nền tảng web & mobile để cập nhật và tối ưu sản phẩm.
• Làm việc với team marketing và sales để xây dựng kế hoạch ra mắt sản phẩm, truyền thông và thu hút người dùng.
• Thu thập phản hồi người dùng sau khi ra mắt để cải tiến liên tục.

Chuyên môn:
• Tốt nghiệp các ngành liên quan đến Công nghệ thông tin, Thiết kế số, Kinh doanh số, ...
• Có kinh nghiệm tối thiểu 2 năm làm PM trong lĩnh vực phát triển web hoặc app mobile.
• Am hiểu quy trình phát triển phần mềm Agile/Scrum.
• Có kiến thức về trải nghiệm người dùng (UX) và thiết kế giao diện (UI).
• Ưu tiên ứng viên có kinh nghiệm triển khai sản phẩm sử dụng React, Flutter, hoặc các nền tảng phát triển web/app phổ biến.
• Có khả năng phân tích dữ liệu người dùng từ các công cụ như Google Analytics, Firebase, Mixpanel,...
• Sử dụng thành thạo các công cụ quản lý công việc: Jira, Notion, Figma, Trello, ...

job_title: Quality Engineer Lead (Up to 30 Months of Salary Annually)
full_text_jd:
ABOUT THE ROLE
Crossian is a high-growth technology-driven e-commerce business. Behind our success is our people. As a start-up formed in 2020, we have created a fast-paced and dynamic environment, enabling our people to reach $100 million of revenue in 2024, a cumulative average growth rate of over
1000%
in just under 4 years. Our mission now is to harness the power of technology to develop a direct-to-consumer approach and enhance customer lifetime value.
We are looking for a skilled
Quality Engineer Lead
to join our team and ensure the delivery of high-quality software products. This role combines manual and automated testing expertise, technical acumen, and collaboration skills to maintain product excellence across the development lifecycle. As a full-stack QC Engineer, you will work closely with product managers, developers, and stakeholders to test and improve our systems, ensuring an exceptional user experience and alignment with business goals.
WHAT YOU WILL DO
Testing and Quality Assurance:
- Design, develop, and execute test plans and test cases to ensure comprehensive coverage of product requirements.
- Perform functional, integration, regression, and system testing for both frontend and backend systems.
- Create and maintain detailed reports on testing progress, defects, and outcomes.
- Review and refine test strategies to optimize quality and efficiency.
- Ensure cross-browser, cross-platform, and device compatibility for applications.
Automation Testing:
- Develop, implement, and maintain automated test scripts using tools like Cucumber, Serenity BDD, and Playwright.
- API testing is conducted using tools such as Postman and performance testing with JMeter.
- Collaborate with the DevOps team to integrate automated tests into CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Git.
- Leverage programming skills in Java or JavaScript to enhance testing frameworks.
Collaboration and Delivery:
- Collaborate with BAs, developers, and product managers to understand requirements, provide input, and ensure alignment.
- Act as a quality advocate, focusing on delivering features that meet user needs and maintain high standards.
- Evaluate product readiness and release timelines based on test results and team discussions.
Leadership and Influence:
- Share quality-focused practices and promote a quality-first mindset within the team.
- Mentor team members on testing techniques and workflows to enhance overall quality.
- Ensure workflows and processes are followed consistently and improve them when necessary.
Continuous Monitoring and Improvement:
- Monitor product performance and user feedback in production environments to identify improvement areas.
- Stay updated with industry trends, tools, and best practices to continually improve testing processes.
- Drive initiatives to improve product quality, user satisfaction, and team productivity.

WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR
Education:
- Bachelor's Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field from a reputable university.
Experience:
- Minimum of
4 years of experience
as a Software Tester or QC Engineer, with significant exposure to both
manual
and
automated
testing.
Technical Skills:
- Proficient in
coding
with the ability to learn and apply automation testing tools.
- Deep understanding of
APIs/Web-services
and familiarity with testing tools such as Postman, BrowserStack, and curl.
- Knowledge of
Agile/Scrum
methodologies and practices like TDD/BDD.
Tools and Documentation:
- Proficient with
Atlassian
tools (Jira, Confluence) and mock-up tools (e.g., Figma, draw.io,..).
- Ability to write Software Development Requirement Documents and Functional Specifications.
- Experience with test
automation
frameworks (e.g., Playwright, Cucumber, cypress.io,..) is a plus.
Soft Skills:
- Excellent
Problem-Solving
skills and
Critical Thinking.
- Outstanding
Communication
and
Documentation
skills.
- Ability to work collaboratively in a
fast-paced, Agile
environment.
- Proactive and
self-motivated
with a strong sense of
ownership
.
Preferred (but not required)
-
ISTQB
certification or equivalent.
- Experience in the
eCommerce
industry.
- Familiarity with
CI/CD
pipelines.
- Proficiency in
English
.
WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT
Exceptional Total Compensation Package
- Up to 30 months of salary per year through competitive salary packages and performance-based bonuses.
- Full salary during probation & Guaranteed 13th month salary
- 12 days work-from-home & 12 days of paid annual leave, plus seniority paid leave
- Global health insurance package for yourself and direct family members, plus annual health checkup
Growth Opportunities
- Hands-on exposure to cutting-edge technologies and complex system architecture in a global-scale project.
- Clear career advancement pathways and access to continuous professional development programs.
Global Vision
- Contribute to projects that redefine how brands connect with consumers globally.
- Opportunity to work on challenging problems in data analytics, customer engagement, and operational efficiency.

About UOB
United Overseas Bank Limited (UOB) is a leading bank in Asia with a global network of more than 500 branches and offices in 19 countries and territories in Asia Pacific, Europe and North America. In Asia, we operate through our head office in Singapore and banking subsidiaries in China, Indonesia, Malaysia, Thailand and Vietnam, as well as branches and offices. Our history spans more than 80 years. Over this time, we have been guided by our values – Honorable, Enterprising, United and Committed. This means we always strive to do what is right, build for the future, work as one team and pursue long-term success. It is how we work, consistently, be it towards the company, our colleagues or our customers.
About the Department
We design and provide products and services that empower our customers to enjoy greater banking convenience while they extract more value from their money. We are focused on promoting and developing healthy saving and investment practices across generations.
Job Responsibilities
•	Customer Engagement: Develop and execute digital engagement strategies to drive active usage of the TMRW app; Analyze customer behavior, preferences, and needs to tailor engagement campaigns; Collaborate with marketing, product, and customer experience teams to create seamless digital journeys.
•	Campaign Management: Plan and execute personalized engagement campaigns via in-app notifications, emails, and other digital channels; Track and optimize campaign performance based on data insights and KPIs; Create innovative and interactive ways to engage users across different touchpoints.
•	User Experience Optimization: Work closely with UX/UI teams to identify areas of improvement within the app to boost engagement; Use analytics tools to monitor customer interactions and gather insights for UX enhancements; Provide feedback and recommendations for continuous app improvement.
•	Data & Insights: Leverage analytics platforms and customer data to inform engagement strategies; Create reports on engagement performance, identifying areas of success and opportunities for optimization; Analyze VoC (Voice of Customer) and other research methods to improve user satisfaction and reduce churn.
•	Collaboration & Innovation: Collaborate with cross-functional teams including marketing, IT, and customer service to ensure alignment on digital engagement goals; Stay updated with digital banking trends, competitor offerings, and new technologies to propose innovative engagement methods.

Job Requirements
•	Bachelor’s degree in marketing, business, or a related field.
•	1-3 years of experience in digital engagement, customer experience, or related roles, preferably in digital banking or fintech.
•	Strong understanding of digital platforms, especially mobile apps and customer journey mapping.
•	Data-driven mindset with experience in using analytics tools
•	Excellent communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively with different teams.
•	Creativity and problem-solving skills to engage users in innovative way
Be a part of UOB Family
UOB is an equal opportunity employer. UOB does not discriminate on the basis of a candidate's age, race, gender, color, religion, physical or mental disability, or other non-merit factors. All employment decisions at UOB are based on business needs, job requirements and qualifications. If you require any assistance or accommodations to be made for the recruitment process, please inform us when you submit your online application.
Apply now and make a difference.

We are seeking a talented Mobile Development Engineer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a passion for creating high-quality mobile applications and a strong understanding of mobile development frameworks and best practices.
Key Responsibilities:
• Design, develop, and maintain mobile applications for various platforms (Android, iOS).
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
• Ensure performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
• Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.
• Work with outside data sources and APIs.
• Translate designs and wireframes into high-quality code.
• Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.
• Document each aspect of a system or application as a reference for future upgrades and maintenance.

• Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
• 1+ years' experience as a Mobile Developer.
• In-depth knowledge of programming languages such as TypeScript, Angular frameworks, Java, React Native, Ionic.
• Experience with third-party libraries and APIs.
• Strong understanding of the full mobile development lifecycle.
• Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Vua Nệm
full_text_jd:
I. POSITION SUMMARY:
We’re seeking a Junior Business Intelligence Analyst to support data-driven decision-making across departments. This role is ideal for individuals with strong analytical skills, a service mindset, and the ability to use tools like Power BI and SQL effectively.
This position offers an open opportunity to work with a variety of sophisticated tools such as BigQuery, PowerBI, ArcGIS, Marketing Cloud, ERP, and CRM systems. Furthermore, you'll delve into complex datasets including customer profiles, digital footprints, transactions, inventory, and financial data to deliver essential insights for informed decision-making. Moreover, this role offers the opportunity to leverage data to solve challenges that drive growth opportunities for the company.
II. KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:
1. Build and Maintain BI Reporting System:
-    Create and update dashboards and BI reports for teams like sales, marketing,
and operations.
-     Ensure reports are accurate, user-friendly, and meet business needs.
2. Data Analysis:
-     Analyze datasets to identify trends and insights.
-     Present findings to management to guide decision-making.
3. Support Strategic Planning and Decision Making:
-     Assist with analyzing store performance, marketing campaigns, and customer
behavior.
-    Provide insights to improve operations and drive business growth.
4. Documentation and Training:
-    Develop user guides and a business glossary to help teams understand and use
BI tools.
-   Train stakeholders to enhance data literacy

•   Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Business Analytics, Finance, Statistics, Computer Science, or a related field.
•   1-2 years of experience in business intelligence, data analysis, or a related role, preferably in the retail industry.
•   Knowledge of Power BI, SQL, and Excel.
•   Familiarity with data visualization tools (Tableau, Looker, etc.) is a plus.
•   Basic understanding of Python or R is a bonus.
•   Strong problem-solving and analytical abilities.
•   Clear communication and teamwork skills.
•   Detail-oriented with a commitment to accuracy.
•   Good communication and presentation skills, with the ability to convey data insights to non-technical stakeholders.

10. Xây dựng kho bài học kinh nghiệm/ kho thông tin và tài sản tri thức trong quá trình triển khai các dự án.

JOB OVERVIEW:
Aspire, a local real estate investor and developer focused on long term residential with its offices headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, is seeking an experienced and innovative IT & Business Systems Manager to lead our organization's IT operations and digital transformation initiatives. This pivotal role bridges technology and business functions, ensuring our IT infrastructure, systems, and processes support operational excellence and align with strategic goals.
As the IT & Business Systems Manager, you will oversee the management and optimization of IT infrastructure, provide technical support, ensure cybersecurity, IT risk governance and compliance, and implement business systems to drive efficiency and innovation. You will work closely with cross-functional teams, vendors, and stakeholders, playing a key role in shaping Aspire’s digital future.
If you are a forward-thinking professional with a strong technical background, entrepreneurial mindset, outstanding problem-solving skills, and a passion for real estate and driving business success through technology, we invite you to join our dynamic team.
DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:
IT Infrastructure Management Responsibilities:
• Partner with vendors to oversee Aspire's IT infrastructure, including servers, networks, hardware, and software.
• Ensure optimal network and system uptime to meet operational requirements.
• Manage and maintain internal IT systems and cloud-based applications for Aspire and its properties.
• Oversee hardware and software acquisition, installation, and maintenance.
• Plan and execute IT system upgrades, expansions, and migrations.
• Monitor and troubleshoot system performance issues as they arise.
Help Desk Support:
• Provide technical assistance to employees for hardware, software, and networking issues, working closely with our MSP.
• Respond to and monitor help desk ticket resolution in a timely and professional manner.
• Offer troubleshooting, problem resolution, and user training to the business.
• Maintain documentation for troubleshooting procedures and common issues.
• Support the setup and configuration of end-user devices, such as computers and mobile devices.
• Responsible for the setup and configuration of technology enabled properties with our business partners.
Risk Management and Compliance
• Responsible for developing and implementing IT policies, procedures, and best practices to ensure security, reliability, and efficiency.
• Contribute to the creation of disaster recovery and business continuity plans to minimize IT disruptions.
• Work with vendors to ensure cybersecurity practices align with organizational standards through regular security assessments.
• Coordinate and ensure compliance with IT governance frameworks, guidelines and be the main point of contact for IT control reviews.
• Coordinate and lead any external reviews and testing on the IT environment of Aspire.
Business Systems Implementation:
• Drive digital transformation initiatives in alignment with business objectives and timelines.
• Identify business requirements and explore technology solutions to enhance operational efficiency.
• Evaluate existing systems, workflows, and processes for improvements.
• Research and recommend innovative digital technologies to support business goals.
• Select and implement business systems that align with the organization’s vision.
• Work closely with the regional IT teams in group wide IT initiatives.
• Optimize IT and business functions through process improvements.
• Leverage Python to automate repetitive tasks, streamline processes, and enhance efficiency across departments.

Qualification
• Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field.
Professional Experience
• Minimum of 5-7 years of experience in IT infrastructure management, business systems implementation, and help desk operations.
• Proven track record of managing IT projects and leading digital transformation initiatives.
Skills and Competencies
• Strong understanding of networking protocols, including TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP, HTTP/HTTPS, and FTP.
• Expertise in network security, including firewalls, VPNs, Intrusion Detection/ Prevention Systems (IDS/IPS), and SIEM solutions.
• Proficient in using and managing cloud computing platforms, such as Microsoft Azure.
• Proven ability to troubleshoot and provide technical support for hardware, software, and network-related issues.
• Extensive experience in IT security practices, risk management, and ensuring compliance with cybersecurity requirements.
• Hands-on experience with system upgrades, migrations, and disaster recovery planning to ensure operational continuity.
• Knowledge of emerging digital technologies, trends, and best practices for optimizing business systems and processes.
• Demonstrated ability to oversee and collaborate with MSPs, ensuring adherence to service-level agreements (SLAs) and maintaining high-quality service delivery.
• Strong vendor management skills to evaluate, negotiate, and establish contracts with MSPs.
• Expertise in monitoring MSP performance, addressing escalations, and ensuring alignment with organizational goals and IT strategy.
• Proficiency in preparing IT systems and documentation for internal audits, ensuring compliance with organizational policies and regulatory standards.
• Experience in facilitating audit processes by collaborating with internal auditors and addressing findings or recommendations.
• Strong understanding of IT governance and risk management frameworks to meet audit requirements effectively.
• Familiarity with Python—particularly for workflow automation and improving operational efficiency—is a plus, but not required.
• Strong proficiency in English communication, with the ability to clearly convey technical concepts to diverse audiences.
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, fostering collaboration and building strong professional relationships.

Microsoft Azure offers a wide range of products and services designed to help businesses build, deploy, and manage applications through Microsoft’s global network of data centers. company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Công Nghệ VVT
full_text_jd:
•	Xây dựng đáp ứng kỹ thuật phục vụ các dự án viễn thông
•	Tham gia triển khai các dự án viễn thông theo yêu cầu của Công ty
•	Phối hợp với các bộ phận liên quan để thực hiện các công việc kỹ thuật trong dự án.
•	Hỗ trợ kỹ thuật, tư vấn giải pháp tối ưu cho khách hàng
•	Nghiên cứu, đề xuất và triển khai các giải pháp công nghệ mới phục vụ nhu cầu phát triển của công ty.
•	Thực hiện các nhiệm vụ khác theo sự phân công của cấp trên.

•	Trình độ học vấn:
Tốt nghiệp đại học chuyên ngành Điện tử – Viễn thông, Công nghệ Hàng không vũ trụ, Hoặc lĩnh vực liên quan.
•	Kinh nghiệm:
Ưu tiên ứng viên có kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực thông tin vệ tinh.
•	Kiến thức chuyên môn:
-	Hiểu biết về hệ thống mạng viễn thông di động,  công nghệ truyền dẫn (quang, vệ tinh, vô tuyến, IP,…).
-	Có kiến thức về hệ thống thông tin vệ tinh là một lợi thế.
-	Khả năng phân tích, đánh giá dữ liệu kỹ thuật trong lĩnh vực điện tử viễn thông.
•	Kỹ năng:
-	Kỹ năng giao tiếp tiếng Anh tốt, đọc hiểu tài liệu chuyên ngành
-	Có khả năng làm việc nhóm và làm việc độc lập.
-	Kỹ năng xử lý sự cố nhanh chóng, chủ động, sáng tạo trong công việc.
-	Thành thạo tin học văn phòng và các phần mềm hỗ trợ kỹ thuật.
•	Yêu cầu khác:
-	Có tinh thần trách nhiệm cao, chủ động, chịu được áp lực công việc.
-	Sẵn sàng đi công tác khi cần.
QUYỀN LỢI:
•	Mức lương:
thỏa thuận
•	Thử việc hưởng nguyên lương.
•	Xét tăng lương định kỳ, thưởng theo hiệu suất công việc.
•	Được đào tạo và tham gia các khóa học nâng cao chuyên môn.
•	Cơ hội làm việc trong môi trường chuyên nghiệp, có lộ trình thăng tiến rõ ràng.
•	Hưởng đầy đủ các chế độ bảo hiểm xã hội, bảo hiểm y tế sau thử việc.
•	Nghỉ lễ, tết theo quy định của pháp luật.
•	Hỗ trợ chi phí đi công tác theo chính sách công ty.

Are you a technical talent, and do you want to strengthen our embedded hardware team?
Then we are looking for you!
Job Description:
For our office location in Haiphong, we are looking for a PCB Designer / hardware engineer electronics who will join our development department for the design of electronics for our automation, navigation, and electrical propulsion products. You will be working together with the engineering, sales, and production departments and report to the Manager of Hardware Development
Your Responsibilities:
•	Designing electronics for new products which includes schematic design and PCB routing
•	Prototype testing of electronics for new products
•	Improvement/redesign of our existing electronics
•	Maintain contact with suppliers to be informed about new parts/technologies
•	Making production manuals and test descriptions for the production and test department
•	Making programs for SMD machines in our PCB assembly department

•	Bachelor’s degree with a specialty in electronics or electrical engineering
•	Several years of relevant work or hobby experience
•	Interested in working with automation systems
•	Customer-oriented attitude
•	Good communications skills
•	Independent, result-oriented, accurate, and positive attitude
•	Good knowledge of English
•	Knowledge of design tools (Schematic and PCB layout)
•	Good analytical skills
•	Teamwork and positive attitude
Work Conditions:
•	An international, informal, and collegial working atmosphere.
•	Enthusiastic colleagues who are always ready to help you
•	Competitive salary
•	Good secondary employment package
•	Training and personal development opportunities
•	Pension
•	You will start with a 3-month training course in the Netherlands with a salary and a daily allowance.
For more information, you can contact Ms. Tran Bich Phuong (HR manager)
PRAXIS AUTOMATION VIETNAM CO., LTD
Room 501, 508, 510, 511 Taiyo Building, No.97 Bach Dang, Thuong Ly Ward, Hong Bang District, Hai Phong City, Vietnam

Your guide to ship automation and navigation”. With this motto Praxis Automation Technology develops, produces and delivers innovative automation and navigation products for all types of sea worthy vessels. We were founded in 1965 and have since become a well-known name in marine automation.
To strengthen our innovation department we are looking for an enthusiastic
C / C++ Software Engineer
What will you do?
Design real time multi-tasking measuring and regulating systems for the maritime sector. The work includes:
•	Developing, documenting and
testing of system software
•	Creation of graphic screen layout and handlings for the human machine interfaces
•	Embedded development for our hardware I/O modules
•	Research & design network protocols
How do you handle that?
•	You consult with colleagues from project engineering department to develop from definition phase until delivery of software
•	You Work independently on software module programming and testing
•	You act as an internal source of information for all software technical issues about the software modules assigned to you
•	You follow developments and trends in software and automation in shipbuilding
Team
As a Software Engineer you work within the Innovation team. You also frequently discuss with colleagues from Project Engineering department. You report to the Manager Innovation.

We ask
•	Someone with several years of relevant work experience
•	You have a completed a relevant education, preferably ICT or Electrical Engineering
•	Knowledge of one or more of these programming languages: C / C++ / C# (C-sharp)
•	Knowledge of programming with Visual Studio
•	Knowledge and interest in electrical products and solutions
•	Someone who is communicative
•	That you work independently, result-oriented and accurately
•	Good analytical ability
We offer
•	An independent position in a flexible and highly international high-tech environment
•	An informal, collegial working atmosphere
•	A market-based salary
•	A good secondary employment package
•	Study opportunities to further deepen you in the field.
We look forward to your application letter with interest. Only applications consisting of a CV and motivation letter will be processed.
For more information, you can contact Mrs. Tran Bich Phuong (Assistant Manager Praxis Automation Technology, Vietnam)
PRAXIS AUTOMATION VIETNAM CO., LTD
Room 501, 508, 510, 511 – 5th floor – Taiyo Building - No.97 Bach Dang
Ha Ly Ward, Hong Bang District, Hai Phong City

company: The Representative Office of Four Hands LLC In Ho Chi Minh City
full_text_jd:
Location
: Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Type
: Full Time
Experience
: 4+ years
Four Hands, a leader in lifestyle home furnishings, is looking for a BI Supervisor. The BI Supervisor, International will report to the International Product Development Operations and Analytics Manager, International and lead a team of BI Analysts who support International Operations through the design, development and maintenance of reports and dashboards in Power BI. Working within the International Product Data & Analytics team, the role will actively engage with key stakeholders and process owners to oversee and engage in the build of the reports and data flows. This role requires a leader willing to take initiative and who has a strong background in business analytics, data modeling and Power BI.
In This Role:
•	Plan, coordinate, and supervise the International BI team’s activities, in alignment with the needs of senior management and overall company objectives.
•	Engage with stakeholders and subject matter experts to critically review and document business requirements, translating them into technical specifications.
•	Evaluate cross-departmental business needs and implications, incorporating them into the specifications to ensure data accuracy and integrity across all BI systems.
•	Oversee and guide the team members throughout the projects, communicating to stakeholders as needed throughout the project.
•	Build strong, positive, and collaborative relationships with other teams, departments and within the International BI team itself.

The Ideal Candidate:
•	Bachelor's degree in Business, Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field;
•	4+ years’ experience in BI or data analytics with at least 2 years in a team lead or supervision role (2-3 team members).
•	Strong analytical and creative problem-solving skills, where you can focus on the details without losing site of the “bigger picture”.
•	Ability to understand business questions/requests and be able to suggest proper BI solutions which are measurable and scalable.
•	Strong verbal, written, and interpersonal communication skills (English proficiency required).
•	Adaptability and problem-solving are paramount skills.
•	Proficiency in Power BI – the ability to advise and troubleshoot with the team is essential.
•	Proficiency in SQL – the ability to do code reviews with the team is essential, along with writing your own queries.
•	Domain knowledge is advantageous – Product Development, Supply Chain, Quality.
•	Familiarity with KNIME is advantageous.
Benefits:
•	Competitive salary with 13th month salary, international profit share bonus and annual salary review;
•	Annual health check, insurance according to Labor Law and extra Bao Viet Insurance package;
•	Annual leave: 12 days off plus 1 birthday leave per year;
•	Public holidays: according to Labor Law and extra 1 day off for Christmas
•	Working environment: dynamic, friendly environments with working time flexibility.

job_title: Trưởng Phòng Nghiên Cứu & Phát Triển Ứng Dụng - Khối Công Nghệ Thông Tin, Hội Sở
company: Ngân Hàng TNHH Indovina – Hội Sở
full_text_jd:
Quản lý và điều hành hoạt động của Phòng Nghiên cứu & Phát triển Ứng dụng nhằm đảm bảo hoàn thành kế hoạch được giao theo chiến lược của IVB tại từng thời kỳ
1.	Lập kế hoạch/ ngân sách hoạt động
- Triển khai và quản lý các chương trình ứng dụng tại IVB.
- Quản lý, giám sát thực hiện kế hoạch hoạt động của Phòng theo phân công.
2.	Quản lý, giám sát thực hiện các công việc thuộc chức năng nhiệm vụ của Phòng
- Thực hiện/ tham gia việc xây dựng, phát triển, duy trì, nâng cấp/ chỉnh sửa các chương trình phần mềm/ứng dụng/hệ thống CoreBanking trong ngân hàng đảm bảo hoạt động CNTT được ổn định và phát triển.
- Thiết lập, theo dõi và duy trì hoạt động liên tục ổn định hệ thống CoreBanking và tất cả các chương trình phần mềm ứng dụng của Ngân hàng.
- Quản lý bộ phận nghiên cứu và phát triển ứng dụng.
- Thực hiện theo dõi, quản lý thay đổi hệ thống, lưu trữ và bảo quản mã nguồn, tài liệu kỹ thuật an toàn, bảo mật.
- Quản lý phiên bản phần mềm được xây dựng.
- Nghiên cứu, xây dựng kế hoạch triển khai các dự án liên quan hệ thống ứng dụng CNTT, tham gia lựa chọn nhà cung cấp giải pháp, triển khai thực hiện, quản lý kết quả triển khai, đánh giá kết quả và chấp nhận kết quả triển khai dự án.
- Xây dựng, đánh giá và cập nhật các chính sách, quy định, quy trình vận hành, hướng dẫn sử dụng liên quan các hệ thống ứng dụng, cơ sở dữ liệu và hệ thống Corebanking.
- Xây dựng, quản lý và khai thác các hệ thống thông tin nền và các nguồn tài nguyên thông tin phục vụ cho hoạt động của Ngân hàng.
- Thường xuyên kiểm tra môi trường hoạt động của chương trình ứng dụng, đưa ra những cảnh báo có thể gặp phải và đề xuất cách thức khắc phục.
- Thống kê, tổng hợp các loại rủi ro, các trường hợp lỗi trong thanh toán điện tử và các chương trình ứng dụng trên toàn Ngân hàng; đề xuất giải pháp hướng phòng ngừa, biện pháp xử lý và khắc phục;
- Hỗ trợ các khối, phòng ban xây dựng báo cáo tuân thủ và hệ thống báo cáo quản trị
- Phối hợp với các khối, phòng, ban liên quan để xây dựng, triển khai các phần mềm ứng dụng.
- Lập kế hoạch bảo trì định kỳ các chương trình phần mềm ứng dụng.
- Tham mưu cho Ban giám đốc khối về các kế hoạch phát triển sản phẩm, dịch vụ có liên quan.
3.	Quản lý nhân viên
- Phân giao KPIs cho từng CBNV trong bộ phận.
- Theo dõi và quản lý mức độ hoàn thành công việc so với ngân sách và chỉ tiêu; Định kỳ đánh giá kết quả công tác của cán bộ nhân viên của Phòng.
- Hướng dẫn CBNV, xây dựng và tổ chức thực hiện các kế hoạch huấn luyện, đào tạo nghiệp vụ, nâng cao nghiệp vụ cho CBNV thuộc Phòng.
4.	Khác
- Thực hiện các nhiệm vụ khác theo phân công của Ban Giám đốc khối.

Yêu cầu chung:
- Tốt nghiệp Đại học trở lên chuyên ngành CNTT hoặc các ngành có liên quan.
- Tiếng Anh: Thành thạo, đáp ứng yêu cầu công việc.
Kinh nghiệm:
- Tối thiểu 5–10 năm làm việc trong lĩnh vực phát triển ứng dụng hoặc công nghệ thông tin tại ngân hàng/tổ chức tài chính.
- 2–3 năm kinh nghiệm quản lý nhóm phát triển sản phẩm số (ví dụ: app mobile, hệ thống thanh toán, API banking).
Kỹ năng chuyên môn
Thành thạo phương pháp Agile, DevOps, và vòng đời phát triển phần mềm (SDLC).
Am hiểu kiến trúc hệ thống ngân hàng lõi (Core Banking), quy định an ninh mạng (ví dụ: PCI DSS) và xu hướng fintech, am hiểu hệ thống Core Banking Flexcube là 1 lợi thế.
Có khả năng cấu hình, tùy chỉnh và nâng cấp Core Banking theo yêu cầu nghiệp vụ ngân hàng
Thành thạo Java, J2EE để phát triển ứng dụng web và tích hợp API
Khả năng thiết kế các giải pháp và tích hợp các hệ thống thông tin trong ngân hàng
Năng lực lãnh đạo
Kinh nghiệm xây dựng chiến lược phát triển sản phẩm số theo mục tiêu kinh doanh .
Kỹ năng phối hợp đa phòng ban (Nghiệp vụ, Tuân thủ, Bảo mật) để triển khai dự án.
Khả năng dẫn dắt đội ngũ 10–15 nhân viên bao gồm lập trình viên, tester, BA..

Job Description:
The company, a leader in digital transformation, digital banking, and digital payments, is seeking a
Technology Service Senior Director (COO)
to drive operational and technological excellence across
the organization. This role will lead the integration of cutting-edge technologies, optimize operations,
and ensure seamless service delivery across company business units. The COO will be
instrumental in aligning technology with business goals to enhance efficiency and competitive
advantage.
Key Responsibilities:
Strategic Planning & Technology Leadership:
• Shape and execute operational strategies to ensure company remains a leader in the IT
industry. Align business units to achieve synergy and efficiency across the organization..
• Collaborate closely with the CEO to define and drive organizational priorities and long-term
goals.
• Develop and implement a comprehensive technology strategy that supports the organization's
operational goals and long-term vision.
• Oversee the adoption of emerging technologies to enhance service delivery and drive digital
transformation.
• Ensure robust IT infrastructure and systems are in place to support scalable operations across
all units.
• Collaborate with the CTO to identify and implement solutions that streamline operations and
improve customer experience.
• Monitor trends in technology and proactively recommend initiatives to keep company
at the forefront of innovation.
• Collaborate with the CEO and executive team to align technology operations with the
company’s overall vision and business objectives.
• Develop and execute operational strategies to scale services and expand market reach.
Innovation and Technology Integration:
• Champion the integration of advanced technologies to enhance operational efficiency and
customer experience.
• Collaborate with the CTO and technical teams to ensure operational strategies leverage
cutting-edge solutions.
• Drive initiatives that enhance digital transformation efforts across all business units.
• Drive the integration of automation, AI, and data analytics to optimize operational workflows.
• Lead the digitalization of internal and external processes to increase efficiency and reduce
costs.
• Oversee the deployment and maintenance of cloud-based services to ensure operational
flexibility and scalability.
• Develop metrics and monitoring systems to track the performance and reliability of
technology services.
Client and Product Technology Oversight:
• Oversee the technological aspects of product development, ensuring solutions are innovative,
reliable, and aligned with market demands.
• Work closely with internal departments and other units to deliver customized tech-driven
solutions for clients.
• Maintain a focus on user experience and ensure that technology services meet or exceed client
expectations.
Operations Management
• Lead the development and optimization of operational processes to meet business objectives
and industry standards.
• Oversee the implementation of systems and infrastructure that support scalable and
sustainable growth.
• Ensure operational policies comply with legal regulations and industry best practices.
Performance and Budget Accountability:
• Develop and manage budgets for technology operations, ensuring cost-effective delivery of
high-quality services.
• Analyze and report on operational metrics, making data-driven decisions to enhance
performance.
• Provide regular updates to the CEO and board on the progress of technology initiatives and
their impact on the business.
• Other tasks according to assignment from direct managers.

Job requirements:
• Bachelor’s degree or above in Business Administration, Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field; MBA or equivalent advanced degree preferred.
• 10+ years of experience in operational leadership roles within the software, technology, or tech delivery industry.
• Proven track record of managing complex operations in a fast-paced, growth-oriented environment.
• Strong understanding of software development processes, including Agile and DevOps methodologies, as well as tech delivery services.
• Excellent strategic thinking, problem-solving, and decision-making skills.
• Exceptional leadership and team management abilities, with experience in building and leading diverse teams.
• Strong financial acumen and experience managing budgets and KPIs.
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.

job_title: Unit Head of Digital Business Intelligence & Sales planning
company: Công Ty Tài Chính TNHH Ngân Hàng TMCP Sài Gòn - Hà Nội (SHBFinance)
full_text_jd:
• Partner with Finance, Portfolio, Customer Value Management, Risk Division to develop and implement strategic digital sales plans to achieve digital sales volume, PnL, Risk and quality of portfolio targets
• Define and analyze the full lifecycle impact of digital business, including growth sources and mobile app performance, such as user retention and monetization.
• Recommend new sales strategies and tactics based on data-driven analysis to enhance customer acquisition and retention and overall business growth.
• Provide sales forecasts, projections, and actionable insights to improve sales outcomes.
• Monitor and continuously improve sales performance metrics, ensuring data accuracy across all reports and business intelligence systems.
• Collaborate with marketing, product, and sales teams to align data-driven sales strategies with overall business objectives.
• Maintain and update performance dashboards and reports for leadership review.
• Conduct market research and competitor analysis to inform sales planning and competitive positioning.
• Collaborate with IT to ensure accurate data tracking and own the digital sales data lifecycle from acquisition to retention and monetization.

A. Knowledge capacity, Experience
• Degree: BA or Master (preferred). Major: Economic, Banking, Marketing, Technology
• Experience: At least 05 years of experience at similar position at e-commerce companies, Digital Banking, Consumer Finance, Fintech, Edutech, Insutech, etc.
• Language: English: Fluent in Listening - Speaking - Reading - Writing
B. Competence, Professional skills
• In-depth knowledge and experience of sales planning and data analysis; Proven track record of effective budget planning and management; Experience in data analytics, building dashboards and interpreting analytics reports and producing actionable insights; Experience working with and building consensus across cross-departmental teams
• Excellence in Communication skills
• Ability to manage complex projects with a diverse range of stakeholders including Domain Architect, Solution architect, Engineering, Operations, Data, Risk, Digital Sales, Legal and Compliance
• Good in Project management skill
• Collaboration: Excellent in working with and building consensus across cross-departmental teams

job_title: Online Ads Monetization Manager (Trưởng phòng Khai Thác Quảng Cáo Trực Tuyến)
full_text_jd:
Tối đa hóa doanh thu quảng cáo từ www.ThuVienPhapLuat.vn với lượng truy cập rất lớn (250 triệu pageviews/tháng), khai thác hiệu quả các nền tảng AdSense, AdX, Google Ad Manager, phối hợp đấu giá nhiều nguồn và tối ưu hiệu suất hiển thị.
Ứng viên có kinh nghiệm từng làm tại các Báo Điện tử và tham gia bán quảng cáo trực tiếp cho doanh nghiệp là ưu thế.
TRÁCH NHIỆM CHÍNH:
1. Phối hợp với lập trình viên để triển khai quy hoạch, cài đặt, tối ưu vị trí quảng cáo trên website (desktop và mobile).
2. Tham gia bán quảng cáo trực tiếp cho doanh nghiệp.
3. Quản lý, theo dõi và tối ưu toàn bộ hệ thống quảng cáo:
Google Ad Manager (GAM)
Google Ad Exchange (AdX)
Các SSP / DSP như MGID, ZMedia, Dable, UrekaMedia...
4. Tạo và vận hành các chiến lược đấu giá quảng cáo: thiết lập giá sàn (floor price), quản lý fill rate, A/B testing layout quảng cáo.
5. Phân tích hiệu quả quảng cáo theo từng vị trí (slot), thiết bị, thời gian, loại nội dung... để đưa ra đề xuất cải thiện (Viewability, CTR, RPM, CPM).
6. Làm việc với các đối tác quảng cáo (trong nước & quốc tế) để đấu giá hiệu quả hơn, đàm phán điều khoản chia sẻ doanh thu (revshare).
7. Xây dựng báo giá và tài liệu truyền thông (media kit) để hỗ trợ bộ phận kinh doanh bán quảng cáo trực tiếp cho khách hàng lớn.
8. Đề xuất công nghệ, công cụ hoặc đối tác mới giúp nâng cao năng suất và thu nhập từ quảng cáo.
9. Theo dõi xu hướng thị trường quảng cáo, cập nhật chính sách của Google, AdX, các SSP.

Kiến thức chuyên môn:
1. Từng tham gia các báo điện tử và bán quảng cáo trực tiếp cho doanh nghiệp, là ưu thế.
2. Hiểu rõ hệ sinh thái quảng cáo hiển thị (display ads): AdSense, Ad Manager, Ad Exchange, Header Bidding...
3. Biết cách cấu hình, đo lường, đánh giá hiệu quả từng loại quảng cáo trên website.
4. Có kiến thức về Viewability, CPM, CTR, Fill Rate, RPM, giá sàn, quy định quảng cáo...
5. Giao tiếp và đàm phán tốt với đối tác trong/ngoài nước.
6. Sử dụng tốt Google Analytics 4, Google Ad Manager UI, các công cụ báo cáo của MGID, Dable...
7. Có khả năng tư duy hệ thống và tối ưu đa nền tảng.
Ưu Tiên:
1. Từng làm việc trong lĩnh vực Publisher Ads, Digital Monetization, hoặc Online Advertising.

About UOB
United Overseas Bank Limited (UOB) is a leading bank in Asia with a global network of more than 500 branches and offices in 19 countries and territories in Asia Pacific, Europe and North America. Job Summary:
The Digital Platform Manager will oversee the management and optimization of our digital platforms. This role is responsible for ensuring seamless operations, managing change requests, and ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements. The ideal candidate will be detail-oriented, proactive in problem-solving, and capable of working collaboratively across teams.
Key Responsibilities:
•	Incident Management: Monitor digital platforms for incidents and issues; Raise tickets for any incidents related to digital platforms and work with relevant teams to resolve them promptly.
•	Change Management: Manage change requests effectively by clarifying requirements and ensuring all regulatory requirements are met; Collaborate with stakeholders to assess the impact of changes and communicate necessary adjustments.
•	User Acceptance Testing (UAT): Perform UAT to ensure that changes meet specified requirements; Sign off on changes before they are released to production, ensuring quality and compliance.
•	Downtime Management: Manage downtime effectively, ensuring timely notifications to all relevant stakeholders; Coordinate with technical teams to minimize impact and downtime duration.
•	Live Verification: Conduct live verification of digital platforms on weekends following downtime to ensure full functionality and performance.
•	Reporting: Complete all necessary regulatory reporting accurately and on time; Prepare and present management reports related to digital platform performance and incidents.

Qualifications
•	Bachelor’s degree in information technology, Business Management, or related field.
•	Minimum of 3 years’ experience in digital platforms management or a related role.
•	Strong understanding of incident and change management processes.
•	Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
•	Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams.
•	Strong communication skills, both written and verbal.
•	Familiarity with regulatory requirements related to digital platforms.
Skills:
•	Proficient in project management tools and methodologies.
•	Knowledge of UAT processes and methodologies.
•	Experience with monitoring tools for digital platforms.
•	Ability to manage multiple priorities and deadlines.
Be a part of UOB Family
UOB is an equal opportunity employer. UOB does not discriminate on the basis of a candidate's age, race, gender, color, religion, physical or mental disability, or other non-merit factors. All employment decisions at UOB are based on business needs, job requirements and qualifications. If you require any assistance or accommodations to be made for the recruitment process, please inform us when you submit your online application.
Apply now and make a difference.

KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES
To ensure smooth functioning of the local IT function, provide the necessary support in educating the users in the organisation and minimising any IT related breach / damage that may arise.
1. Ensure function of all local IT related matters and engage in effective incident management
•   Provide day-to-day IT support for end-users, including troubleshooting hardware,
software, and network issues
•   Maintain local IT infrastructure, such as network devices, and end-user equipment
•   Act as the first point of contact for IT incidents, when ServiceDesk unable to solve issues
•   Escalate unresolved issues to the global IT team when required, ensuring timely
communication
•   Participate in post-incident reviews and improvement plans
2. Ensure compliance with global IT standards, policies, and procedures
•   Deploy and maintain systems, tools, and updates as defined by the global IT team
•   Adhere to global cybersecurity and compliance guidelines
•   Localize global initiatives (e.g., translations, adapting to local regulatory requirements)
•   Share best practices & collaborate with other local IT teams in the region to standardize
approaches
•   Supporting regional IT initiatives led by the Asia IT team through regional collaboration
3. Provide user training & support to the local users
•   Educate local users about global IT systems, tools, and security practices.
•   Provide training during system rollouts and upgrades
4. Ensure effective inventory & asset management
•   Maintain an up-to-date inventory of all IT assets
•   Ensure proper lifecycle management of hardware and software
5. Maintain effective vendor and external party coordination for procurement, warranty claims,
or repairs as directed by the global team.
6. Build strong relationship with the local management team to ensure IT services meet
business needs, communicate IT goals, priorities, and challenges in alignment with global
directives and act as a bridge between local business units and the global IT team.
7. Manage Capex & Opex budget and
•   Ensure alignment of spending with global financial policies and strategic priorities.
•   Forecast and plan IT spending for projects, upgrades, and routine operations
•   Provide regular budget reports to Local management and Global IT
8. Local server room management:
•   Maintain the physical and environmental conditions of the local server room (e.g.,
temperature, humidity, and cleanliness)
•   Perform regular inspections to ensure hardware (servers, storage devices, network
switches) operates optimally
•   Coordinate with global IT and vendors for hardware installations, upgrades, or
replacements
•   Ensure proper cabling, labelling, and documentation for all server room equipment
•   Manage backup power systems, such as UPS and generators, and test them regularly
•   Implement access control and security measures to protect the server room

• Bachelor's degree in IT or related field
• 5 years of experience in a similar capacity in a multinational environment
• Proficiency in supporting operating systems and basic understanding of enterprise IT systems & collaboration tools
• Knowledge of network fundamentals and Routing Protocol
• Experience in troubleshooting hardware, familiarity with global ticketing systems
• Strong communication skills (spoken and written) in English and Vietnamese and the ability to converse well in Chinese would be advantageous
• Problem-solving and analytical thinking
• Customer service mindset and ability to handle user frustrations
• Project management skills
• Understanding of data privacy laws, software licensing, and local IT compliance requirements, basic knowledge of cybersecurity best practice,s and familiarity with global IT policies
• Knowledge of disaster recovery plans, business continuity protocols, and crisis management
• Knowledge of server room design, cooling systems, power management, and equipment lifecycle management.

company: Ngân Hàng TMCP Quốc Tế Việt Nam (VIB)
CÔNG TY TNHH QORVO VIỆT NAM
full_text_jd:
Qorvo Vietnam was established in 2004 and is an emerging leader in multi-billion-dollar power management and intelligent motor drive IC markets. The portfolio of analog and mixed signal System on Chips provides scalable core platforms used in charging and powering embedded digital control systems for industrial, commercial and consumer applications. Their expertise in Power Application Controllers (PAC) and Programmable Analog ICs significantly reduce solution size and cost, improve system reliability and shorten system development cycle-time. The team, which consists of a young and vibrant workforce innovates and enables technology breakthrough in the space of analog and mixed signal integrated circuit design.
RESPONSIBILITIES / AUTHORITIES:
• Qorvo’s Power Management (PM) team designs a broad range of analog power products which include Power Management Units (PMUs) for various applications such as Smartphones, notebooks, Solid State Drive, Digital Camera, IoT, wearable devices to battery management (linear and switching charger for different battery types) and high power DC-DC.
• PM team also design PAC (Power Application Controller) which is a SoC (System on Chip) that focus on high efficiency motor controller for wide range of application such as home appliances, whitegoods, power tools, garden tools, drones.
• As an Analog Design Intern, you will be trained on job with senior and experienced analog design engineers.
• You will take the relevant course on circuit design, software environment to participate block design, simulation, test and documentation.

QUALIFICATIONS:
• At least last year of bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering Electrical or Computer Science (CS)
• Good understanding of analog and mixed-signal IC design fundamentals
• Proficient in English (Read and Write)
• Self-motivated and able to work independently during high pressure
APPLICATION INCLUDES:
➢ Motivation letter
➢ Recommendation letter from a Professor
➢ Transcripts

II. Purpose of the position
:
At present, MF Program is operation in 11 districts mainly in the north and central of Vietnam.
• Respond to requests for IT support, logging problems, generating trouble tickets, attempting to diagnose and resolve problems, and if necessary, escalating the problem to the appropriate level of expertise.
• Responsible for documenting solutions to problems and developing end-user guidelines. On an ongoing basis, they work to improve customer support processes and practices.
• To support MF Program to identify, assess, and implement digital solutions that improve client satisfaction and/or organizational effectiveness, efficiency, or productivity.
• To ensure the effective functioning of the IT system that facilitates MF Program operation.
• To ensure that IT policies, procedures, and standards are compliant to global standards and are followed.
III. Major Responsibilities
:
1. SERVICE DESK AND SYSTEM SUPPORT (60%)
- First point of contact and day-to-day technical support to end users.
- Responds to Level I support requests via multiple sources.
- Provides user access service.
- Diagnoses client problems relying mainly on checklists and training.
- Escalates problems when necessary.
- Documents problem status and resolution.
- Assists in the deployment of new or upgraded software and hardware for multiple clients.

company: CÔNG TY TNHH QORVO VIỆT NAM
full_text_jd:
ABOUT THE POSITION:
Are you interested in world-class products and future-oriented projects in the field of chip design? Then Qorvo is the right choice!
Qorvo’s Power Management team designs a broad range of products which include Power Management Units (PMUs) for various applications such as Smartphones, notebooks, Solid State Drive, Digital Camera, IoT and wearable devices to battery management ( linear and switching charger for different battery types) which is a System on Chip that focus on high-efficiency motor controller for wide range of application such as home appliances, whitegoods, power tools, garden tools, drones. Design Verification Engineer works closely with digital & analog design engineers to verify the digital core of the PMUs, High power DC-DC and the SoC.
RESPONSIBILITIES
• Understand the requirements & the functional description of the device to ensure compliance with
specifications and error-free functionality.
• Create and execute a verification plan, including verification testbench/patterns/models/System Verilog
Assertions (SVAs).
• Develop SVA properties for assertion, assumption and cover statement.
• Develop Universal verification component (UVC) and integrate into the UVM environment
• Debug failures, fix testbench/model/checker issues, analyze and close coverage.
• Write scripts for automation of flow.
• Work with Analog team members to bring-up Chip/System level verification.
• Participate in post-silicon bring-up, validation and compliance testing.

REQUIREMENT/ QUALIFICATION
• Bachelor’s or Graduate Degree in: Computer Sciences, Electrical, or Computer Engineering.
• Have at least 2-5 years of proven experience
• Experience with Hardware Descriptive Languages (HDL) such as System Verilog, Verilog or VHDL is required.
• Understand digital hardware architectures and logic (State-machines, RAMs, Registers and bus architectures such as SPI or I2C).
• Good understanding of ASIC design and verification methodologies/flows is a plus
• Knowledge of Object-Oriented programming (OOP) is a plus.
• Knowledge of verification methodologies such as UVM/UVM-MS is a plus.
• Experience with silicon debug which include logic and Analog Blocks working together is a plus.
• Knowledge of the types of circuits targeted for DV, DCDC regulators, LDO, Bandgap, references is a plus.
• Knowledge of behavioral modeling in VAMS Electrical, VAMS wreal, SV-RNM (real-number modeling), SV-EENET, SV-UDN is plus.
• Ability to work in a Linux shell environment and Linux scripting (CSH/TCL/Perl/Python) is a plus.
• Must be self-driven & proactive with a desire to understand, learn more, do more.
• Excellent analytical and debugging skills with the ability to proactively solve issues is required.
• Verbal and written communication skills in English.
BENEFITS:
• Learn & work with world-class design engineers and IC products
• Dynamic, technological, global working environment
• Performance review to adjust salary and title/position.
• 13 months of salary, bonus paid twice a year and many other side benefits such as lunch allowance, healthcare program, annual health-screen, sport activities, gifts on special occasions etc.,

LG Electronics Development Vietnam (LGEDV) Company focuses on smart & eco-friendly automotive components. The VC Company produces high-quality & state-of-the-art in-car infotainment systems that deliver both information and entertainment on the go for many of the world‘s biggest automobile brands.

full_text_jd:

• Nghiên cứu và triển khai các giải pháp công nghệ mới cho hệ thống: Server, Load Balancer, Cloud Computing, Storage, Backup/Restore, Disaster Recovery (DR).
• Theo dõi đánh giá hiệu năng đường truyền và lập báo cáo về chất lượng đường truyền. Phối hợp các bên xử lý sự cố đường truyền, sự cố mạng.

• Tốt nghiệp đại học chuyên ngành công nghệ thông tin, toán tin và các ngành liên quan;
• Nắm vững kiến thức cơ bản về hệ điều hành Linux, Storage: SAN/NAS
• Kiến thức cơ bản về phần cứng máy chủ.
• Có kiến thức tốt và kinh nghiệm triển khai, quản trị, vận hành các hệ thống máy chủ sử dụng hệ điều hành VMware vSphere, Unix/Linux, Windows server, Storage… và các mô hình backup, Cluster cho hệ thống máy chủ.
• Có khả năng cài đặt, cấu hình, quản trị hệ thống ảo hóa với Vmware.
• Có kinh nghiệm trong triển khai và quản lý hệ thống CI/CD (Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment), bao gồm việc sử dụng các công cụ như Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD.
• Có khả năng cài đặt, cấu hình các dịch vụ HA Proxy, Loadbalancing, Centralized Logging, Cache, Queue,...
• Có kiến thức về Ansible, Automation CI/CD, Container,....
• Tối thiểu trên 02 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc ở vị trí tương đương.
• Có khả năng lập kế hoạch, báo cáo liên quan đến việc triển khai, bảo trì hệ thống Network, Server.
• Đam mê công việc, tích cực tìm hiểu các kiến thức mới.
• Kỹ năng giao tiếp và truyền đạt tốt.
• Có khả năng tự học tốt, tư duy tốt, chịu được áp lực công việc cao.
• Có khả năng nghiên cứu và giải quyết công việc độc lập.
Thời gian làm việc và quyền lợi:
- Thời gian làm việc: Buổi sáng từ 08h00 – 12h00; Buổi chiều từ 13h00 – 17h00, làm việc từ thứ 2 đến thứ 6 hàng tuần.
- Mức lương: Theo thỏa thuận.
- Được cung cấp các trang thiết bị cần thiết để nâng cao hiệu quả làm việc.
- Được hưởng đầy đủ các chính sách BHXH, BHYT, các chế độ phúc lợi khác theo đúng quy định của Luật lao động và các chế độ đãi ngộ của Tổng Công ty như: Phụ cấp ăn trưa, phụ cấp xăng xe, điện thoại, độc hại. Chế độ nghỉ mát hàng năm, khám sức khỏe định kỳ, chế độ Bảo hiểm sức khỏe toàn diện, thưởng Lễ/ Tết, tham gia các sự kiện của Tổng Công ty.
- Các chế độ khác theo quy định của Tổng Công ty.

Reporting-Related Responsibility
1.	Data Analysis & Reporting :
•	Use advanced Excel tools to organize and analyze large amounts of data, turning it into useful reports for the sales team and management.
•	Create detailed reports using pivot tables, VLOOKUP, and formulas to track sales performance, trends, and customer behaviors.
•	Prepare custom reports to monitor important sales numbers, forecasts, and performance metrics, helping management make decisions.
2.	Using Advanced Excel for Reports :
•	Use macros to automate repetitive tasks, making the reporting process faster and more accurate by reducing manual work.
•	Build complex formulas (like IF statements or VLOOKUP) to do in-depth analysis on sales data, profits, and customer trends.
•	Set up dashboards in Excel that show important sales data and update automatically, allowing team members to see key details with just a click.
3.	Data Cleaning & Validation :
•	Check and clean data in Excel to ensure it’s accurate by removing duplicates and fixing any errors before using it in reports.
•	Work with other teams to confirm data is correct before finalizing and sharing reports.
4.	Data Visualization & Presentation :
•	Use Excel tools like charts, graphs, and color-coding to make the data easy to understand.
•	Prepare clear and easy-to-read reports that highlight important sales trends and numbers, making it simple for senior managers to understand the data.
5.	Custom Reports :
•	Design Excel reports that meet the specific needs of different teams, such as sales, senior management, or other departments.
•	Provide ad-hoc reports as needed, answering any specific questions or issues raised by the team, and adjust reports when new information or requirements come up.

Functional Skills:
•	Strong proficiency in advanced Excel functionalities such as pivot tables, VLOOKUP, macros, and data analysis.
•	Expertise in SAP ERP, particularly in Sales and Distribution, Order Management, and Customer Relationship Management modules.
•	Experience with Business Workplace tools for internal collaboration and task management.
•	Knowledge of Knowledge Management Systems (KMS) for documentation and process management.
•	Strong analytical thinking and the ability to present complex data in an accessible format for decision-makers.
Additional Skills:
•	Ability to manage large datasets and derive actionable insights from data.
•	Experience in automating reporting tasks and streamlining data workflows.
•	Strong communication and collaboration skills to work with various teams and stakeholders.
•	Bachelor degree or higher education
•	Fluent at English in speaking & written

job_title: Quản Lý Dự Án AI (AI Project Manager)
full_text_jd:
- Quản lý dự án AI:
Điều phối, lập kế hoạch và giám sát tiến độ các dự án AI từ ý tưởng đến triển khai thực tế.
- Triển khai giải pháp AI:
Hỗ trợ các bộ phận ứng dụng AI vào quy trình làm việc, đảm bảo hiệu quả và tối ưu hóa hoạt động.
- Đánh giá & tối ưu hóa:
Theo dõi hiệu suất ứng dụng AI, đề xuất cải tiến và đảm bảo chúng đáp ứng yêu cầu kinh doanh.
- Quản lý rủi ro & sự cố:
Xác định các vấn đề tiềm ẩn trong dự án, đưa ra giải pháp xử lý và làm việc với các bên liên quan để giảm thiểu rủi ro.
- Hợp tác đa phòng ban:
Làm việc với kỹ sư AI, đội phát triển phần mềm và các phòng ban khác để hiểu và triển khai AI phù hợp.
- Tài liệu hóa & báo cáo:
Xây dựng tài liệu dự án, quy trình và báo cáo tiến độ, hiệu quả ứng dụng AI.
- Đào tạo & hỗ trợ:
Hướng dẫn và hỗ trợ các bộ phận khác trong việc sử dụng và khai thác công nghệ AI hiệu quả.

- Tốt nghiệp Cử nhân chuyên ngành Khoa học Máy tính, CNTT, Quản lý dự án hoặc lĩnh vực liên quan.
- Tối thiểu 3 năm kinh nghiệm quản lý dự án công nghệ, ưu tiên có kinh nghiệm trong AI/ML.
- Hiểu biết về các ứng dụng AI và khả năng triển khai thực tế trong doanh nghiệp.
- Hiểu rõ và áp dụng thuần thục Agile Kỹ năng quản lý dự án:
- Thành thạo các công cụ quản lý dự án Khả năng lập kế hoạch, theo dõi tiến độ và đảm bảo dự án hoàn thành đúng thời hạn.
- Kỹ năng làm việc nhóm, điều phối và giao tiếp tốt với cả đối tượng kỹ thuật và không kỹ thuật.
- Khả năng trình bày và thuyết phục để giải thích lợi ích & giá trị của AI cho các bộ phận khác nhau.
- Tư duy chiến lược và khả năng đánh giá tác động của AI đối với hoạt động kinh doanh.
- Hiểu biết cơ bản về AI, Machine Learning, và các công cụ AI phổ biến.
- Kiến thức cơ bản về ngôn ngữ lập trình hoặc scripting,Python, SQL, là một lợi thế
- Ưu tiên: Kiến thức về ngành thương mại điện tử hoặc môi trường công nghệ cao.
- Đam mê AI và có nền tảng công nghệ vững chắc.
- Có chứng chỉ về quản lý dự án: PMP, Agile, Scrum Master) là một lợi thế.

job_title: Chuyên Viên Cao Cấp Quản Trị Mạng (Senior Network Administrator)
company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Chứng Khoán SSI
full_text_jd:
Job Purpose:
This position takes care of the administration and engineering of the data network within the company;
This position has the responsibility of network design and implementation, configuration of network facilities such as router and firewall;
This position takes the responsibility of defining the mechanism for the Operation Team to monitor the data network included monitoring and troubleshooting. He/she also takes care the backup and restoration operation;
This position shall also take care the utilization and capacity planning of all kind of connectivity internally and externally;
Maintaining the library of documents and diagrams for the network design, configuration parameters, and operation guide.
Responsibilities:
1. Design And Implementation:
• Design the data network up to the international standard achieving proper protection of intrusion, high availability and performance required for the business operation.
• Document the design with the detail of system parameters, diagram, protection mechanism, and equipment inventory.
• Implement the design in professional manner.
2. Operation Support:
• Determine/define the mechanism for the monitoring of the performance & exceptions of the data network.
• Determine/define the mechanism on detecting any issues happening in the facilities in the data network.
• Rectify the issues immediately if happening.
• Perform system cleansing ensuring the health working environment for the data network. System Cleansing includes log archiving and purging, disk management, etc.
• Perform system backup of the facilities in the data network. Determine the effectiveness of the restoration for the corresponding facilities by the backup data.
• Define/design the operation reports required to summaries the status of the data network for management. This shall include the utilization vs capacity, rate of availability, issues, etc.
3. Utilization And Capacity Planning
• Determine and monitor the capacity and utilization of facilities as well as internal and external connectivity.
• Determine the upgrade path for over utilized facilities and connectivity.
4. Documentation & Version Control
• Document the detail design of the data network as well as its historical changes becoming part of the IT Architecture Dossier.
• Prepare the documents keep the latest and historical information of the facilities within the data network becoming part of the inventory control of the department.
• Maintain the configuration document for each facility keeping the latest configuration parameter, historical changes on parameters in each device, and the method of changing the parameter becoming part of the Configuration Control and Version Control within the department.
• Prepare the operation guide for each facility as well as the entire data network.
5. Performance & Risk Management
• Ensure the data network operating and recovery within the agreed SLA.
• Determine the risks in data network.
• Find the resolution to rectify the risks.

Qualifications:
• University degree in IT, Computer Mathematics or related subjects
• Certificate on network equipment administration included router, switches, firewall, etc
Work experience:
• Minimum 5 years network administrative experience.
• A solid understanding of an network technologies, OSI network model, TCP/IP, IPv6, IP address management, DNS, DHCP, layer 2 switching (VLAN, VTP, intervlan routing), layer 3 routing (OSPF, BGP, routing protocols versus routed protocols), WAN optimization, ability to use performance analysis to tune systems.
• A solid understanding of network security technologies, firewalls, layer 7 and application firewalls, IPSec, VPN.
• A expertise in networking/distributed computing environment concepts, including principles of routing, bridging and switching, voice over IP, voice systems and services, security principles.
• Solid knowledge and experience with Cisco, checkpoint technologies.
• Experience with MPLS design and configuration.
• Experience on finance system and securities trading system is an advantage.
• Experience identifying, analyzing and managing risks on large, complex data network.
• Experience using and mentoring on the use of MS Project and MS Project.
• Knowledge on the operation of securities trading business is an advantage.
Skills required:
• Good presentation, written and verbal communication skill.
• Communication skills, communication confidence, team work, good customer relations;
• Ability to work independently, under pressure and large,
• Good at reading technical documents in English, basic communication

• Work Location: Ha Noi, Ho Chi Minh, Da Nang
Project Description
• Dự án phát triển chuỗi hệ thống quản lý nhân sự, tài chính, kho, logictics thuộc ecosystem của khách hàng viễn thông
